mt0: <pad> Go tshwanetse go re go nne le kagiso mo ditlholong tsa African National Congress, a rialo.</s>

en: The ANC in KwaZulu-Natal has called on the Department of Cooperative Governance and Traditional Affairs to intervene after private security personnel entered the Nquthu Municipalitys Council Chambers and removed ANC councillors from the sitting.
tsn: Mokgatlho wa ANC wa KwaZulu-Natal o kopile Lefapha la Pusotshwaraganelo le Merero ya Setso go tsereganya morago ga gore badiredi ba tshireletso ya poraefete ba tsene kwa phaposing ya mmasepala wa kwa Nquthu mme ba tlose bakhanselara ba ANC kwa pitsong.
mt0: <pad> ANC kwaZulu-Natal e kgothaletse Lefapha la Boipuso le Tlhotlhomiso ya Ditso go tsaya karolo morago ga go re badiri ba ditšhelete ba tsene mo matlwaneng a Nquthu Municipality Council Chambers mme ba tlose mapodise a ANC go tswa mo kopanong.</s>

en: The incident, which was captured on video and circulated widely on social media, took place earlier this week.
tsn: Tiragalo e, e e neng e tshwerwe ka bidio gape e phasaladitswe mo bobegakgang jwa loago e diragetse go sa le gale mo bekeng e.
mt0: <pad> O ne a tlhasela mosadi wa gagwe, o neng a tshwarwa ka bidio mme o phatlalatswa mo di-social media, pele ga beke eno.</s>

en: The video shows security guards manhandling an unidentified councillor
tsn: Kgatiso ya bidio e bontsha batlhankedi ba tshireletso ba kampana le mokhanselara yo leina la gagwe le sa rebolwang
mt0: <pad> Video shows security guards manhandling an unidentified councillor.</s>

en: Councillors can be heard shouting and asking what Zikode has done.
tsn: Go utlwagetse bakhanselara ba goeletsa le go botsa gore Zikode o dirileng.
mt0: <pad> Baemedi ba tshwanetse go utlwa ba goa ba botsa gore Zikode o dirile eng.</s>

en: The security officers, clad in heavy body armour, are seen grabbing two councillors and attempting to drag them from the chamber
tsn: Batlhankedi ba tshireletso, ba neng ba apere diaparo tse di bokete, ba bonwa ba tshwara bakhanselara ba babedi ka maiteko a go ba ntsha kwa phaposing.
mt0: <pad> Baofisiri ba tshireletso, ba apere diaparo tsa botlhokwa, ba bonala ba tshwara mapodise a le mabedi a Lekgotla mme ba leka go ba tsholetsa kwa ntle.</s>

en: The ANC in KwaZulu-Natal has accused the IFP of orchestrating the attack on their councillors.
tsn: ANC ya kwa kgaolong ya KwaZulu-Natal e latofatsa IFP ka go rulaganya tlhaselo ya bakhanselara ba bona.
mt0: <pad> The ANC in KwaZulu-Natal has accused the IFP of orchestrating the attack on their councillors.</s>

en: The IFP could not engage on the rational points they were raising.
tsn: IFP e reteletswe ke go nna le seabe mo go sekasekeng dintlha tsa botlhokwa tse ba neng ba di tlhagisa.
mt0: <pad> IFP e ne e sa kgone go tlhaloganya dikgopolo tsa bone tse di botlhokwa.</s>

en: They decided to bring in those thugs whom they hired to take out our councillors.
tsn: Ba tsere tshwetso ya go tlisa dinokwane tse ba di thapileng go ntsha bakhanselara ba rona.
mt0: <pad> Ba simolola go rerang ba tlhe ba batla go tlisa bao ba ba kgethilego go ntsha batlholagadi ba rona ba lekgotla.</s>

en: These are not security employed by the municipality these are private thugs, says ANC KZN Spokesperson, Nhlakanipho Ntombela.
tsn: Ba, ga e se batlhakankedi ba tshireletso ba ba thapilweng ke mmasepala, ke dinokwane tsa poraefete. Go bua Mmueledi wa ANC wa kwa KZN Nhakanipho Ntombela.
mt0: <pad> These are not security employed by the municipality, these are private thugs, says ANC KZN Spokesperson Nhlakanipho Ntombela.</s>

en: But the IFP has dismissed the allegations.
tsn: Fela IFP e kgapetse ditatofatso tseo kwa thoko.
mt0: <pad> Go a few days ago, the IFP announced that it had withdrawn its investigation into the allegations.</s>

en: The party says it was the ANC councillors who were unruly.
tsn: Mokgatlho o buile gore bakhanselara ba ANC ke bona ba ba neng ba sa laolege.
mt0: <pad> Go ya ka setlhopha, e ne e le baemedi ba ANC ba ba neng ba sa tshegetsa melao.</s>

en: The ANC councillors did not want to see the council meeting continuing.
tsn: Bakhanselara ba ANC ba ne ba sa batle go bona kopano ya khanselara e tswelela pele.
mt0: <pad> Baemedi ba ANC ba ne ba sa batle go bona phuthego ya lekgotla e tswelela.</s>

en: They really wanted to halt the council.
tsn: Ba ne tota ba batla go emisa khansele.
mt0: <pad> Ba ne ba batla go emisa lekgotla.</s>

en: They did not want to see anything that had to be discussed of service delivery.
tsn: Ba ne ba sa batle go bona sepe se se neng se tshwanetse go buisanelwa ka thebolelo ya diterelo.
mt0: <pad> Ba ne ba sa batle go bona sepe se se tshwanetseng go buiwa ka tshedimosetso ya ditirelo.</s>

en: Whenever there are members who are disrupting the council you have to find ways and means to do that.
tsn: Fa go na le maloko a a lekang go kgoreletsa khansele, o tshwanetse go batla ditsela tsa go dira jalo.
mt0: <pad> Fa go na le baemedi ba simolola go kgoreletsa lekgotla, o tshwanetse wa bona ditsela le ditsela tsa go dira jalo.</s>

en: Even the one who was recording you can see that it was well planned, well-orchestrated, says IFP Provincial Chairperson, Thami Ntuli.
tsn: Le ena yo o neng a gatisa, go a bontsha gore go ne go logilwe leano e bile go rulagantswe sentle. Go bua modulasetulo  wa porofense, Thami Ntuli.
mt0: <pad> Even the one who was recording can see that it was well planned, well-orchestrated, says IFP Provincial Chairperson Thami Ntuli.</s>

en: The ANC believes that the election of the IFP’s current mayor Lindokuhle Shabalala  was unlawful.
tsn: ANC e dumela fa tlhopho ya mmeyara wa IFP wa ga jaana Lindokuhle Shabalala e ne e se ka fa molaong.
mt0: <pad> ANC e dumela go re dikgetho tsa mayor Lindokuhle Shabalala wa IFP di ne di sa siama.</s>

en: The party is citing the fact that the council meeting in which Shabalala was elected was held while the country was in level 5 lockdown as reason for its assertions.
tsn: Mokgatlho o umaka ntlha ya gore kopano ya khansele, e Shabalala a tlhopilweng kwa go yona, e diragetse fa naga e le ka fa tlase ga logato lwa 5 lwa kiletsomesepele ka ntlha ya go tlhoka boammaaruri.
mt0: <pad> Go tswa go baagi ba le bantsi ba sa itse, setlhopha se simolola ka go re phuthego ya botsamaisi eo e neng e tlhomiwa e ne e tshwaretswe fa naga e ne e le mo maemo a ntlha a lockdown.</s>

en: The KwaZulu-Natal Department of Cooperative Governance and Traditional Affairs says it is aware of the dispute and will investigate further.
tsn: Lefapha la Pusotshwaraganelo le Merero ya Setso la KwaZulu- Natal le kaile fa le itse ka ga kgotlhang mme le tlaa sekaseka go ya pele.
mt0: <pad> KwaZulu-Natal Department of Cooperative Governance and Traditional Affairs says it is aware of the dispute and will investigate further.</s>

en: Report by Bongani Gema
tsn: Pego ka Bongani Gema.
mt0: <pad> Go a few days ago, I was told that they were going to be released.</s>

en: African National Congress (ANC) President Cyril Ramaphosa says the COVID-19 pandemic is the governing party’s first real test since its establishment.
tsn: Moporesidente wa ANC Cyril Ramaphosa a re leroborobo la COVID-19 ke teko ya ntlha ya nnete mo mokgatlhong fa e sa le o tlhongwa.
mt0: <pad> President Cyril Ramaphosa wa African National Congress (ANC) o re COVID-19 ke teko ya ntlha ya setlhopha sa ANC go simolola ka fa e dirileng ka teng go tloga ka go tlhomiwa ga sone.</s>

en: Ramaphosa says the ANC cannot point fingers and has to navigate the country through the storm.
tsn: Ramaphosa a re ANC e ka se supe ope ka menwana, mme e tshwanetse go bontsha naga tsela kgatlhanong le ditsuatsue.
mt0: <pad> Ramaphosa says the ANC cannot point fingers and has to navigate the country through the storm.</s>

en: He was speaking virtually at the ANC Northern Cape provincial conference, being held at Springbok.
tsn: O ne a bua kwa khonferense ya porofense  ya kwa Kapa Bokone e e ne e tshwaretswe kwa Springbok.
mt0: <pad> O ne a bua ka mogala wa kgolegong ya ANC ya Northern Cape, e neng e tshwaretswe kwa Springbok.</s>

en: Apart from its effects on the health of people, COVID-19 has also devastated economies and lives.
tsn: Kwa ntle ga ditlamorago tse e nang le tsona mo boitekanelong jwa batho, COVID-19 gape e sentse gape ikonomi le matshelo a batho.
mt0: <pad> Go tloga ka ditlamorago tsa yone mo botshelong jwa batho, COVID-19 e ne ya senya ditšhelete le matshelo a batho.</s>

en: The COVID-19 pandemic saw South Africa’s economy depress even further, millions more became unemployed.
tsn: Leroborobo la COVID-19 le digile ikhonomi ya Aforika Borwa le go feta, dimilione tsa batho di feletswe ke ditiro.
mt0: <pad> COVID-19 pandemic saw South Africa's economy depress even further, millions more became unemployed.</s>

en: With a third wave fast approaching, Ramaphosa says the ANC needs to play its part to stop the rise in numbers, this includes encouraging people to register for vaccinations.
tsn: Jaaka lekhubu la boraro le atamela ka lobelo, Ramaphosa a re ANC e tshwanetse go tshameka karolo ya yona go thibela koketsego ya dipalo, se se akaretsa go rotloetsa batho go ikwadisetsa go tsaya meento.
mt0: <pad> Go na le tshohanyetso ya boraro e ntse e goroga, Ramaphosa o re ANC e tshwanetse go dira karolo ya yone go thibela go gola ga dipalo, seo se akaretsa go kgothaletsa batho go ikwadisetsa go nna le vakantšho.</s>

en: He says more than 100 countries have joined the call for pharmaceutical companies to waive intellectual property rights for COVID-19 vaccines.
tsn: A re di naga tse di fetang lekgolo di ditshwaragane mmogo le ditheo  tsa melemo go letlelela ditshwanelo tsa thoto ya boitlhamedi tsa meento ya COVID-19.
mt0: <pad> O re go feta dinaga tse 100 di tseneletse go kgothaletsa badiri ba melemo ya bongaka go waiwa ditaelo tsa tshohanyetso ya COVID-19</s>

en: ANC President Cyril Ramaphosa addresses the Northern Cape elective conference.
tsn: Moporesidente wa ANC Cryil Ramaphosa o eme khonferese ya ditlhopho ya Kapa Bokone ka lefoko.
mt0: <pad> ANC President Cyril Ramaphosa addressing the Northern Cape elective conference</s>

en: ANC Provincial Chairperson Zamani Saul has been a staunch critic of suspended Secretary-General Ace Magashule, calling him deeply compromised.
tsn: Modulasetulo wa porofense wa ANC Zamani Saul e ntse e le motshwayang diphoso yo mogolo wa mokwaledi-kakaretso yo o emisitsweng kwa tirong Ace Magashule, a re ke motho yo o nang le dikgwetlho di le dintsi.
mt0: <pad> ANC Provincial Chairperson Zamani Saul o ne a tlhasela Ace Magashule, a re o kgopisitswe thata.</s>

en: Apart from COVID-19, the movement is also going through its own challenges such as ill-discipline.
tsn: Kwa ntle ga COVID-19, mokgatlho o lebagane gape le dikgwetlho tsa ona, jaaka maitshwaro a a sa tlhomamang.
mt0: <pad> Go tswa kwa COVID-19, tshepedišo e ntse e lebana le mathata a yona a a sa siamang jaaka go se na boitshepo.</s>

en: Ever since Nasrec we have been trying to forge unity.
tsn: Fa e sa le Nasrec, re ntse re le leka go bopa kutlwano.
mt0: <pad> Go simolola ka Nasrec re ne ra leka go tlhabolola kagiso.</s>

en: Call that comrade to order.
tsn: Kgalema mokhomoreite yoo.
mt0: <pad> Go a comrade to order.</s>

en: That is unity, says Ramaphosa.
tsn: Ke yona kutlwano eo, go bua Ramaphosa.
mt0: <pad> That's unity, says Ramaphosa</s>

en: Ramaphosa also called for the strengthening of policies and deployees to local government.
tsn: Ramaphosa o kopile gape gore go nne le maatlafatso ya dipholisi mo pusong ya selegae.
mt0: <pad> Ramaphosa o ne a kgothaletsa go matlafatsa melao le go romela badiri kwa mmuso wa selegae.</s>

en: With local government elections in October, the ANC says it wants a resounding victory at the polls.
tsn: Jaaka fa ditlhopho tsa dipusoselegae tse di tlaa tshwarwa ka kgwedi ya Diphalane, ANC ya re e batla phenyo e e itumedisang kwa ditlhophong tseo.
mt0: <pad> Go na le dikgetho tsa puso ya baagi ka Mphalane, ANC e re e batla go fenya dikgetho ka go kgothaletsa.</s>

en: NC ANC Chairperson Zamani Saul reacts to Ramaphosa’s address on provincial elective conference.
tsn: Modulasetulo wa ANC ya kwa NC Zamani Saul o tsibogela puo ya ga Ramaphosa ka ga khonferense ya ditlhopho ya porofense.
mt0: <pad> NC ANC Chairperson Zamani Saul reacts to Ramaphosa’s address on provincial elective conference</s>

en: Political analyst Dr Luvuyo Dondolo says the African National Congress (ANC) needs a long term solution if it is to renew the movement.
tsn: Mosekaseki wa dipolotiki Ngaka Luvuyo Dondolo a re African National Congress (ANC) e tshwanetse go nna le tharabololo ya pakatelele fa e batla go ntšhwafatsa mokgatlho.
mt0: <pad> Dr Luvuyo Dondolo, a political analyst, says the African National Congress (ANC) needs a long term solution if it is to renew the movement.</s>

en: He says the ANC may regain a bit of trust following current interventions but going forward, they will have to put in more work.
tsn: A re ANC e ka tsosolosa tshepo gape, morago ga ditsereganyo tse di diragalang ga jaana fela go ya kwa pele, ba tlile go tlhoka go dira ka natla.
mt0: <pad> O re ANC e ka boa e bona tshepo e nnye morago ga dithulaganyo tsa jaana, mme go ya pele, ba tla tshwanela go dira go feta.</s>

en: This after the ANC in the Eastern Cape announced tapping into the wisdom of those who led before by involving the former president Thabo Mbeki in a three-day Provincial Executive Committee meeting currently under way in East London.
tsn: Se ke morago ga gore ANC ya kwa Kapa Botlhaba e dire kitsiso ka ga go tsaya botlhale go tswa go ba ba neng ba busa pele ka go akaretsa moporesidente wa maloba Thabo Mbeki kwa kopanong ya malatsi a le mararo, ya komiti ya khuduthamaga ya porofense e e tshwerweng ga jaana kwa East London.
mt0: <pad> Gone after the ANC in the Eastern Cape announced tapping into the wisdom of those who led before by involving the former president Thabo Mbeki in a three-day Provincial Executive Committee meeting currently under way in East London.</s>

en: Dondolo says this is a short term strategy.
tsn: Dondolo o kaya fa se e le togamaano ya paka e khutshwane.
mt0: <pad> Dondolo says this is a short term strategy.</s>

en: The involvement of former leaders such as Thabo Mbeki, leaders who are perceived to have the moral compass as a way of this renewal of the ANC is short term.
tsn: Go nna le seabe ga baeteledipele ba maloba ba ba tshwanang le Thabo Mbeki, baeteledipele ba ba nang le maitsholo a a siameng  jaaka tsela ya go ntšhwafatsa ANC, ke selo sa nakwana.
mt0: <pad> Go nna teng ga baeteledipele ba bogologolo jaaka Thabo Mbeki, baeteledipele ba go tsewang go na le boitsholofelo jwa go nna le boitshwaro jaaka tsela ya go tsosolosa ANC ke ka nako e khutshwane.</s>

en: It is the strategy that the ANC is using to win the hearts of the voters, however the ANC needs a permanent and long term solution, says Dondolo.
tsn: Ke mokgwa o ANC e o dirisang go gapa dipelo tsa batlhophi, le fa go le jalo, ANC e tlhoka togamaago e e tlaa nnelang ruri, go bua Dondolo.
mt0: <pad> It's the strategy that the ANC is using to win the hearts of the voters, however the ANC needs a permanent and long term solution, says Dondolo.</s>

en: ANC Northern Cape chairperson Zamani Saul says the party needs to restore its damaged image.
tsn: Modulasetuolo was ANC kwa Kapa Bokone Zamani Saul a re mokgatlho o tlhoka go busetsa setshwantsho sa ona se se senyegileng.
mt0: <pad> ANC Northern Cape chairperson Zamani Saul says the party needs to restore its damaged image.</s>

en: He says with this short term solution, the ANC might win the elections in some of the municipalities but there are certain metros where they will be strongly contested by other political organisations.
tsn: A re, ka tharabololo e ya nakwana, ANC e ka fenya ditlhopho kwa dimmasepaleng tse di rileng, mme fela go na le ditoropokgolo tse dingwe tse di tlaa ganetsanngwang ke mekgatlho e mengwe ya sepolotiki.
mt0: <pad> O re ka tsela eno ya go dira ditshwetso tsa nakwana, ANC e ka fenya dikgetho mo mafelong a mangwe a ditoropokgolo, mme go na le metsotswana e e tla ba kgaoganwang thata ke ditlhopha tse dingwe tsa dipolotiki.</s>

en: Mbeki is set to contribute to how to reassert the ANC as a movement rooted among the people.
tsn: Mbeki o tlhomilwe go nna le seabe mo go tsoseletseng ANC jaaka e le mokgatlho o o namileng medi ya ona mo bathong.
mt0: <pad> Mbeki o tla nna le seabe mo go rerang gore ANC e boele e nne mokgatlho o o tlhagetseng mo bathong.</s>

en: ANC PEC Spokesperson, Loyiso Magqashela, says the meeting will also draw on the legacy of the founders of the party for the benefit of the current generation.
tsn: Mmueledi wa ANC PEC Loyiso Magqashela a re, kopano e e tlaa ikaega ka boswa jwa batho ba e leng basimolodi ba mokgatlho gore e tle e tswele le bašwa ba jaanong mosola.
mt0: <pad> Go tla nna le go ithuta ka dikgopolo tsa badiri ba ANC go thusa go tlhabolola tsela ya bone ya go dira dilo.</s>

en: To strengthen the issue of the organisational renewal and unity we have then to tap from the wisdom of those who led before so that at least our renewal trajectory gets to be guided and guided properly.
tsn: Go tiisa ntlha ya thulaganyo ya ntšhwafatso le tshwaragano re tshwanetse go tsena mo botlhaleng jwa ba ba neng ba busa pele gore nšhwafatso ya rona e nne le go kaelo sentle.
mt0: <pad> To strengthen the issue of the organisational renewal and unity we have then to tap from the wisdom of those who led before so that at least our renewal trajectory gets to be guided and guided properly</s>

en: You would have nowadays understood how the ANC is pressured from left right and centre now the renewal project then becomes key and also we want to assert the authority and the leadership of the ANC amongst the society, says Magqashela.
tsn: O ka tswa o tlhalogantse gore mo malatsing a segompieno, ANC e gatelelwa go tswa mo molemeng go ya kwa mojeng, ntšhwafatso ya porojeke jaanong e nna botlhokwa mme gape re batla go gatelela taolo le boeteledipele jwa ANC mo setšhabeng, go bua Magqashela.
mt0: <pad> O ne o tla bo o tlhaloganya gompieno gore ANC e tsilediwa go tswa kwa matlhakoreng a le mabedi go ya kwa matlhakoreng a le marataro, jaanong projeke ya go tsosolosa e nna botlhokwa mme re batla go tlhomamisa thata maatla le boeteledipele jwa ANC mo setjhabeng, a rialo Magqashela.</s>

en: As ANC EC kickstarts its 3-day Extended PEC meeting at EL ICC, Dr W.B Rubusana Region this morning, it’s expected to be joined by the former ANC President Cde Thabo Mbeki.
tsn: Jaaka ANC EC e tlile go simolola kopano ya yona e e okeditsweng ya PEC kwa EL ICC, kwa kgaolong ya Dr W.B Rubusana mo mosong o,  yona e solofetswe go nna le moporesidente wa maloba wa ANC Cde Thabo Mbeki.
mt0: <pad> Fa ANC EC e simolodisa kopano ya yone ya dikgwedi tse tharo ya PEC e e kgethegileng ya EL ICC, Dr W.B Rubusana Region gompieno mo mosong, e lebeletswe go re e tla nna le Moporesidente wa bogologolo wa ANC Cde Thabo Mbeki.</s>

en: ANC President, Cyril Ramaphosa, says placing the economy on a renewal path is one of the party’s core responsibilities this year.
tsn: Moporesidente wa ANC, Cyril Ramaphosa, a re go baya ikonomi mo tseleng ya ntšhwafatso ke nngwe ya maikarabelo a a botlhokwa a mokgatlho mo ngwageng ono.
mt0: <pad> President Cyril Ramaphosa says putting the economy on a renewal path is one of the party’s core responsibilities this year.</s>

en: Ramaphosa was addressing party members virtually at the Northern Cape’s elective conference in Springbok.
tsn: Ramaphosa o ne a eme maloko a mokgatlho ka lefoko ka setshwantshokgopolo kwa khonferenseng ya ditlhopho ya porofense ya Kapa Bokone e e neng e tshwaretswe kwa Springbok.
mt0: <pad> Ramaphosa o ne a bua le baemedi ba setlhopha ka kgolagano ya inthanete kwa kopanong ya dikgetho ya Northern Cape e tshwaretsweng kwa Springbok.</s>

en: He added that party members should elect capable individuals to lead at local government level,  and avoid past mistakes of appointing incapable officials who have collapsed municipalities across the country.
tsn: O okeditse ka gore maloko a mokgatlho a tshwanetse go tlhopha batho ba ba nang le bokgoni go etelela pele kwa maemong a pusoselegae, le go thibela diphoso tse di fitileng tsa go thapa batlhankedi ba ba palelwang ke tiro, ba ba phutlamisitseng dimmasepala tsa naga tse di farologaneng.
mt0: <pad> O oketsa ka go re baemedi ba setlhopha ba tshwanetse go tlhoma batho ba ba nang le bokgoni go etelela pele kwa maemo a puso ya matlole, mme ba tile diphoso tsa bogologolo tsa go tlhoma batlhanke ba ba sa kgoneng go dira thata mo dikgotleng tse di tlhakatlhakaneng mo mafatseng otlhe a naga.</s>

en: SABC News Ulrich Hendricks reports on the Northern Capes elective conference.
tsn: Ulrich Hendricks wa dikgang tsa SABC o bega ka ga khonferense ya ditlhopho ya Kapa Bokone.
mt0: <pad> SABC News Ulrich Hendricks reports on the Northern Capes elective conference.</s>

en: On behalf of the National Executive Committee, we want to thank and appreciate the Mlangeni and Ledwaba family for coming forward to work in partnership with the ANC in celebrating the legacy of Mlangeni under the theme: Morality, ethics, and renewal.
tsn: Mo boemong jwa Komiti ya Khuduthamaga ya Bosetšhaba, re batla go leboga le go tlotlomatsa lelapa la ga Mlangeni le ga Ledwaba go tla go dirisana mmogo le ANC mo go ketekeng boswa jwa ga Mlangeni ka fa tlase ga setlhogo se se reng: Maitsholo, boitshwaro le ntšhwafatso.
mt0: <pad> Go tswa mo Komiting ya Bosetšhaba ya Direko, re batla go lebogela le go galalediwa Mlangeni le Ledwaba ka go re ba ne ba tshegetsa ANC ka go dira mmogo le ANC go keteka boemo jwa ga Mlangeni ka setlhogo: Morality, ethics, and renewal.</s>

en: It actually fits well in this period of 2021 where we have our national team of unity, renewal, and rebuilding in the year of Charlotte Maxeke.
tsn: Se se direga ka nako e e siameng mo pakeng e ya 2021 moo  re nang le  setlhopha sa rona sa bosetšhaba sa kutlwano, ntšhwafatso, le kago sešwa mo ngwageng ono  wa Charlotte Maxeke
mt0: <pad> Go tshwana sentle mo motlheng wa 2021 fa re na le setlhopha sa rona sa bobedi, go tlhabolola, le go tsosolosa ka ngwaga wa Charlotte Maxeke.</s>

en: What is most important is that here lies a person who has been very selfless and protective of the ANC, who passed on being concerned about the state of the organisation, and in his memory, we do believe that as the NEC we owe it to people like him in ensuring that we bring the NEC together and we self-correct, says NEC member Nomvula Mokonyane.
tsn: Se se botlhokwa ke gore fa, go robetse motho yo o pelotshweu yo o neng a sireletsa ANC, yo o tlhokofalang a na le dingongorego ka ga seemo sa setheo, mme mo segopotsong sa gagwe, re dumela gore jaaka NEC, re kolota batho ba ba tshwanang le ene ka go netefatsa gore re golaganya NEC mme re a iphosolola, go bua leloko la NEC  Nomvula Mokonyane.
mt0: <pad> Gone without saying you don't know</s>

en: June and Andrew Mlangeni Foundation Chairperson, Professor Hlengiwe Mkhize says they are delighted.
tsn: June le Modulasetulo wa Andrew Mlangeni Foundation, Moporofesara Hlengiwe Mkhize ba rile ba itumetse thata.
mt0: <pad> June and Andrew Mlangeni Foundation Chairperson, Professor Hlengiwe Mkhize says they are delighted.</s>

en: We were committed to taking forward his last struggle of dealing with moral issues and especially within his own organisation and also ethical issues and we thought, look we are all in it now, he’s gone, let’s talk openly about these things and difficult topics.
tsn: Re ne re ikemiseditse go tsweletsa kgaratlho ya gagwe ya bofelo pele e e neng e tshwaragane le mathata a  boitsholo, segolobogolo ka fa setheong sa gagwe, gape  le mathata a maitseo, mme ra akanya gore re rotlhe mo mathateng a jaanong, ena o tsamaile, a re bueng ka dilo tse re lokologile le ditlhogo tse dingwe tse boima.
mt0: <pad> Re ne re ikemiseditse go tsaya maikarabelo a gagwe a bofelo a go tlhabana le mathata a boitsholofo, mme segolobogolo mo mokgatlong wa gagwe le mathata a boitshwaro, mme re re: "Bonang, re ntse re le mo go yone jaanong, o a tsogile, re tla bua ka ditaba tseno ka botlalo le ka dikgang tse di thata."</s>

en: And so we are really grateful that Ntate Mlangeni set a tone.
tsn: Ka jalo re lebogela gore Ntate Mlangeni o simolotse sengwe.
mt0: <pad> Ke ka moo re lebogela thata go re Rre Mlangeni o ne a tlhoma mogato.</s>

en: Mkhize says Mlangeni was against corruption and how it is costing the poor:
tsn: Mkhize o rile Mlangeni o ne a le kgatlhanong le bosenyi, le ka mokgwa o bo amang bahumanegi ka ona.
mt0: <pad> Mkhize says Mlangeni was against corruption and how it is costing the poor.</s>

en: The University of South Africa hosted an Inaugural Memorial Lecture for the freedom fighter.
tsn: Yunibesithi ya Aforika Borwa e e ne e tshwere Thuto ya segopotso sa Kgakololo sa balwela kgololesego.
mt0: <pad> Gompieno Yunivhesiti ya Afrika Borwa e neile thuto ya go ikgopola ya Memorial Lecture ya motlhanke wa kagiso.</s>

en: It was delivered by Justice and Correctional Services Minister, Ronald Lamola.
tsn: E rebotswe  ke Tona ya Bosiamisi le Ditirelo tsa Kgopololo, Ronald Lamola.
mt0: <pad> Go ne go tlišiwa ke Tonakgolo ya Tshireletso le Ditiro Tsa Botlhoko, Ronald Lamola.</s>

en: The Economic Freedom Fighters (EFF) has expressed its condolences to the family and international congregants of the Synagogue, Church of All Nations (Scoan) on the passing of Nigerian televangelist TB Joshua.
tsn: Mokgatlho wa Economic Freedom Fighters (EFF) o rometse matshidiso a ona go balelapa le phuthego ya boditšhabatšhaba ya Synagogue, Kereke ya Dinagakopano (Scoan) mo lesong la moruti yo itsegeng mo di thelebišheneng wa moNigeria TB Joshua.
mt0: <pad> The Economic Freedom Fighters (EFF) has expressed its condolences to the family and international congregants of the Synagogue, Church of All Nations (Scoan) on the passing of Nigerian televangelist TB Joshua.</s>

en: Joshua died on Saturday night in a Lagos hospital at the age of 57 years.
tsn: Joshua o tlhokafetse bosigo jwa Lamatlhatso kwa bookelong jwa  Lagos a le dingwaga di le 57.
mt0: <pad> Joshua died on Saturday night in a Lagos hospital at the age of 57 years.</s>

en: His self-proclaimed healing powers attracted many high-profile South Africans to his church in Lagos, including EFF leader Julius Malema, former Transport Minister Dipuo Peters and the late former Springbok player Wium Basson.
tsn: Maatla a gagwe a go bua le go fodisa a gogetse MaAforika Borwa a maemo a kwa godimo kwa kerekeng ya gagwe kwa Lagos, go akarediwa moeteledipele wa EFF Julius Malema, Tona ya maloba ya dipalangwa Dipuo Peters le motshameki wa maloba wa Springbok Wium Basson.
mt0: <pad> O ne a itse go fodisa batho ba bantsi ba ba kwa godimo mo Afrika Borwa, jaaka Moeteledipele wa EFF Julius Malema, Mmotlana wa Transport Dipuo Peters le mongwe wa batshameki ba Springbok ba ba tsofetseng Wium Basson.</s>

en: The EFF says millions of people around the world, will remember him for his selfless commitment to the Word of God.
tsn: Mokgatlho wa EFF o rile dimilione tsa batho go ralala lefatshe, ba tla mo gopola ka bopelotshweu jwa gagwe le go ineela mo lefokong la Modimo.
mt0: <pad> EFF says that millions of people around the world, will remember him for his selfless commitment to the Word of God.</s>

en: In the video below, SABC News Foreign Editor Sophie Mokoena gives an update on TB Joshua.
tsn: Mo kgatisong e e fa tlase, motseleganyi wa dikgang tsa boditšhaba tsa SABC, Sophie Mokoena o neelana ka tshedimoso ka TB Joshua.
mt0: <pad> Gone a few days ago, TB Joshua was released from hospital in South Africa.</s>

en: Public Protector Busisiwe Mkhwebane’s challenge against Parliament’s impeachment rules will be heard in the Western Cape High Court on Monday.
tsn: Kgwetlho e Mosireletsi wa Botlhe Busisiwe Mkhwebane a lebaneng le yona kgatlhanong le melao ya palamenente ya tshekiso ya motlhankedimogolo, e tlaa reediwa kwa kgotlatshekelo ya wa Kapa Bophirima ka Mosupologo.
mt0: <pad> Go a judge in the Western Cape High Court on Monday.</s>

en: The matter, expected to be heard by 3 judges, has been set down until Friday.
tsn: Ntlha e e lebeletsweng go reediwa ke baatlhodi ba le 3 e, e beetswe kwa thoko go fitlha ka Labotlhano.
mt0: <pad> Go tloga ka Laboraro, kgang e e tla rerwa ke baatlhodi ba le bararo, e tla bolelwa ke baatlhodi ba le bararo.</s>

en: Last month, Western Cape Judge President John Hlophe withdrew from the case after the Democratic Alliance requested his recusal.
tsn: Mo kgweding e e fetileng, Moatlhodimogolo wa  Kapa Bophirima, John Hlophe o  ikgogetse morago mo kgetsing e, morago ga gore mokgatlho wa Democratic Alliance o kope thulano ya dikgatlhegelo ya gagwe.
mt0: <pad> Mmesa, Moatlhodi wa Bosigo jwa Borwa John Hlophe o ile a tlogela go sebetsa ka kgang ya gagwe morago ga go re Democratic Alliance e mo kgolege.</s>

en: Hlophe was recently found guilty of gross misconduct by the Judicial Conduct Tribunal.
tsn: Hlophe o bonwe molato wa bogodu ke kgotlatshekelo ya Boitshwaro Jwa Boatlhodi.
mt0: <pad> Hlophe o ne a kgonne go nna le molato wa go se direle ka tsela e e bosula thata ke Lekgotla la Boitshwaro la Bosupi.</s>

en: The motion to impeach Mkhwebane was brought by the DA.
tsn: Tsamaiso ya go latofatsa Mkhwebane e tlisitswe ke ba DA.
mt0: <pad> Go tlogela Mkhwebane go ne ga tla ka molao wa go re a tlogetswe ke ba DA.</s>

en: Meanwhile, the Judicial Services Commission will decide at the end of next month whether Hlophe is guilty of gross misconduct and should face impeachment.
tsn: Re sa ntse re le foo, Khomišene ya Tirelo ya Bosiamisi e tla swetsa kwa bofelong jwa kgwedi e e tlang gore a Hlophe o bonwe molato wa bogodu le gore a o tshwanetse go lebagana le ditatofatso.
mt0: <pad> Gone while, the Judicial Services Commission will decide at the end of next month whether Hlophe is guilty of gross misconduct and should face impeachment.</s>

en: The Economic Freedom Fighters was among the parties that did not support the establishment of the committee.
tsn: Lekoko la Economic Freedom Fighters e ne le lengwe la makoko a a neng a sa tshegetse tlhomo ya komiti e.
mt0: <pad> The Economic Freedom Fighters was one of the parties that did not support the establishment of the committee.</s>

en: The party’s Member of Parliament Natasha Ntlangwini said the rules were deliberately crafted with the Public Protector in mind.
tsn: Leloko la lekoko la Palamente Natasha Ntlangwini o rile, fa go ne go thalwa melao e, go ne go akantswe ka Mosireletsi wa Setšhaba
mt0: <pad> Mme Natasha Ntlangwini, a Member of Parliament for the party, said that the rules were deliberately crafted with the Public Protector in mind.</s>

en: We are opposed to the recommendations by the panel.
tsn: Re kgatlhanong le dikatlanegiso tse di neetsweeng ke phanele.
mt0: <pad> Re ganne go simolola ka go re re ne re sa itse.</s>

en: This House never had rules on the removal of Chapter 9 leaders.
tsn: Ntlo e ga e ise e nne le melao ka ga tloso ya Kgaolo ya 9 ya baeteledipele.
mt0: <pad> Gone a House has never had rules on the removal of Chapter 9 leaders.</s>

en: These rules were made with the Public Protector in mind, a water-tight method to remove the Public Protector and no one else.
tsn: Melawana e, e dirilwe go akantswe Mosireletsi wa Setšhaba, mokgwa o o masisi wa go tlosa Mosireletsi wa Setšhaba, eseng ope gape.
mt0: <pad> Ditaelo tse di dirilwe ka tsela e e tletseng metsi go tlosa Mošireledi wa Setjhaba, tsela e e tletseng metsi ya go tlosa Mošireledi wa Setjhaba le mongwe fela.</s>

en: Former President Kgalema Motlanthe has described the late Struggle icon Andrew Mlangeni as a dependable and honest person who welcomed all in his midst and in the African National Congress (ANC).
tsn: Moporesitente wa maloba Kgalema Motlanthe o tlhalositse mogaka o o tlhokofetseng Andrew Mlangeni jaaka motho yo o neng a ikemetse le go tshepagala yo o neng a amogela tsotlhe mo boemong jwa gagwe le mo African National Congress (ANC).
mt0: <pad> President Kgalema Motlanthe o tlhalositse Andrew Mlangeni, icon of the Struggle, e le motho yo o tshegetsang ebile o a boammaaruri, yo o amogelang botlhe mo go ene le mo ANC.</s>

en: The ANC is paying tribute to the late Mlangeni at a wreath laying ceremony at his grave, alongside his wife June at the Roodepoort Cemetery.
tsn: Mokgatlho wa ANC o akgola moswi Mlangeni kwa moletlong wa peo ya dikgare kwa lebitleng la gagwe, mmogo le mogatse June kwa dirapeng tsa Roodepoort.
mt0: <pad> ANC e gopola Mlangeni ka go bea setlhare mo lebitleng la gagwe, mmogo le mosadi wa gagwe June, kwa Roodepoort Cemetery.</s>

en: Wreath-laying ceremony in commemoration of Mama June Mlangeni and Isithwalandwe / Seaparankwe Ntate Andrew Mlangeni at the Roodepoort Cemetery.
tsn: Moletlo wa peo ya dikgare mo segopotsong sa ga Mme June Mlangeni le Isithwalandwe/Seaparankwe Ntate Andrew Mlangeni Kwa Dirapeng tsa Roodepoort
mt0: <pad> Go a memorial service for Mama June Mlangeni and Isithwalandwe / Seaparankwe Ntate Andrew Mlangeni at the Roodepoort Cemetery</s>

en: Motlanthe says he is glad to have worked with the late Mlangeni, for he learnt a lot from the family.
tsn: Motlanthe a re o leboga fa a ne a dira le moswi Mlangeni, a re o ithutile go le gontsi go tswa mo lelapeng.
mt0: <pad> Motlanthe says he is glad to have worked with the late Mlangeni, for he learnt a lot from the family.</s>

en: The Mlangeni family attended the ceremony.
tsn: Lelapa la Mlangeni le ne le le teng kwa  moletlong.
mt0: <pad> Mlangeni family attended the ceremony.</s>

en: ANC NEC members Lindiwe Sisulu and Nomvula Mokonyane also attended.
tsn: Maloko a ANC NEC Lindiwe Sisulu le Nomvula Mokonyane le bona ba ne ba le teng.
mt0: <pad> ANC NEC members Lindiwe Sisulu and Nomvula Mokonyane also attended.</s>

en: Wreathe-laying ceremony for June and Andrew Mlangeni.
tsn: Moletlo wa peo ya dikgare wa ga June le Andrew Mlangeni.
mt0: <pad> Go a memorial service for June and Andrew Mlangeni</s>

en: Delivering the keynote address, Motlanthe said: Comrade Andrew Mlangeni was a leader of our struggle who embodied the very core of what the struggle was about.
tsn: Fa a neelana ka puokgolo, Motlanthe o rile: Khomoreiti Andrew Mlangeni e ne e le moeteledipele wa kgaratlho ya rona yo o supileng boteng jo bo tlhalosang gore kgaratlho e ne e le ka ga eng.
mt0: <pad> Go tshameka molaetsa wa gagwe wa botlhokwa, Motlanthe o ne a re: Comrade Andrew Mlangeni e ne e le moeteledipele wa ntwa ya rona yo o neng a tlhaloganya bokao jo bo kwa teng ga ntwa.</s>

en: He was an elder on who’s council one could rely on.
tsn: E ene e le mogolo yo motho a ka tshepelang mo go ene.
mt0: <pad> O ne a le mogolo yo o neng a ka tshegetsa kgakololo ya gagwe.</s>

en: He was truthful, earnest, and dependable.
tsn: O ne a tshepega e bile a ikemetse.
mt0: <pad> O ne a tshepa, a ikamamela, a tshegetsa.</s>

en: He generously gave us his knowledge and skills.
tsn: Ka mosa, o re neetse kitso le bokgoni jwa gagwe.
mt0: <pad> O re neile kitso ya gagwe le bokgoni jwa gagwe ka bopelotshweu.</s>

en: The Democratic Alliance (DA) has described as irrational and obscure a law that strips South Africans of their citizenship.
tsn: Mokgatlho wa Democratic Alliance (DA) o tlhalositse molao o o sa utlwagaleng le go tlhaloganyega o o amogang maAforika Borwa boagi jwa bona.
mt0: <pad> The Democratic Alliance (DA) e tlhalositse molao o o sa tlhaloganyeng le o o sa tlhaloganyong jaaka molao o o kgatlhanyang baagi ba Afrika Borwa go nna baagi ba bone.</s>

en: This follows complaints from citizens based in London who tried to renew their South African citizenship, only to discover that they are no longer South African citizens because they have claimed additional citizenship.
tsn: Se se latela dingongorego go tswa go baagi ba ba nnang kwa London, fa ba leka go ntšhwafatsa boagi jwa bona jwa Aforika Borwa, ba lemoga fa ba sa tlhole e le baagi ba Aforika Borwa ka gonne ba kopile tlaleletso ya boagi.
mt0: <pad> Go latela dikgopolo tsa baagi ba London ba ba lekang go tsosolosa boagi jwa bone jwa Afrika Borwa, mme ba lemoga gore ga ba sa tlhole baagi ba Afrika Borwa ka ntlha ya go re ba batla boagi jo bongwe.</s>

en: This is because, under the current Citizenship Act in South Africa, you have to first apply to the Department of Home Affairs for permission to get another citizenship.
tsn: Se ke ka ntlha ya gore, ka fa tlase ga Molao wa Boagi mo Aforika Borwa wa ga jaana, o tshwanetse go dira kopo kwa Lefapheng la Merero ya Selegae go bona tetla ya go bona boagi jwa naga e nngwe.
mt0: <pad> Ke ka gonne, go ya ka Molao wa Boipuso wa Afrika Borwa, o tshwanetse go simolola go ikwadisetsa kwa Lefapha la Ditaba Tsa Botshelo go bona phemiti ya go nna boipuso jo bongwe.</s>

en: However, DA MP Adrian Roos says the party is opposed to this law and will fight it in the High Court on behalf of thousands of South Africans who have lost their citizenship without their knowledge.
tsn: Le gale, Leloko la palamente la DA Adrian Roos a re lekoko le kgatlhanong le Molao o, mme le tlaa lwantshana le ona kwa  kgotlatshekelong e e kwa godimo mo boemong jwa diketekete tsa MaAforika Borwa a a latlhegetsweng ke boagi kwa ntle ga kitso ya bona.
mt0: <pad> A mme, DA MP Adrian Roos says that the party is opposing this law and will fight it in the High Court on behalf of thousands of South Africans who have lost their citizenship without their knowledge.</s>

en: The DA is challenging this law in court.
tsn: DA e gwetlhana le Molao ono kwa kgotlatshekelo.
mt0: <pad> DA e kgatlhanong le molao o kwa lekgotleng.</s>

en: It is not a particularly rational law seeing as the Department of Home Affairs has previously stated that it has nothing against dual citizenship.
tsn: Ga se molao o o utlwagalang jaaka le Lefapha la Merero ya Selegae le kile la tlhalosa gore ga le kgatlhanong le boagi jwa dinaga tse pedi.
mt0: <pad> Gone a particularly rational law because the Department of Home Affairs has previously stated that it has nothing against dual citizenship.</s>

en: But if that’s your policy, then you must not say you support dual citizenship.
tsn: Fela ke molao wa lona, lo seke lwa re lo tshegetsa boagi jwa dinaga tse pedi.
mt0: <pad> Fa e le molao wa gago, o se ka wa re o tshegetsa boagi jo bobedi.</s>

en: If you look at the interim Constitution, it spoke about the fact that no citizen shall be without justification, and this was changed in the final Constitution.
tsn: Fa o lebelela Molaotheo wa nakwana, o bua ka ntlha ya gore ga go moagi yo a tlaa nnang kwa ntle ga tshegetso ya molao, mme se se fetotswe mo Molaotheong.
mt0: <pad> Fa o lekola Molaotheo wa Ntlha, o bua ka go re ga go motlhanke yo o tla nna ntle le tshedimosetso, mme seo se fetošitswe mo Molaong wa Ntlha.</s>

en: They removed the words without justification to say this right should obsolete that you shouldn’t be deprived of your citizenship.
tsn: Ba tlositse mafoko ntle le go tlhalosa gore tshwanelo eno e tshwanetse e seke ya tsenngwa tirisong gore o seke wa ganelwa ka boagi jwa gago.
mt0: <pad> Ba tlositse mafoko a a sa tlhaloganyesege go re molao o o tshwanetse go kgoreletsa go re o se ka wa nna le boitshepo jwa go nna mmotlana.</s>

en: So the argument of the DA is that if anything, you should have to legitimately and actively renounce your citizenship before you can lose it, says Roos.
tsn: Ka jalo ngangisano ya DA ke gore, le fa go ka nna jang, o tshwanetse go nna le tumelelo ya go ka tlogela boagi jwa gago pele bo ka go latlhegela, go bua  Roos.
mt0: <pad> So the argument of the DA is that if anything, you should have to legitimately and actively renounce your citizenship before you can lose it, says Roos.</s>

en: Below is the full interview with DA MP Adrian Roos.
tsn: Fa tlase, ke ditherisano tse di feleletseng tsa leloko la DA Adrian Roos.
mt0: <pad> Go tswa mo go rona, re tla bo re batla go itse gore o a itse.</s>

en: Deputy President David Mabuza has weighed in regarding the R150 million Digital Vibes scandal allegedly linked to Health Minister Zweli Mkhize.
tsn: Motlatsamoporesitente David Mabuza o ntshitse maikutlo a gagwe ka ga ditatofatso tse di maswe tsa dimilione di le R150 tsa Digital Vibes tse di golaganngwang le Tona ya Boitekanelo, Zweli Mkhize.
mt0: <pad> Deputy President David Mabuza o ne a bua ka kgang ya R150 million Digital Vibes scandal e gongwe e tswang mo go Mme Zweli Mkhize, Health Minister.</s>

en: He was addressing a group of military veterans in Limpopo on Saturday.
tsn: O ne a bua le setlhopha sa baitseanape ba maloba ba sesole kwa Limpopo ka Lamatlhatso.
mt0: <pad> Go a military veterans group in Limpopo on Saturday.</s>

en: The Special Investigative Unit (SIU) is probing allegations that the minister benefited from the money paid to Digital Vibes to do public relations work for the department.
tsn: Yuniti e e kgethegileng ya dipatlisiso (SIU) e sekaseka ditatofatso tsa gore tona o nnile le seabe mo mading a a duetsweng Digital  Vibes go dira le tiro e e amanang le setšhaba ya Lefapha.
mt0: <pad> The Special Investigative Unit (SIU) is investigating allegations that the minister benefited from the money paid to Digital Vibes to do public relations work for the department.</s>

en: The Democratic Alliance (DA) is among those calling for the resignation of Mkhize.
tsn: Mokgatlho wa Democratic Alliance (DA) ke mongwe wa mekgatlho e e e batlang gore Mkhize a role tiro.
mt0: <pad> The Democratic Alliance (DA) is among those calling for the resignation of Mkhize.</s>

en: Mabuza says people should wait for the outcome of the investigation.
tsn: Mabuza a re batho ba tshwanetse go emela dipoelo tsa patlisiso.
mt0: <pad> Mabuza says that people should wait for the outcome of the investigation.</s>

en: Of course if there are allegations they will always disrupt the thinking of government
tsn: Ke nnete gore, fa go na le ditatofatso, ba tlaa thibela dikakanyo tsa puso
mt0: <pad> Gone gone, fa go na le di-accusations, e tla nna ya kgoreletsa go akanya ga batho ba bangwe.</s>

en: But I think we should take from what the President has said that this is being attended to.
tsn: Fela ke akanya gore re tshwanetse go tsaya  se Moporesidente a se buileng gore kgang e e lebeletswe.
mt0: <pad> Ke a re go tswa mo go se Moporesidente o se buileng, re tshwanetse go tsaya go re dilo tse di tla nna le tlhokomelo.</s>

en: Earlier the Special Investigation Units Kaizer Kganyago says they’re still investigating and plan to conclude the probe soon.
tsn: Pejana, Kaizer Kganyago wa Yuniti ya Dipatlisiso tse di Kgethegileng ,o rile ba sa ntse ba batlisisa mme ba ikaeletse go konosetsa patlisiso e ka bonako.
mt0: <pad> Kaizer Kganyago, a Special Investigation Units says they’re still investigating and plan to conclude the probe soon.</s>

en: Deputy President David Mabuza says about R654 million meant to assist military veterans is lying idle in the Department of Defence and is not being used because the department has not been working properly.
tsn: Motlatsamoporesitente David Mabuza a re dimilione di ka nna  R654 tse di tshwanetseng go ka bo di thusa baitseanape ba badiredi ba sesole di sasaila fela mo Lefapheng la Tshireletso mme ga di dirisiwe ka gonne lefapha le ntse le sa dire sentle.
mt0: <pad> Deputy President David Mabuza says that R654 million meant to assist military veterans is lying idle in the Department of Defence and is not being used because the department has not been working properly.</s>

en: Mabuza was addressing a group of military veterans in Limpopo on Saturday.
tsn: Mabuza o ne a bua le setlhopha sa baitseanape ba badiredi ba sesole kwa Limpopo ka Lamatlhatso.
mt0: <pad> Go a military veterans group in Limpopo on Saturday.</s>

en: He has urged military veterans to form one single group instead of fighting one another.
tsn: O kopile baitseanape ba sesole gore ba ipope go nna ngatana e le nngwe go na le gore ba lwantshane ka bo bona.
mt0: <pad> O kgothaletse baemedi ba masole go nna le setlhopha se le sengwe go na le go lwalana.</s>

en: Well, the money has not been used, it lies in the department because there is a number of problems, but the military veterans are complaining.
tsn: Le gale, madi ga a ise a dirisiwe, a dutse kwa lefapheng ka gonne go na le mathata a le mantsinyana, fela baitseanape ba badiredi ba sesole ba a ngongorega.
mt0: <pad> Gone, the money has not been used, it lies in the department because there are several problems, but the veterans of the military are complaining.</s>

en: The biggest problem that we are facing is the verification program which affects the no statutory forces.
tsn: Bothata jo bogolo jo re lebaganeng le jona ke lenaneo la netefatso le le amang thata tlolo molao .
mt0: <pad> Gompieno ntlha ya botlhokwa e re lebana le yone ke go tlhomiwa ga tshedimosetso e e ama batho ba ba sa nang le maatla a molao.</s>

en: Mabuza says he hopes that now that a Director-General of the department has been appointed, military veterans will get the assistance they want.
tsn: Mabuza a re o solofela  gore ka jaanong Mokaedi-Kakaretso wa Lefapha o setse a tlhophilwe, bagaka ba sesole ba tla fitlhela thuso e ba e batlang.
mt0: <pad> Mabuza says he hopes that now that a Director-General of the department has been appointed, military veterans will get the help they want.</s>

en: He has urged military veterans across all the political spectrum to organise themselves and to enable the government to adequately support them.
tsn: O rotloeditse bagaka ba sesole go ralala dikarolo tsotlhe tsa sepolotiki go ipaakanya le go letlelela puso go leka go ba tshegetsa.
mt0: <pad> O kgothaletse baemedi ba masole go simolola go nna le seabe mo dikgotlhong tsotlhe tsa dipolotiki go re ba kgone go ikatisa go dira gore puso e kgone go ba tshegetsa sentle.</s>

en: Military veterans often complain about a lack of decent housing, health services, and jobs.
tsn: Bagaka ba Sesole go le gantsi ngongorega ka ga tlhokego ya matlo, ditirelo tsa boitekanelo tse di nang le seriti, le go tlhola ditiro.
mt0: <pad> Veterans of the military often complain about a lack of decent housing, health services, and jobs.</s>

en: Disunity among veterans.
tsn: Go tlhoka tirisanommogo magareng ga bagaka.
mt0: <pad> Disunity among veterans</s>

en: Mabuza says disunity and groupings among military veterans and ex-combatants are undermining the government’s efforts to address their challenges.
tsn: Mabuza  a re go tlhoka tirisanommogo  le ditlhophatlhophana magareng ga bagaka ba sesole le masole a maloba ke go nyatsa matsapa a puso mo go samaganeng le dikgwetlho tsa bone.
mt0: <pad> Mabuza says disunity and groupings among military veterans and ex-combatants are undermining the government’s efforts to address their challenges.</s>

en: He says military veterans from former liberations parties are also battling with verification of struggle credentials.
tsn: O rile bagaka ba badiredi ba sesole go tswa kwa makokong a tokologo a maloba le bona ba sokola ka go netefatsa dintlha tsa bona tsa boitshupo.
mt0: <pad> O re baeteledipele ba masole ba ditlhopha tsa go lwela puso tse di neng di le teng pele ga jaana ba ntse ba tlhaloganya ditaelo tsa bone tsa go lwa.</s>

en: You must try and organise yourselves, we don’t want these groupings amongst yourselves because we don’t understand why you are fighting amongst yourselves.
tsn: Lo tshwanetse go leka le go ipaakanya ka bolona, ga re batle ditlhophatlhophana tseno magareng ga lona ka ntlha ya gore ga re tlhaloganye gore goreng lo lwa ka bolona.
mt0: <pad> O tshwanetse go leka go nna le setlhopha, re sa batle ditlhopha tse mo gare ga lona ka gobane re sa tlhaloganye gore ke eng fa lo lwa le lona.</s>

en: You are a community that is getting smaller and smaller, you are a community that is aging so why would old people fight among themselves, MKVA, and the military council you must go and solve your issues with immediate effect.
tsn: Lo setšhaba se se nnang se fokotsega gannyane le gannyane, le setšhaba se se tsofalang jaanong goreng batsofe ba ka batla go lwantshana ka bo bona, MKVA, le Khansele ya sesole tsamayang  go rarabolola mathata a lona ka bonako.
mt0: <pad> O phuthego e e fokotsegileng, o phuthego e e tsofala, ka jalo ke eng fa batho ba ba godileng ba lwalana? MKVA, le lekgotla la masole a tshwanetse go ya go rerang mathata a lona ka bonako.</s>

en: It’s not good for this community.
tsn: Se ga se a siamela setšhaba se.
mt0: <pad> It's not good for this community.</s>

en: Mabuza interacts with veterans from the South African Defence Force, Mkhonto we Sizwe, Azanian People’s Liberation Army, and the Venda Defence Force in Polokwane, Limpopo.
tsn: Mabuza o buisana le bagaka go tswa kwa South African Defence Force, Mkhonto we Sizwe, Azanian People Liberation Army le  Venda Defence Force kwa Polokwane, Limpopo.
mt0: <pad> Mabuza interacts with veterans from the South African Defence Force, Mkhonto we Sizwe, Azanian People’s Liberation Army, and the Venda Defence Force in Polokwane, Limpopo.</s>

en: Deputy President David Mabuza engaged with veterans from the South African Defence Force, Mkhonto we Sizwe, Azanian People’s Liberation Army and the Venda Defence Force.
tsn: Motlatsamoporesitente David Mabuza o tlotla le South African Defence Force, Mkhonto we Sizwe, Azanian People Liberation Army le  Venda Defence Force.
mt0: <pad> Deputy President David Mabuza engaged with veterans from the South African Defence Force, Mkhonto we Sizwe, Azanian People’s Liberation Army and the Venda Defence Force.</s>

en: Although they are still disgruntled, veterans believe there is now a glimmer of hope.
tsn: Le fa ba ne ba sa itumela, bagaka ba dumela gore go na le kganya ya tshepo.
mt0: <pad> Fa e le gore ba santse ba galefile, batseta ba tshela ba re go na le kgonagalo ya tsholofelo.</s>

en: I am from Azania MVA, hopefully, our problems will be attended to once the partnership can be forged between us and the national government.
tsn: Ke tswa kwa Azania MVA, ka tsholofelo, mathata a rona a tlaa rarabololwa, fa fela go ka nna le tirisanommogo magareng ga rona le puso ya bosetšhaba.
mt0: <pad> Ke tswa kwa Azania MVA, ka tshepo, mathata a rona a tla nna a re tlhatlhobelwa fa go kgonega go dira tirisano-mmogo magareng ga rona le puso ya naga.</s>

en: MK National Councils Emmanuel Maake says, We have had all the sorts of problems including health, housing, pensions & school fees for children, we are basically struggling.
tsn: Emmanuel Maake wa khansele ya bosetšhaba ya MK  a re, re  nnile le mathata a mefuta yotlhe go akaretsa le boitekanelo, matlo, diphenšene le dituelo tsa bana ba sekolo, re na le mathata a mantsi tota.
mt0: <pad> MK National Councils Emmanuel Maake says, We have had all the sorts of problems including health, housing, pensions & school fees for children, we are basically struggling.</s>

en: Some military veterans were not happy that they were denied entry to the venue where Mabuza was addressing them.
tsn: Bagaka ba Sesole ba bangwe ba ne ba sa itumelela gore ba ne ba ganelwa go tsena kwa lefelong le Mabuza o neng a ba ema ka lefoko kwa go lona.
mt0: <pad> Ba bangwe ba masole a ntwa ba ne ba sa itumelelwe ke go re ba ne ba ganetswe go tsena mo lefelong la Mabuza a neng a bua le bone.</s>

en: They were not on the list of those who were expected to enter the rugby stadium.
tsn: Ba ne ba se mo lenaaneng la ba ba neng ba tshwanetse go tsena kwa lebaleng la metshameko la Rakabi.
mt0: <pad> Ba ne ba sa nna mo lethathamong la bao ba neng ba letetswe go tsena mo rugby stadium.</s>

en: The Inkatha Freedom Party (IFP) led by Nquthu Municipality in northern KwaZulu-Natal is taking the provincial Cooperative Governance Department to court for placing it under administration.
tsn: Lekoko la Inkatha Freedom Party (IFP) le eteletswe pele ke Mmasepala wa Nquthu kwa Bokone jwa kgaolo ya KwaZulu-Natal le isa Lefapha la Taolo ya Kopanelo ya porofense kwa kgotlatshekelo ka ntlha ya fa le tsentswe ka fa tlase ga tsamaiso.
mt0: <pad> The Inkatha Freedom Party (IFP) led by Nquthu Municipality in northern KwaZulu-Natal is taking the provincial Cooperative Governance Department to court for putting it under administration.</s>

en: The decision was announced by COGTA MEC, Sipho Hlomuka on Thursday.
tsn: Tshwetso e, e dirilwe ke MEC wa COGTA, Sipho hlomuka ka Labone.
mt0: <pad> Gone a decision by COGTA MEC, Sipho Hlomuka on Thursday.</s>

en: He cited a recent audit outcome and a high court ruling that the appointment of certain acting senior managers was irregular.
tsn: O ne a nopola dipolelo tsa boruni tsa ga jaana le dikatlholo tsa  kgotlatshekelo e e kwa godimo tsa gore go tlhomiwa ga batsamaisi ba bangwe ba bagolo ba nama o sa tshwere go ne go  sa tlhomama.
mt0: <pad> O ne a simolola ka go supa diphetho tsa tshekatsheko ya morago ga jaana le molao wa lekgotla wa boemo jo bo kwa godimo thata go re go tlhomamisega ga batlhanke ba bangwe ba bagolo ba ntseng ba direla e ne e se molaong.</s>

en: The Nquthu council has argued that the MEC has no basis to place the municipality under administration.
tsn: Khansele ya Nquthu e boletse gore MEC one a sena dithata tsa go baya mmasepala ka fa tlase ga tsamaiso.
mt0: <pad> Nquthu council e tlhalositse go re MEC ga e na mabaka a go tsenya municipality under administration.</s>

en: The decision to challenge Hlomuka’s action was taken during a council meeting on Thursday, a day after the provincial Cooperative Governance Department announced that it is placing the municipality under administration.
tsn: Tshwetso ya go gwetlha dikgato tsa  ga Hlomuka e tserwe ka nako ya kopano ya Khansele ka Labone, letsatsi morago ga porofense ya Lefapha la Taolo ya Kopanelo e dira kitsiso ya go baya mmasepala ka fa tlase ga tsamaiso.
mt0: <pad> Go simolola go nna le kgotlhang ka ditiro tsa ga Hlomuka go ne go dirilwe ka nako ya kopano ya lekgotla ka Laboraro, letsatsi morago ga go re thepa ya puso e be e tsewa ke baagisani.</s>

en: In February, the provincial government placed the municipality under administration.
tsn: Ka Tlhakole, puso ya porofense e ne ya baya mmasepala ka fa tlase ga tsamaiso.
mt0: <pad> Fa o sa itse, o ka re o ne a sa itse.</s>

en: But the decision was overturned by the National Minister of Co-operative Governance Dr. Nkosazana Dlamini-Zuma.
tsn: Mme tshwetso e ne ya busediwa morago ke Tona ya Bosetšhaba ya puso, ngaka Nkosazana Dlamini-Zuma.......
mt0: <pad> Gone a decision by the National Minister of Co-operative Governance Dr. Nkosazana Dlamini-Zuma.</s>

en: She argued that there was no substantial reason to place the municipality under administration.
tsn: O boletse gore go ne go sena  lebaka le le utlwalang la go baya mmasepala ka fa tlase ga tsamaiso.
mt0: <pad> O rile ga go na lebaka la botlhokwa la go tsenya motsemogolo wa mmotlana ka fa tlase ga taolo ya baagi.</s>

en: I think this intervention is not genuine, but a political ploy by MEC because in March Dr. Nkosazana Dlamini Zuma turned down an earlier decision by COGTA in the province to place the municipality under administration.
tsn: Ke akanya gore tsereganyo eno ga e se boammaaruri, mme ke leano la la ga MEC ka gonne ka kgwedi ya Mopitlwe Ngaka Nkosazana Dlamini Zuma  o ganetsane le tshwetso ya COGTA mo porofenseng ya go baya mmasepala ka fa tlase ga tsamaiso.
mt0: <pad> Ke akanya fa tshohanyetso eno ga e boammaaruri, mme ke tsela ya go batla go nna le kgotlelelo ya dipolotiki ka MEC ka jaana ka Mopitlwe Dr. Nkosazana Dlamini Zuma o ne a ganela go re COGTA e be e tsenye municipality under administration.</s>

en: Dlamini- Zuma instead recommended that the provincial government intervene with Section 139 1A which means they could monitor, guide, and assist the municipality.
tsn: Dlamini- Zuma, ka jalo o gakolotse gore puso ya porofense e ikamanye le Karolo 139 1A e e kayang gore ba ka baya leitlho, ba kaela, le go thusa mmasepala.
mt0: <pad> Dlamini-Zuma o ne a kgothaletsa go re mmuso wa naga o tsenye mo karolong ya 139 1A e leng go re ba ka kgona go tlhokomela, go tlhagisa, le go thusa mmusiamo.</s>

en: But Cogta in KZN did not do that.
tsn: Fela  COGTA  ya kwa KZN ga ya dira  jalo.
mt0: <pad> But Cogta in KZN did not do that.</s>

en: Yes, we did get a disclaimer audit outcome, but the reasons for that, the previous senior managers, when they left they deliberately took with them crucial information which was required for auditing purposes, says Mayor Lindokuhle Shabalala.
tsn: Ee, re fitlhetse dipoelo tsa boruni tsa go sa dire kopotuelo, fela mabaka a seo, batsamaisi ba ba fetileng, fa ba ka tsamaya ba tsamaile le tshedimosetso e e botlhokwa le bona e e neng e tlhokega mo maikaelelong a go runa, ga bua Lindokuhle Shabalala.
mt0: <pad> No, we did get a disclaimer audit outcome, but the reasons for that, the previous senior managers, when they left they deliberately took with them crucial information which was required for auditing purposes, says mayor Lindokuhle Shabalala.</s>

en: Nquthu municipality threatens to take COGTA to court
tsn: Mmasepala wa Nquthu o dira matshosetsi a go isa COGTA kwa kgotlatshekelo
mt0: <pad> Nquthu municipality threatens to take COGTA to court</s>

en: The IFP in KwaZulu-Natal has accused Hlomuka of helping the African National Congress (ANC) to run the municipality through the back door by placing it under administration.
tsn: IFP  ya kwa KwaZulu-Natal e latofaditse Hlomuka ka go thusana le African National Congress (ANC) go tsamaisa mmasepala ka tsela e e sa siamang, ka go e tsenya ka fa tlase ga tsamaiso.
mt0: <pad> The IFP in KwaZulu-Natal has accused Hlomuka of helping the African National Congress (ANC) run the municipality through the back door by putting it under administration.</s>

en: Provincial party chairperson, Thamsanqa Ntuli says the ANC is hell-bent on running the Nquthu Municipality even though they lost elections in the area.
tsn: Modulasetulo wa Lekoko la Porofense, Thamsanqa Ntuli o rile ANC e batla go tsamaisa Mmasepala wa Nquthu le fa ba latlhegetswe ke ditlhopho mo lefelong leo.
mt0: <pad> O a re ANC e tla tswelela go laola Nquthu Municipality le fa ba ne ba fenya dikgetho kwa motseng wa bone.</s>

en: We are all quite aware that the IFP and the ANC are working well in the City of Johannesburg but here in KZN it’s a different story.
tsn: Rotlhe re itse gore sentle gore IFP le ANC ba dira sentle mo Toropong ya Johannesburg fela  mo KZN ke kgang e e farologaneng.
mt0: <pad> Re itse go re IFP le ANC di dirisana sentle kwa Johannesburg, mme kwa KZN ke kgang e e farologaneng.</s>

en: Hence you see the agenda against all our municipalities in the province of KZN.
tsn: Ke ka foo o bonang lenaanetema le le kgatlhanong  le bommasepala ba rona botlhe mo porofenseng ya KZN.
mt0: <pad> Gone gone, you see the agenda against all our municipalities in the province of KZN.</s>

en: We are quite very concerned with the behaviour of COGTA and MEC for COGTA who actually is allowing the narrow agenda of ANC councillors in Nquthu to be guiding the activities of COGTA, it’s quite very unfortunate.
tsn: Re tshwenyegile thata ka maitshwaro a COGTA le Mokhuduthamaga wa COGTA  yo a letlelelang lenaanetema la bakhansela ba ANC  mo Nquthu go kaela ditiro tsa COGTA, se se swabisa thata.
mt0: <pad> Re tshwenngwa thata ke boitshwaro jwa COGTA le MEC ya COGTA yo o letlang go re agenda e nnye ya ANC councillors kwa Nquthu e laole ditiro tsa COGTA, ruri go maswabi tota.</s>

en: The IFP is also unhappy with the ANC after it named one of its regional structures in the far north of the province after its late freedom fighter, Nobleman Mzala Nxumalo.
tsn: IFP e swabisitse gape ke ANC morago ga go neela leina la nngwe ya ditheo tsa kgaolo mo porofenseng go ya kwa bokone, leina la molwela kgololesego, moswi Nobleman Mzala Nxumalo.
mt0: <pad> The IFP is also unhappy with the ANC after it named one of its regional structures in the far north of the province after its late freedom fighter, Nobleman Mzala Nxumalo.</s>

en: It also says the move would regress reconciliatory talks between the two parties spearheaded by leaders of both parties at the national level.
tsn: E rile, kgato e, e tlaa busetsa kwa morago dipuisano tsa itshwarelano magareng ga makoko a mabedi a a neng a bolotswa ke baeteledipele ba makoko a ka bobedi kwa maemong a bosetšhaba.
mt0: <pad> O o bontsha go re tshebediso e e tla kgoreletsa ditherisano tsa kagiso magareng ga ditlhopha tse pedi tse di dirilweng ke baeteledipele ba ditlhopha tse pedi mo maemo a a kwa godimo a naga.</s>

en: Deputy President David Mabuza has assured military veterans that government does not have hard cash to give to military veterans but has money to take care of their social and health needs.
tsn: Motlatsamoporesitente David Mabuza o netefaditse bagaka ba sesole gore puso ga e na madi  mo seatleng go neela bagaka ba Sesole fela puso e na le madi a go tlhokomela ditlhokego  tsa bona tsa loago le ditlhokego tsa boitekanelo.
mt0: <pad> Deputy President David Mabuza o solofeditse batlhanke ba masole a ntwa go re puso ga e na madi a a botlhokwa go neela batlhanke ba masole a ntwa mme e na le madi a go tlhokomela ditlhoko tsa bone tsa sechaba le tsa botsogo.</s>

en: He says the problem was with the Department of Defence and Military Veterans which lacked direction to attend to their plight.
tsn: A re bothata bo ne bo na le Lefapha la Tshireletso le Bagaka ba Sesole, ka go tlhoka tsamaiso ya go tshwaragana le mathata a bona.
mt0: <pad> O re phoso e ne e le ka Lefapha la Tshireletso le Ba-Ba-Masole ba Ntwa, le sa tseye taolo go tlhokomela mathata a bone.</s>

en: Addressing a group of military veterans, Mabuza says things will start to work out properly because a director-general of the department has been appointed.
tsn: Fa a ne a ema setlhopha sa bagaka ba sesole ka lefoko, Mabuza o rile dilo di tlaa simolola go tsamaya sentle ka gonne go tlhophilwe Mokaedi-Kakaretso wa Lefapha.
mt0: <pad> Go tswa kwa go setlhopha sa batlhanke ba masole, Mabuza says that things will start to work out properly because a director-general of the department has been appointed.</s>

en: We proceed with Provincial interactions with Military Veterans.
tsn: Re sa ntse re tswelela ka dipuisano tsa porofense le bagaka ba Sesole.
mt0: <pad> Re tswelela ka go rerang dipuisano tsa rona le baemedi ba masole a ntwa.</s>

en: Today we are in Limpopo at the Polokwane Rugby Stadium and warmly welcomed by Premier Stanley Mathabatha.
tsn: Gompieno re mo Limpopo kwa lebaleng la Rakabi la Polokwane mme re amogetswe ka diatla tse di bothito ke Tonakgolo, Stanley Mathabatha.
mt0: <pad> Gompieno re mo Limpopo kwa Polokwane Rugby Stadium mme re amogetswe sentle ke Moporesidente Stanley Mathabatha.</s>

en: He also urged military veterans to form one group instead of fighting one another.
tsn: O kopile bagaka ba masole go ipopa ba nne ngatana e le nngwe go na le gore ba lwe ka bo bona.
mt0: <pad> O ne a kgothaletsa baemedi ba masole go bopa setlhopha se le sengwe go na le go lwantshana.</s>

en: We are still going to fix the Department of Military Veterans.
tsn: Re sa ntse re tlile go baakanya Lefapha la Bagaka ba Sesole.
mt0: <pad> Gone gone, we're still going to fix the Department of Military Veterans.</s>

en: I can tell you that the Director-General [Irene Mpolweni] in the department has been appointed.
tsn: Nka go bolelela gore Mokaedi-Kakaretso [Irene Mpolweni] mo Lefapheng le o setse a tlhophilwe.
mt0: <pad> Ke a go botša gore Direkgotla-Mokgatlho [Irene Mpolweni] wa lekala o tlhomilwe.</s>

en: She is going to start to work on the 7th of June.
tsn: O tlile go simolola tiro ka di 7 tsa Seetebosigo.
mt0: <pad> She's going to start work on the 7th of June.</s>

en: So things will start to converge.
tsn: Jaanong dilo di tlaa simolola go tshwaragana.
mt0: <pad> Gone gone, things will start to converge.</s>

en: Secondly, the Presidency has requested the offices of the Premiers to collaborate in this work, says Mabuza.
tsn: Sa bobedi, Moporesidente o kopile Dikantoro tsa Botonakgolo go dirisana mmogo mo tirong eno, go bua Mabuza.
mt0: <pad> Gone further, the Presidency has requested the offices of the Premiers to collaborate in this work, Mabuza said.</s>

en: Deputy President speak to the media about the discussion held with the military veterans.
tsn: Motlatsa Poresidente o bua le bobegakgang ka ga puisano e e neng e tshwerwe le bagaka ba sesole.
mt0: <pad> Deputy President a bua le baphatlalatsi ka dipuisano tsa gagwe ka go re o ne a bua le batlhanke ba masole a ntwa.</s>

en: Deputy President David Mabuza has urged military veterans across the political divide, to organise themselves in one group for government to adequately support them.
tsn: Motlatsa Moporesitente David Mabuza o rotloeditse bagaka ba Sesole go ralala karoganyo ya sepolotiki, go ipopa go nna ngatana le nngwe gore puso e kgone go ba neela  tshegetso e e lekaneng.
mt0: <pad> Gone a few days ago, Deputy President David Mabuza urged military veterans across the political divide, to organise themselves in one group for government to adequately support them.</s>

en: Military veterans often complain that they are not getting housing, health services and other things from government equally.
tsn: Go le gantsi, Bagaka ba Sesole ba ngongorega ka gore ga ba na matlo, ditirelo tsa boitekanelo le dilo tse dingwe go tswa kwa pusong.
mt0: <pad> Veterans of the military often complain that they are not getting equally housing, health services and other things from the government.</s>

en: In the video below the SABC speaks to a member of the then Venda Defence Force:
tsn: Mo kgatisong e e fa tlase, SABC e bua le leloko la maloba la Venda Defence Force:
mt0: <pad> Gone Venda Defence Force</s>

en: Addressing a group of military veterans in Limpopo from the old South African Defence Force (SADF), Venda Defence Force (VDF).
tsn: Puo le setlhopha sa badiredi ba sesole kwa Limpopo go tswa kwa South African Defence Force (SADF) ya kgale, Venda Defence Force (VDF).
mt0: <pad> Go a group of military veterans in Limpopo from the old South African Defence Force (SADF), Venda Defence Force (VDF) and the Venda Defence Force (VDF).</s>

en: Mabuza says the government is worried that military veterans fight amongst themselves.
tsn: Mabuza a re puso e tshwentswe ke gore badiredi ba sesole ba lwana ka bobona.
mt0: <pad> Mabuza says the government is worried that military veterans fight amongst themselves.</s>

en: He says military veterans from former liberations parties are still battling with verifications to check who was in the trenches whereas the situation of others from the SADF and VDF is better.
tsn: A re badiredi ba sesole go tswa go makoko a maloba ba santse ba sokololwa ka netefatso go lebelela gore ke bomang ba ba neng ba le mo ditsamaisong fa maemo a ba bangwe mo SADF le VDF a le botoka.
mt0: <pad> O re ba nnile le masole a a ileng a lwalwa mo dintweng tsa go tlhabolola naga, ba santse ba tshwanetse go tlhomamisa gore ke mang yo o ne a le mo ditlhoeng, fa ba bangwe ba SADF le VDF ba ntse ba tshegetsa ditshekatsheko go bona gore ke mang yo o ne a le mo ditlhoeng.</s>

en: You are a community that is getting smaller and smaller.
tsn: Lo setšhaba se se ntseng se tswelela se nna sennye.
mt0: <pad> O motsemogolo o o fokotsegileng thata le go feta.</s>

en: You are a community that is ageing.
tsn: Lo setšhaba se se tsofalang.
mt0: <pad> O phuthego e e godileng.</s>

en: So why would old people fight among themselves?
tsn: Ka jalo ke goreng batho ba bagolo ba ka lwa ka bo bona?
mt0: <pad> Ke ka ntlha yang fa batho ba ba godileng ba lwa le bone?</s>

en: MKVA and military council you must go and solve your issues with immediate effect.
tsn: MKVA le khansele ya  sesole, lo tshwanetse go tsamaya lo ye go rarabolola mathata a lona ka bonako.
mt0: <pad> Fa o sa kgone go fetola seele, re: "Fa o sa itse MKVA le military council, o tshwanetse go ya go rarabolola mathata a gago ka bonako."</s>

en: It is not good for this community, adds Mabuza.
tsn: Se ga se a tshwanela setšhaba se, ga tlaleletsa Mabuza.
mt0: <pad> It's not good for this community, adds Mabuza.</s>

en: The SABC speaks to the MKVA’s Limpopo Secretary Lulamile Jack.
tsn: SABC e bua le Mokwaledi wa MKVA wa Limpopo Lulamile Jack.
mt0: <pad> SABC talks to MKVA's Limpopo Secretary Lulamile Jack</s>

en: The KwaZulu-Natal Department of Cooperative Governance and Traditional Affairs (COGTA) has directed the Speaker of the Inkosi Langalibalele Local Municipality to investigate allegations of assault that have been levelled against a councillor.
tsn: Lefapha la Pusotshwaraganelo le Merero ya Setso (COGTA) kwa KwaZulu-Natal le laetse sebui sa Mmasepala wa selegae wa Inkosi Langalibalele go batlisisa ditatofatso tsa tlhaselo kgatlhanong le mokhanselara.
mt0: <pad> KwaZulu-Natal Department of Cooperative Governance and Traditional Affairs (COGTA) e laetse Speaker of the Inkosi Langalibalele Local Municipality go tlhotlhomisa dikgopolo tsa tlhaselo tse di kgobokantsweng ka motlhanke wa lekgotla.</s>

en: It’s alleged that an IFP councillor assaulted two women ANC councillors.
tsn: Go umakiwa fa mokhanselara wa IFP a iteile basadi ba babedi ba makhaselara ba ANC.
mt0: <pad> Go bolelwa fa mongwe wa baemedi ba IFP o tlhasela batlhanke ANC ba basadi ba le bobedi.</s>

en: KZN COGTA spokesperson Senzo Mzila says, The KwaZulu-Natal Cooperative Governance and Traditional Affairs MEC Sipho Hlomuka has expressed his concern at the allegation that have risen in the Inkosi Langalibalele Local Municipality.
tsn: Mmueledi wa KZN wa COGTA, Senzo Mzila a re, MEC ya Pusotshwaraganelo le Merero ya Setso ya KwaZulu-Natal, Sipho Hlomuka o bontshitse tlhobaelo ka ditatofatso tse di tlhalositsweng kwa mmasepala wa selegae Inkosi Langalibalele
mt0: <pad> KwaZulu-Natal Cooperative Governance and Traditional Affairs MEC Sipho Hlomuka has expressed his concern at the allegation that have risen in the Inkosi Langalibalele Local Municipality.</s>

en: The allegations are that one of the councillors was assaulted by another councillor.
tsn: Ditatofatso tse di reng mongwe wa bakhanselara o iteile Mokhanselara yo mongwe.
mt0: <pad> Go a bolelwa fa mongwe wa baemedi ba lekgotla o ne a tlhasela ke mongwe wa baemedi ba lekgotla.</s>

en: MEC Hlomuka has called upon the Speaker of the municipality to investigate the circumstances surrounding this incident and to provide him with a comprehensive report on this matter, adds Mzila.
tsn: MEC, Hlomuka o kopile Sebui sa Mmasepala go batlisisa mabaka a a bakileng tiragalo e le go mo neela pegelo e e tletseng ka ga ntlha e, go tlaleletsa Mzila.
mt0: <pad> MEC Hlomuka o ne a laela Speaker wa municipality go batlisisa dikgopolo tse di bakileng tiragalo eno mme a mo fa dipego tse di tlhamaletseng ka kgang eno, Mzila added.</s>

en: Deputy President David Mabuza in his capacity as the chairperson of the Presidential Task Team on Military Veterans is expected to interact with military veterans at Polokwane in Limpopo.
tsn: Motlatsamoporesitente David Mabuza ka maemo a gagwe jaaka  Modulasetulo wa Setlhopha sa  Tirelo ya Poresitente mo badireding ba Sesole o solofelwa go dirisana le badiredi ba sesole kwa Polokwane, Limpopo.
mt0: <pad> Deputy President David Mabuza, ka boemo jwa gagwe jaaka modulasetulo wa Presidential Task Team on Military Veterans, o letetswe go buisana le baemedi ba masole a ntwa kwa Polokwane kwa Limpopo.</s>

en: He is to assess progress achieved by the provincial government in addressing challenges faced by military veterans.
tsn: O tlaa sekaseka tswelelopele e e bonweng ke puso ya porofense ka go samagana le dikgwetlho tse di lebaganeng le badiredi ba sesole.
mt0: <pad> O tla simolola ka go tlhatlhoba dikgakologo tse di dirilweng ke mmuso wa puso ya bokone go re ba tshegetsa mathata a a tlhokang batseta ba masole a ntwa.</s>

en: For years, military veterans from both former liberation political parties and the then Transkei, Bophuthatswana, Venda and Ciskei (TBVC states), have been complaining that government is not doing enough to take care of their livelihood.
tsn: Mo dingwageng tse di fetileng, Bagaka ba Sesole go tswa kwa makokong a sepolotiki le a Transkei, Bophuthatswana, Venda le Ciskei (dinaga tsa TBVC), ba ntse ba ngongorega gore puso ga e dire ka mo go lekaneng go tlhokomela matshelo a bona.
mt0: <pad> Fa o sa itse, o ka re o ne a sa itse</s>

en: Amongst other things the task team led by Deputy President Mabuza identified, is the need for social distress relief, providing educational assistance, decent housing and land for military veterans.
tsn: Gareng ga tse dingwe tse di lemogilweng ke setlhopha sa tirelo se se eteletsweng pele ke Motlatsamoporesitente Mabuza, ke tlhokego ya namolo ya tlalelo ya loago, go neela thuso ya thuto, kago ya matlo a a nang le seriti le lefatshe go Bagaka ba Sesole.
mt0: <pad> Dingwe tsa dilo tse di tlhagisang tse batlhopha ba dirang ka tsone, ke go re go tlhokafaletswe go fokotsa mathata a setšhaba, go fa ditirelo tsa thuto, matlo a a siameng le matlo a a siametseng batlhanke ba masole.</s>

en: In a statement from the Presidency, the Task Team continues to receive reports on progress achieved by different departments, to come up with a legislative framework to help military veterans.
tsn: Mo setatamenteng se se tswang kwa kantorong ya Moporesidente, Setlhopha sa Tirelo se tswelela go amogela dipegelo tsa tswelelopele e e fitlheletsweng ke mafapha a a farologaneng, go tla ka letlhomeso la peomolao go thusa badiredi ba sesole.
mt0: <pad> Go ya ka se tswang mo go boipuso, lephata la ditlhopha le tswela pele go amega ka dipego tsa dikgwebo tse di farologaneng, go dira molao wa molao wa go thusa baemedi ba masole a ntwa.</s>

en: Speculation is mounting that President Cyril Ramaphosa is looking for a new Health Minister amid reports that Zweli Mkhize may be preparing to resign.
tsn: Go diphopholetso tse di oketsegang tsa gore Moporesitente Cyril Ramaphosa o batlana le Tona ya Boitekanelo e ntšhwa, fa go na le dipego tsa gore Zweli Mkhize a ka tswa a ipaakanyetsa go rola tiro.
mt0: <pad> Tshidiso e a tlhagelela go re Moporesidente Cyril Ramaphosa o batla Mmesa wa Botlhokwatlhoko yo moswa fa ditaba di bega gore Zweli Mkhize o ka tswa a ipaakanyetsa go reetsa.</s>

en: Mkhize has been accused of conflict of interest regarding a R150 million tender that his department awarded to communications company Digital Vibes.
tsn: Mkhize o latofaditswe ka kgotlhang ya kgatlhego e e mabapi le thendara ya dimilione di ka nna R150 e lefapha la gagwe le e neetseng setlamo sa Digital Vibes.
mt0: <pad> Mkhize o latofadiwa ka go re o na le dikamano tsa maikutlo mabapi le R150 million tender e a neng a e neile kwa kompone ya dipuisano Digital Vibes.</s>

en: The Special Investigating Unit (SIU) is probing the irregular tender that was for work related to the National Health Insurance (NHI) scheme and governments response to the coronavirus pandemic.
tsn: Yuniti ya Dipatlisiso tse di Kgethegileng (SIU) e tlhatlhobana le thendara e e sa tlhomamang e e neng e amana le inšorense ya boitekanelo ba bosetšhaba (NHI) le mebuso ya go tsibogela leroborobo la khorona.
mt0: <pad> The Special Investigating Unit (SIU) is investigating the irregular tender that was for work related to the National Health Insurance (NHI) scheme and governments response to the coronavirus pandemic.</s>

en: Mkhize failed to appear before Parliaments Portfolio Committee on Health on Friday following legal advice.
tsn: Mkhize o reteletswe ke go tlhagelela fa pele ga Komiti ya Photefolio ya Palamente ya Pholo ka Labotlhano go latela kgakololo ya semolao.
mt0: <pad> Mkhize o ne a gana go tsena fa pele ga Komiti ya Botlhokwa ya Palamente ya Botlhokwa ya Matsogo ka Labobedi morago ga tshedimosetso ya molao.</s>

en: Chairperson of the Committee Dr Sibongiseni Dhlomo says, I had a telephonic discussion with Dr Mkhize last night (Thursday).
tsn: Modulasetulo wa Komiti Ngk. Sibongiseni Dhlomo a re, ke nnile le dipuisano tsa mo mogaleng le Ngk. Mkhize maabane bosigo (Labone).
mt0: <pad> Chairman of the Committee Dr Sibongiseni Dhlomo says, I had a phone conversation with Dr Mkhize last night (Thursday).</s>

en: I got to hear that he had been given a legal opinion.
tsn: Ke foo ke utlwileng teng gore o neetswe dikakanyo tsa semolao
mt0: <pad> Gone that I heard that he had been given a legal opinion.</s>

en: It is not advisable just for now for him to join the Portfolio Committee because of allegations that actually put his name into the picture.
tsn: Ga e se kakanyo e ntle ga jaana gore a ka nna leloko la Komiti ya Photefolio ka ntlha ya ditatofatso tse di bayang leina la gagwe mo setshwantshong.
mt0: <pad> Go ntse jalo, ga go tlhaloganye gore a tsene mo Komiting ya Portfolio ka jaana ka ntlha ya di-accusations that actually put his name into the picture.</s>

en: So, then it is fair legally for him not to come in to explain.
tsn: Ka jalo, go mo molaong gore a seke a tla go itlhalosa.
mt0: <pad> Fa o sa kgone go fetola seele, o re o sa itse.</s>

en: Mkhize not appearing before Committee puts more clouds over his head
tsn: Go se tlhagelele ga ga Mkhize fa pele ga Komiti go dira gore a lebelelwe.
mt0: <pad> Mkhize's failure to appear before the Committee puts more clouds over him.</s>

en: Meanwhile, political analyst Dr Dale McKinley says Mkhize not appearing before the Health Portfolio Committee just puts more clouds over his head and that more people are going to ask questions around his involvement in the Digital Vibes tender.
tsn: Re sa le foo, mosekaseki wa tsa polotiki Ngk. Dale McKinley a re go se tlhagelele ga ga Mkhize fa pele ga Komiti ya Photefolio ya Pholo go mo thatafaletsa dilo mme batho ba le bantsi ba tlile go botsa dipotso mabapi le go nna le seabe mo thendareng ya Digital Vibes.
mt0: <pad> Mme a re ka nako eo, Dr Dale McKinley, analyst ya dipolotiki, o re Mkhize's absence from the Health Portfolio Committee just puts more clouds over his head and that more people are going to ask questions about his involvement in the Digital Vibes tender.</s>

en: McKinley says the ANC must encourage Mkhize to resign as a matter of principle.
tsn: McKinely a re ANC e tshwanetse go rotloetsa Mkhize go rola tiro ka ntlha ya molao.
mt0: <pad> McKinley says the ANC must encourage Mkhize to resign as a matter of principle.</s>

en: Dr Dale McKinely speaks on Mkhize not appearing before the Committee.
tsn: Ngk Dale McKinley o bua ka kgang ya go se tlhagelele ga ga Mkhize fa pele ga komiti.
mt0: <pad> Dr Dale McKinely speaks on Mkhize not appearing before the Committee.</s>

en: The Gauteng Health Department says the corruption allegations against Health Minister Dr Zweli Mkhize are a huge blow to the country’s fight against the coronavirus pandemic.
tsn: Lefapha la Boitekanelo la Gauteng la re ditatofatso tsa tlolomolao kgatlhanong le Tona ya Boitekanelo Ngk. Zweli Mkhize ke selo se segolo  mo nageng e e lwantshanang le  leroborobo la Corona.
mt0: <pad> Gauteng Health Department says the allegations of corruption against Health Minister Dr Zweli Mkhize are a big blow to the country’s fight against the coronavirus pandemic.</s>

en: The allegations related to his departments awarding of a R150-million contract to communications company Digital Vibes.
tsn: Ditatofatso tse di amanang le mafapha a gagwe a a amogetseng kontaraka ya dimilione di le 150 go setlamo sa ditlhaeletsano Digital Vibes.
mt0: <pad> Ditsholofetso di amana le go fa ditirelo tsa gagwe R150 million contract to the communication company Digital Vibes.</s>

en: Mkhize’s former aides control the company which got the contract to do work related to the National Health Insurance scheme and governments response to the pandemic.
tsn: Bathusi ba maloba ba ga Mkhizes ba laola setlamo se se fitlhetseng konteraka ya go dira tiro e e amanang le sekema sa Inšorense ya Pholo ya Bosetšhaba le ditsiboso tsa mebuso ka ga Corona
