mt0: <pad> Mkhize's former aides control the company that got the contract to do work related to the National Health Insurance Scheme and government's response to the pandemic.</s>

en: The Special Investigative Unit is probing the matter.
tsn: Ditlhotlhomiso tse di Kgethegileng di batlisisa kgang e.
mt0: <pad> The Special Investigative Unit is investigating the matter.</s>

en: Last month Mkhize admitted that the deal was irregular and said disciplinary action would be taken against those responsible.
tsn: Mo kgweding e e fetileng Mkhize o dumetse gore morero o ne o sa tlhomama mme a re dikgato tsa kgalemo di tla tsewa kgatlhanong le ba ba molato.
mt0: <pad> Mmesa o ne a dumela go re theko e ne e sa siama mme a re go tla tsewa kgato ya molao kgatlhanong le bao ba dirileng phoso.</s>

en: To have a Health Minister who is leading our pandemic response, somebody whose word is not believed, who cannot engage with the media, having to duck and dive accountability.
tsn: Go nna le Tona ya Boitekanelo e e  eteletseng pele tsibogo ya leroborobo la rona, motho yo mafoko a gagwe a sa tseweng tsia, yo a sa kgoneng go buisana le ba metswedi ya dikgang, yo o tlholang a tshabela maikarabelo.
mt0: <pad> Go nna le Tonakgolo ya Botlhokwapele yo o eteletseng pele go araba ditshwaelo tsa rona, mongwe yo o sa tshegetsang batho ba bangwe, yo o sa kgoneng go buisana le baphatlalatsi, go nna le go tshaba go ikarabela.</s>

en: We have a Health Minister that cant answer basic questions about whats happening in his department, says Chief Director at the Gauteng Health Department, Meisie Lerutle.
tsn: Re na le Tona ya Boitekanelo  e e sa kgoneng go araba dipotso tse di bonolo ka ditiragalo tse di diragalang mo lefapheng la gagwe, go bua  Mokaedimogolo wa Lefapheng la Boitekanelo la Gauteng, Meisie Lerutle.
mt0: <pad> Go na le Tonakgolo ya Botlhokwatlhoko e e sa kgoneng go araba dipotso tsa motheo ka se se diregang mo kantorong ya gagwe, a rialo Moofisiri wa Botlhokwatlhoko wa Gauteng, Meisie Lerutle.</s>

en: Mkhize not appearing before Health Committee puts more clouds over his head:
tsn: Go se tlhagelelang ga ga Mkhize fa pele ga Komiti ya Boitekanelo go dira gore a lebelelwe.
mt0: <pad> Mkhize's failure to appear before the Health Committee puts more clouds over his head.</s>

en: Meanwhile, political Analyst Dr Dale McKinley says Health Minister Dr Zweli Mkhize not appearing before the Health Portfolio Committee just puts more clouds over his head and more people are going to ask questions around his involvement in the Digital Vibes tender.

en: I have a case to answer.

en: People would respect that and I think the ANC must allow that and encourage that to happen.

en: Not just with Mkhize, but with the whole range of their members who are dealing with serious allegations because the only way they are going to clean the name of the party and are going to regain the trust of the population, is if they are seen to act.
tsn: E seng fela ka Mkhize, le maloko otlhe a yona a a lebaganeng le ditatofatso tse di masisi gonne ke yona fela tsela eo e e tla dirang gore ba phepafatse leina la lekoko le go tsosolosa botshepegi jwa baagi, fa ba bonagala ba diragatsa molao ono.

en: Not simply when and being charged formally, but when there is clear evidence that there’s been wrongdoing.

en: The Special Investigating Unit is probing the irregular tender that was for work related to the National Health Insurance scheme and governments response to the coronavirus pandemic.
tsn: Yuniti ya dipatlisiso e e Kgethegileng e tlhatlhobana le thendara e e sa tlhomamang e e neng e amana le sekema sa Inšhorense ya Boitekanelo jwa Bosetšhaba le mebuso ya go tsibogela leroborobo la Corona.

en: They also disagreed with the ANC’s position that the matter is sub-judice after the DA opened a case at Cape Town Police Station against Mkhize and his Director General Sandile Buthelezi.
tsn: Ga ba dumalane le boemo jwa ANC jwa gore kgetse e se sekasekiwe phatlalatsa morago ga fa DA e butse kgetse kwa seteišheneng sa mapodisi kwa Toropong ya Kapa  e e kgatlhanong le Mkhize le Mokaedi Kakaretso, Sandile Buthelezi.

en: EEF MPs, Dr Suzan Thembekwayo and Naledi Chirwa say the ANCs position on this matter is an indication that the committee will not be able to hold the minister to account.
tsn: Maloko a Palamente a EEF, Ngk Suzan Thembekwayo le Naledi Chirwa ba re boemo jwa ANC mo ntlheng e ke sesupo sa gore komiti e ka se kgone go bona tona molato.
mt0: <pad> MPs, Dr Suzan Thembekwayo and Naledi Chirwa say the ANC's position on this matter is an indication that the committee will not be able to hold the minister to account.</s>

en: This was a clear indication that we as the committee cannot be able to speak in one voice to bring the national department and the minister to account, says Thembekwayo.
tsn: Se e ne e le sesupo se se bonagalang sentle gore jaaka re le komiti ga re kgone go bua ka lentswe le le lengwe go tlisa lefapha la bosetšhaba le tona go ikarabela, go bua Thembekwayo.
mt0: <pad> Gone a clear indication that we as the committee cannot be able to speak in one voice to bring the national department and the minister to account, says Thembekwayo.</s>

en: So we cannot talk about this matter because a case has been opened against the minister, what happens when the NPA bring the matter to the court?
tsn: Ka jalo, re ka se kgone go bua ka kgang eno ka ntlha ya gore go butswe kgetse kgatlhanong le tona, go ya go diragala eng fa NPA e ka tlisa kgetse eno kwa kgotlatshekelong?
mt0: <pad> So re ka se bue ka kgang e eo ka go re molato o tswalwe kgatlhanong le menerale, go direga eng fa ba NPA ba isa kgang e kwa lekgotleng?</s>

en: Are we going to be held at ransom and wait until it is finished?
tsn: A re ya go tshwarwa matsogo go fitlhelela e fela?
mt0: <pad> Gone to be held at ransom and wait until it is finished?</s>

en: ANC stalwart, Mama Ivy Gcina, has been laid to rest in Gqeberha in the Eastern Cape.
tsn: Moikanyegi wa ANC, Mme Ivy Gcina, o bolokilwe kwa  Gqeberha kwa Kapa Botlhaba.
mt0: <pad> ANC stalwart, Mama Ivy Gcina, has been laid to rest in Gqeberha in the Eastern Cape.</s>

mt0: <pad> Go a funeral service was held at Feather Market Hall.</s>

en: The 84-year-old died on Thursday last week after a long illness.
tsn: Mosadimogolo yo wa dingwaga di le 84 o tlhokofetse mo beke e e fetileng ka Labone morago ga go lwala lobaka lo lo leele.
mt0: <pad> O tshotswe ka la boraro la beke le fetileng morago ga go nna le bolwetse jo bo sa siamang.</s>

mt0: <pad> Go a category two special provincial official funeral by President Cyril Ramaphosa.</s>

en: The funeral service of ANC stalwart Mama Ivy Gcina is currently underway at Feather Market Centre in Gqeberha.

mt0: <pad> Gompieno go tshwarwa setlhapelo sa Mama Ivy Gcina, a ANC stalwart, kwa Feather Market Centre kwa Gqeberha.</s>

en: The 84 year old Gcina died on Thursday last week after a long illness.
tsn: Mosadimogolo yo wa dingwaga di le 84, Gcina o tlhokofetse mo bekeng e e fetileng ka Labone morago ga go lwala lobaka lo lo leele.
mt0: <pad> Gcina, 84, o thokafetse ka Tshediso wa beke e e fetileng morago ga go nna le bolwetse jo bo sa siamang.</s>

en: She was an ANC MP from 1994 until 2004.
tsn: E ne e le Leloko la Palamente la ANC go tloga ka 1994 go fitlha ka 2004.
mt0: <pad> O ne a le MP wa ANC go simolola ka 1994 go fitlha ka 2004, mme o ne a sa itse.</s>

en: Gcina served as an ANC MP in Parliament from 1994 until her retirement in 2004.
tsn: Gcina o dirile jaaka Leloko la Palamente la ANC mo Palamenteng go tloga ka 1994 go fitlhelela a rola tiro ka 2004.
mt0: <pad> Gcina o ne a direla jaaka MMP wa ANC kwa Palamenteng go simolola ka 1994 go fitlha a tlogela tiro ya gagwe ka 2004.</s>

en: She also served on various structures of different women’s organisations during the apartheid era.
tsn: Gape o ne a dira mo dithulaganyong tse di farologaneng tsa mekgatlho ya basadi ka nako ya tlhaolele.
mt0: <pad> O ne a direla mo go ditlhopha tse di farologaneng tsa basadi ka nako ya apartheid.</s>

en: She served in the Women’s Committee of the Port Elizabeth Black Civic Organisation and was also the first chairperson of the Port Elizabeth Womens Organisation.
tsn: O dirile mo Komiting ya Basadi ya Port Elizabeth Black Civic Organisation mme e ne e le modulasetulo wa ntlha wa mokgatlho wa basadi wa kwa Port Elizabeth.
mt0: <pad> O ne a bereka mo Komiting ya Basadi ya Port Elizabeth Black Civic Organisation mme o ne a le modulasetulo wa ntlha wa Port Elizabeth Women's Organisation.</s>

en: She was also the leader of the United Democratic Front in the region.
tsn: E ne gape e le moeteledipele wa United Democratic Front mo kgaolong.
mt0: <pad> O ne a le modulasetulo wa United Democratic Front kwa kgaolong.</s>

en: During her time of resistance, she was detained and tortured on numerous occasions.
tsn: Ka nako ya gagwe, o ne a tshwarwa mme a bogisiwa makgetlo a le mantsi.
mt0: <pad> Fa a ne a tlhasela, o ne a tshwarwa le go tlhokofadiwa ka makgetlo a le mmalwa.</s>

en: Her family remembered her as a wise and courageous woman.
tsn: Balelapa la gagwe ba mo gopola  e le mosadi yo o botlhale e bile a le sebete.
mt0: <pad> Ba lelapa la gagwe ba ne ba a mo gopola jaaka mosadi yo o botlhale le yo o tlhaloganyang.</s>

en: Her grandchild, Lerato Gcina, says they have learned so much from her.
tsn: Setlogolo sa gagwe, Lerato Gcina, a re ba ithutile  go le gontsi mo go ene.
mt0: <pad> Mmotlana wa gagwe, Lerato Gcina, o re ba ithutile go le gontsi mo go lone.</s>

en: It actually hurts our feelings that we couldn’t spend more time with you during your weakest moments.
tsn: Go re utlwisa botlhoko gore re be re sa kgona go nna le wena ka nako ya gago ya bokoa.
mt0: <pad> Go a re kgopisa go re re ne re sa kgone go tshela nako e ntsi le wena ka dinako tsa gago tse di bokowa.</s>

en: We will miss you makhulu, your spirit and your strength live on in each of us and in the lives that you touched with your love, wisdom, strength and the beauty of your soul.
tsn: Re tla go tlhoafalela nkoko, mowa le maatla a gago di  tshela mo go mongwe le mongwe wa rona, le mo matshelong a o a amileng ka lorato, botlhale, bokgoni le bontle jwa mowa wa gago.
mt0: <pad> Go go miss, Makhulu, your spirit and your strength live on in each of us and in the lives that you touched with your love, wisdom, strength and the beauty of your soul.</s>

en: Siyauthanda makhulu, you truly were a special woman.
tsn: Re a go rata nkoko, o ne o le mosadi yo o kgethegileng.
mt0: <pad> Go go love ya, mommy. You were a special woman.</s>

en: We thank you for your sacrifices and everything you have done for us.
tsn: Re go lebogela go intsha setlhabelo ga gago le sengwe le sengwe se o re diretseng sona.
mt0: <pad> Re go lebogela ditlhabelo tsa gago le dilo tsotlhe tse o di dirileng mo go rona.</s>

en: Mama Gcina lost her three sons in the struggle while they were serving as soldiers of uMkhonto weSizwe while her daughter died of natural causes.
tsn: Mama Gcina o latlhegetswe ke barwa ba gagwe ba le bararo mo ntweng fa ba ne ba dira jaaka masole a uMkhonto weSizwe fa morwadie a tlhokafetse ka loso la tlhago.
mt0: <pad> Mama Gcina o latlhegelwa ke bana ba gagwe ba bararo mo dintweng fa ba ne ba direla jaaka masole a Mkhonto wa Sizwe, fa morwadia wa gagwe o tlhokafetse ka mabaka a tlhago.</s>

en: ANC Stalwart an icon Ivy Gcina who fought against the apartheid system a leader of PEWO, she stood for our people whilst she was tortured, beaten, suffocated, detained by the Security Branch.
tsn: Moikanyegi wa ANC Ivy Gcina  yo o lweleng kgatlhanong le tsamaiso ya tlhaolele, moeteledipele wa PEWO, o emetse batho ba rona le fa a ne a bogiswa, a itewa, ,a hupetswa, a tswaletswe ke Lefapha la Tshireletso.
mt0: <pad> ANC Stalwart an icon Ivy Gcina who fought against the apartheid system a leader of PEWO, she stood for our people whilst she was tortured, beaten, suffocated, detained by the Security Branch.</s>

en: She lost her own children in front line of our liberation struggle.
tsn: O latlhegetswe ke bana ba gagwe a ntse a kgaratlhela tokologo.
mt0: <pad> O latlhegetse bana ba gagwe mo go ntlha ya dintweng tsa rona tsa go tsosa kagiso.</s>

en: It is so sad.
tsn: Go tlhomola pelo.
mt0: <pad> It's so sad</s>

en: Reported by Andile Lungisa (@mrlungisa) on May 28, 2021
tsn: Pego ka Andile Lungisa (@mrlungisa), 20 Motsheganong 2021.
mt0: <pad> Go a few days ago, I was told that I would be going to go to the dentist.</s>

en: He called the current ANC members to emulate these values.
tsn: O rotloeditse maloko a ANC a ga jaana go latela  ditumelo tseno.
mt0: <pad> O ne a kgothaletsa baemedi ba ANC ba gompieno go simolola go ithuta dithuto tse.</s>

en: We are looking at someone who actually is a special kind, is a member that we want to see in the African National Congress.
tsn: Re lebile mongwe yo o tota a kgethegile, ke sekao sa motho se re batlang go se bona mo African National Congress.
mt0: <pad> Gone a special kind, a member that we want to see in the African National Congress.</s>

en: A person of integrity, a person of discipline, a very dedicated member, a very committed member of the African National Congress.
tsn: Motho wa seriti, motho wa boitiso,motho wa maikarabelo, leloko le le  ineetseng mo African National Congress..
mt0: <pad> A motho wa boikanyegi, a motho wa go ikgotsofatsa, a leloko la African National Congress.</s>

en: We should all emulate this generation, it’s a generation that knew very well that it’s not about them, but its about the future of this country.
tsn: Rotlhe re tshwanetse go latela batho ba, ke batho ba ba neng ba itse sentle gore ga se ka ga bona, mme ke ka ga isago ya naga eno.
mt0: <pad> Re tshwanetse go simolola ka go etsa bontsi jono, bontsi jo bo itse sentle go re ga se ka bone, mme ke ka bokamoso jwa naga eno.</s>

en: Minister of Defence and Military Veterans Nosiviwe Mapisa-Nqakula praised Mama Gcina as an unsung heroine and stalwart of the freedom struggle.
tsn: Tona ya Tshireletso le Mogaka wa Sesole Nosiviwe Mapisa-Nqakula o akgotse Mme Gcina jaaka moikanyegi, mogaka wa kgaratlho ya kgololesego.
mt0: <pad> Mme Mama Gcina a heroe o sa tsenwe le go nna motlhanke wa ntwa ya boipuso, Mme Mapisa-Nqakula o mo galaletse jaaka mosadi yo o sa tsenwe le go nna motlhanke wa ntwa ya boipuso.</s>

en: She says there are many heavy hearts bidding farewell to somebody who sacrificed her whole life to the struggle.
tsn: A re batho ba le bantsi ba utlwisitswe botlhoko ke go laela  motho yo o neetseng ka  botshelo jwa gagwe jotlhe go lwela tokologo.
mt0: <pad> O re go na le dipelo tse dintsi tse di tshwerweng ke go tlogela mongwe yo o neileng bophelo jotlhe jwa gagwe go lwalwa.</s>

en: She was forever at the forefront as she fought against the heinous apartheid policy of the national party.
tsn: O ne a tlhola a le kwa pele fa a lwa le bagaka ba bangwe mo pholising ya National Party.
mt0: <pad> O ne a le mo go ba pele ga ntlha fa a lwa kgatlhanong le molao wa boitshepo wa apartheid wa National Party.</s>

en: She was never deterred by the brutality of the security forces of the racist regime.
tsn: O ne a sa kgorelediwe ke bosetlhogo jwa tshireletso ya bosemorafe ya puso ya mmala.
mt0: <pad> O ne a sa kgoreletsege ke boitshepo jwa mapodise a tsa tshireletso a mmuso wa setlhopha sa dikgoka.</s>

en: She never wilted, even when more stringent security regulations were enacted by the regime in the dark days of apartheid.
tsn: O ne a sa tshoge, le fa go gagamatswa melao e e dirilweng ke puso ka nako ya tlhaolele.
mt0: <pad> O ne a sa tlogela go tshegetsa, le fa melao ya tshireletso e ne e tlhomiwa ke mmuso ka nako ya dikganye tsa apartheid.</s>

en: Mama Gcina leaves behind her two siblings and her six grandchildren.
tsn: Mama Gcina o tlogela bo monnaawe ba le babedi le ditlogolo di le thataro.
mt0: <pad> Mama Gcina o tlogela bana ba gagwe ba le bararo le bana ba gagwe ba le seswai.</s>

en: The Democratic Alliance (DA) has accused both Health Minister Zweli Mkhize and the department’s Director-General (DG) Sandile Buthelezi of undermining the role of parliament.
tsn: Democratic Alliance (DA) e latofatsa Tona ya Boitekanelo Zweli Mkhize ga mmogo le Mokaedikakaretso wa lefapha (DG) Sandile Buthelezi ka go nyatsa karolo ya palamente.
mt0: <pad> The Democratic Alliance (DA) has accused both Health Minister Zweli Mkhize and the department’s Director-General (DG) Sandile Buthelezi of undermining the role of parliament.</s>

en: The Minister was expected to appear before the Portfolio Committee on Health on Friday.
tsn: Tona o ne a solofetswe go tlhagelela fa pele ga Komiti ya Photefolio ya Pholo ka Labotlhano.
mt0: <pad> O tshwanetse go nna fa pele ga Komiti ya Botlhokwapele ya Botlhokwapele ya Botlhokwapele ka Laboraro.</s>

en: The Minister told the Portfolio Committee on Health that hes been legally advised not to appear before the Committee to discuss the awarding of the R150 million Digital Vibes contract, while his DG said he’s been advised to refrain from commenting on the contract.
tsn: Tona o boleletse Komiti ya Photefolio ya Pholo gore o  gakolotswe ke bamolao go se tlhagelele fa pele ga komiti go buisana ka ga kabelo ya Kontaraka ya  dimilione tsa diranta di le R150 go Digital Vibes, fa Mokaedi Kakaretso wa gagwe a rile o gakolotswe gore a seke a tshwaela mo kabelong ya konterakeng.
mt0: <pad> O bontshitse ba Komiti ya Botlhokwapele ya Tlholego ya Matsogo go re o kgopilwe ka molao go nna fa pele ga Komiti go bua ka theko ya R150 million ya Digital Vibes, mme DG wa gagwe o kgopilwe go se bue ka theko ya R150 million.</s>

en: This is after DA Member of Parliament, Siviwe Gwarube, opened a case against the two at the Cape Town Police Station.
tsn: Se ke morago ga gore leloko la Palamente la  DA,Siviwe Gwarube, a bule kgetse kgatlhanong le bobedi jo kwa Kapa kwa seteišheneng sa mapodisi.
mt0: <pad> Gone after a DA MP, Siviwe Gwarube, opened a case against the two at the Cape Town Police Station.</s>

en: Gwarube’s colleague, Evelyn Wilson, rejected the African National Congress (ANC) position that the matter is subjudice, demanding answers.
tsn: Modira-mmogo le Gwarube, Evelyn Wilson, o ganne boemo jwa African National Congress (ANC) gore kgetse e nne bofitlha, go batlwa dikarabo.
mt0: <pad> Gwarube's colleague, Evelyn Wilson, rejected the African National Congress (ANC) position that the matter is subjudice, demanding answers.</s>

en: It is not subject to subjudice, it is not before the court.
tsn: Ga e a tlisiwa fa pele ga kgotlhatshekelo.
mt0: <pad> Ga e tlhatlhobetswe ka subjudice, ga e fa pele ga lekgotla.</s>

en: The matter is not being heard in court and the DG agreed to come to this meeting.
tsn: Ntlha e ga ise e reediwa kwa kgotlatshekelo mme DG o dumetse go tla mo kopanong e.
mt0: <pad> Mme o ne a re o tla tla go ya kwa kgotlatshekong, mme DG o ne a dumela go tla kwa kopanong eno.</s>

en: We must remember one thing here, we are not accountable to the Minister or his DG, they are accountable to us, says Wilson.
tsn: Re tshwanetse go gakologelwa selo se le sengwe fa, ga re ikarabele go Tona kgotsa DG, bona ba na le maikarabelo mo go rona, go bua Wilson.
mt0: <pad> Re tshwanetse go gakologelwa sengwe mo go tse, ga re botlhokwa go Mmenerale le DG ya gagwe, mme eo ke bone ba botlhokwa go rona, a re Wilson.</s>

en: Digital Vibes contract: DA lays criminal charge against Dr Zweli Mkhize.
tsn: Konteraka ya Digital Vibes: DA e bula molato wa bosenyi kgatlhanong le Ngaka Zweli Mkhize
mt0: <pad> Digital Vibes contract: DA lays criminal charge against Dr Zweli Mkhize</s>

en: Siviwe Gwarube says ANC defends Mkhize.
tsn: Siviwe Gwarube a re ANC e sireletsa Mkhize
mt0: <pad> Siviwe Gwarube says ANC defends Mkhize</s>

en: The ANC has accused the DA of jumping the gun by opening a case against Mkhize and Buthelezi regarding the awarding of Digital Vibes tender.
tsn: ANC e latofatsa DA ka go itlhaganelela go bula kgetse kgatlhanong le Mkhize le Buthelezi malebana le kabelo ya thendara ya Digital Vibes.
mt0: <pad> ANC e latofaditse DA ka go tlola molao ka go bua kgatlhanong le Mkhize le Buthelezi mabapi le go fa Digital Vibes tender.</s>

en: ANC MP Kenneth Jacobs puts the blame on Gwarube that the committee was unable to deliberate on the matter.
tsn: Leloko la Palamente la ANC, Kenneth Jacobs o tshwaya Gwarube phoso mo ntlheng ya gore komiti e be e sa kgona go akantshana ka ga kgang e.
mt0: <pad> ANC MP Kenneth Jacobs blames Gwarube for the failure of the committee to deliberate on the matter.</s>

en: I want to reiterate that the member had jumped the gun to go and lay criminal charges, therefore, the DG and the Minister have the right to do what they are doing to make certain that they don’t infringe their rights according to the Constitution, says Jacobs.
tsn: Ke batla go gatelela gore maloko a ile a itlhaganenela go bula kgetse ya tshenyo, ka jalo, Mokaedi Kakaretso le Tona ba na le tshwanelo ya go dira se ba se dirang go netefatsa gore ga ba kgoreletse ditshwanelo tsa bona go ya ka Molaotheo, go bua Jacobs.
mt0: <pad> Ke batla go tlhomamisa gore mongwe wa ditholaganyo o ne a tlola molao wa go simolola go tshwara ditatofaele tsa molao, ka jalo, DG le Mme Ministre ba na le tshwanelo ya go dira se ba se dirang go netefatsa gore ba ne ba sa kgopamiše tshwanelo ya bone go ya ka Molaotheo, a rialo Jacobs.</s>

en: Corruption allegations: Alleged irregular contract between the health department & Digital Vibes
tsn: Tatofatso ya tlolomolao: ditatofatso tsa konteraka e e sa tlhomamang magareng ga Lefapha la Boitekanelo le Digital Vibes

en: The late Ivy Gcina has been praised as an unsung heroine and stalwart of the freedom struggle.
tsn: Moswi Ivy Gcina o ne a tlotlomatswa jaaka mogaka wa kgaratlho ya kgololesego.
mt0: <pad> Ivy Gcina, a late hero and stalwart of the struggle for freedom</s>

en: The Minister of Defence and Military Veterans, Nosiviwe Mapisa-Nqakula, was speaking at the fun funeral of the liberation struggle stalwart, Ivy Cikizwa Gcina, in her hometown of Gqeberha, in the Eastern Cape, on Friday.
tsn: Tona ya Tshireletso le Bagaka ba Sesole, Nosiviwe Mapisa-Nqakula, o ne a bua kwa phitlhong ya ga mokgaratlhela tokologo moikanyi, Ivy Cikizwa Gcina, mo lefelong la bodulo la gagwe kwa Gqeberha, kwa Kapa Botlhaba, ka Labotlhano.
mt0: <pad> Mme Madame Ivy Cikizwa Gcina, a tswa kwa go nna 'liberation struggle stalwart', o ne a tlhokafetse kwa motseng wa gagwe wa Gqeberha, kwa botlhabagare, ka Labobedi.</s>

en: Gcina was granted a Special Official Provincial Funeral Category 2 by President Cyril Ramaphosa.
tsn: Gcina o neetswe phitlho ya semmuso ya Setlhopha sa 2 e e kgethegileng ke Moporesitente Cyril Ramaphosa.
mt0: <pad> Gcina was granted a Special Official Provincial Funeral Category 2 by President Cyril Ramaphosa.</s>

en: Video: Funeral service for ANC struggle stalwart Ivy Cikizwa Gcina
tsn: Kgatiso: Tirelo phitlho ya mokgaratlhi wa ANC Ivy Cikizwa Gcina.
mt0: <pad> Video: Tshediso ya go nna teng ga Ivy Cikizwa, motlhanke wa ANC Ivy Cikizwa</s>

en: Mapisa-Nqakula says there are many heavy hearts bidding farewell to somebody who sacrificed her whole life to the struggle.
tsn: Mapisa-Nqakula a re ke ba le bantsi ba ba utlwileng botlhoko ba ba tlileng go laela motho yo o neetseng ka botshelo jwa gagwe jotlhe go kgaratlho.
mt0: <pad> Mapisa-Nqakula says that there are many heavy hearts bidding farewell to someone who sacrificed her whole life to the struggle.</s>

en: She was forever at the forefront as she fought against the hideous apartheid policy of the national party.
tsn: O ne a tlhola a le kwa pele a lwa kgatlhanong le pholisi ya bofitlha ya National Party.
mt0: <pad> O ne a le mo go ba pele ga ntlha fa a lwantsha molao wa boapartheid wa National Party.</s>

en: Gcina, 84, served on many structures during her time fighting the apartheid regime including the Port Elizabeth Black Civic Organisation (PEBCO).
tsn: Gcina, yo o dingwaga di le 84, o dirile mo ditheong tse dintsi  ka nako ya ntwa ya ditheo tsa puso ya kgethololo  go akaretsa Port Elizabeth Black Civic Organisation (PEBCO).
mt0: <pad> Gcina, 84, o ne a direla mo go ditlhopha tse dintsi ka nako ya gagwe ya go lwantsha boipuso jwa apartheid, jaaka the Port Elizabeth Black Civic Organisation (PEBCO).</s>

en: She was also the first Chairperson of the Port Elizabeth Women’s Organisation (PEWO).
tsn: E ne e le Modulasetulo wa ntlha wa mokgatlho wa basadi wa kwa Port Elizabeth (PEWO).
mt0: <pad> O ne a le modulasetulo wa ntlha wa Mokgatlho wa Basadi ba Port Elizabeth (PEWO).</s>

en: She joined the African National Congress Youth League (ANCYL) in the 1950s and served in parliament as an African National Congress Member of Parliament from 1994 until 2004 when she retired.
tsn: O ne a tsenetse mokgatlho wa bašwa  wa African National Congress (ANCYL) ka dingwaga tsa bo1950 mme o dirile mo Palamenteng jaaka Leloko la Palamente la African National Congress go tloga ka 1994 go ya go fitlha ka 2004 fa a rola tiro.
mt0: <pad> O tseneletse ANCYL ka 1950s mme o ne a direla kwa Palamenteng jaaka Mmatlhanke wa ANC ka 1994 go fitlha ka 2004 fa a tlogela.</s>

en: The funeral of the liberation struggle stalwart, Ivy Cikizwa Gcina, is set to take place in her hometown of Gqeberha, in the Eastern Cape, on Friday morning.
tsn: Phitlho ya mokgaratlhela tokologo , Ivy Cikizwa Gcina, e ya go tshwarelwa kwa motsetoropo wa gaabo kwa Gqeberha, kwa Kapa Botlhaba, mo mosong wa Labotlhano.
mt0: <pad> Ivy Cikizwa Gcina, a leading activist in the liberation struggle, is to be buried in her hometown of Gqeberha, in the Eastern Cape, on Friday morning.</s>

en: Gcina has been granted a Special Official Provincial Funeral Category 2 by President Cyril Ramaphosa.
tsn: Gcina o neetswe phitlho ya semmuso e e kgethegileng ya setlhopha  sa 2 ke Moporesitente Cyril Ramaphosa.
mt0: <pad> Gcina o neilwe Special Official Provincial Funeral Category 2 ke Moporesidente Cyril Ramaphosa.</s>

en: Political analyst Ivor Sarakinsky says President Cyril Ramaphosa should have taken a decisive decision against Health Minister Dr Zweli Mkhize as he is facing serious allegations of corruption.
tsn: Mosekaseki wa tsa sepoletiki Ivor Sarakinsky a re moporesitente Cyril Ramaphosa o ne a tshwanetse go tsaya tshwetso kgatlhanong le Tona ya Boitekanelo Ngaka Zweli Mkhize jaaka a lebagane le  ditatofatso tsa tlolomolao tse di masisi.
mt0: <pad> A political analyst Ivor Sarakinsky says President Cyril Ramaphosa should have taken a decisive decision against Health Minister Dr Zweli Mkhize as he is facing serious allegations of corruption.</s>

en: Sarakinsky says the president is not dealing with the matter appropriately.
tsn: Sarakinsky a re moporesitente ga a samagane le ntlha e ka tsela e e maleba.
mt0: <pad> Sarakinsky says that the president is not dealing with the matter properly.</s>

en: Allegations have surfaced that Mkhize personally benefited from the irregular R150 million tender to communications company Digital Vibes.
tsn: Go tlhageletse ditatofatso tsa gore Mkhize o ungwile go tswa mo  kabelong ya thendara ya dimilione tsa diranta di le R150 e e neetsweng setlamo sa ditlhaeletsano, Digital vibes.
mt0: <pad> Ditsholofetso di tlhagelela go re Mkhize o ne a amega ka boyena mo tshebediso ya R150 million e seng molaong go kgwebo ya dikgang tsa Digital Vibes.</s>

en: Sarakinsky says Ramaphosa finds himself in a difficult position as Mkhize is a medical doctor who knows what needs to be done in terms of the COVID-19 pandemic.
tsn: Sarakinsky a re Ramaphosa o iphitlhela a le mo maemong a a bokete ka ntlha ya fa Mkhize e le ngaka mme a itse se se tshwanetseng go dirwa ka leroborobo la COVID-19.
mt0: <pad> Sarakinsky says Ramaphosa finds himself in a difficult position as Mkhize is a medical doctor who knows what needs to be done in terms of the COVID-19 pandemic.</s>

en: Minister Mkhize made it very hard for President Ramaphosa because in many other democracies a scandal like this would result in the minister resigning falling on his sword and in that way protecting the president from having to take disciplinary action.
tsn: Tona Mkhize o thatafaleditse Moporesidente Ramaphosa dilo ka gonne mo dikgetseng tse dingwe tsa temokarasi e e tlhabisangditlhong jaana, dipoelo e nna  gore tona a role tiro ya gagwe  ka maikaelelo a go sireletsa le go tsaya dikgato tsa kgalemo.
mt0: <pad> Mme o ne a sa itse</s>

en: So that is the practice that should be in place.
tsn: Ka jalo ke tiro e e tshwanetse go dira.
mt0: <pad> Ke tsela eo ya go dira thata.</s>

en: But in SA if that was the case we would have ongoing changes in the cabinet with all the scandals that are emerging through media investigations and the Zondo Commission.
tsn: Mme fa go ne go ntse jalo mo Aforika Borwa, re ka bo re na le diphetogo mo dikabineteng tse di nang le matlhabisaditlhong tsotlhe tse di tlhagelelang mo dipatlisisong tsa bobegakgang le kwa Khomišeneng ya ga Zondo.
mt0: <pad> Gone gone, if that was the case we would have ongoing changes in the cabinet with all the scandals that are emerging through media investigations and the Zondo Commission.</s>

en: Ramaphosa dealing with allegations.
tsn: Ramaphosa go samagane le ditatofatso.
mt0: <pad> Ramaphosa dealing with allegations</s>

en: On Wednesday, President Cyril Ramaphosa said he’s dealing with allegations around Mkhize and the irregular R150 million Digital Vibes contract.
tsn: Ka Laboraro, Moporesitente Cyril Ramaphosa o rile o sa samagane le ditatofatso tsa ga Mkhize le kabelo ya konteraka ya dimilione ya diranta di le R150 go Digital Vibes.
mt0: <pad> Ka Labobedi, Moporesidente Cyril Ramaphosa o re o tlhatlhoba dikgopolo tse di mabapi le Mkhize le kontrake ya Digital Vibes ya R150 million e seng molaong.</s>

en: There has been mounting pressure from the DA and other parties for Mkhize to step down or be removed by Ramaphosa.
tsn: Kgatelelo e ntse e oketsega go tswa kwa DA le mekgatlho e mengwe gore Mkhize a role tiro kgotsa a tlosiwe ke Ramaphosa.
mt0: <pad> Go na le go batla go re Mkhize a tlogele tiro, kgotsa Ramaphosa a mo tlosa.</s>

en: The President said the allegations are serious and need to be investigated thoroughly by law enforcement agencies and that due process will be followed once the investigations are finalised.
tsn: Moporesidente o rile ditatofatso tse di masisi e bile di tshwanetse go batlisisiwa ka botlalo ke ditheo tsa tiragatso ya Molao le gore tsamaiso e e tshwanetseng e tlaa latela fa dipatlisiso di konoseditswe.
mt0: <pad> President says the allegations are serious and need to be investigated thoroughly by law enforcement agencies and that due process will be followed once the investigations are finalised.</s>

en: Mkhize to appear before Parliaments Health Committee on Friday
tsn: Mkhize o solofetswe go tlhagelela fa pele ga Komiti ya Boitekanelo ya Palamente ka Labotlhano.
mt0: <pad> Mkhize o tla nna fa pele ga Komiti ya Botlhokwapele ya Palamente ka Laboraro.</s>

en: Meanwhile, Mkhize will be appearing before Parliaments Health Committee on Friday morning to respond to allegations of his involvement in the irregular Digital Vibes contract.
tsn: Re sa le foo, Mkhize o tla tlhagelela fa pele ga komiti ya Boitekanelo ya Palamente ka Labotlhano mo mosong go araba ditatofatso tsa go nna le seabe ga gagwe mo kabelong ya konteraka go Digital Vibes.
mt0: <pad> Mkhize o tla nna fa pele ga Lekgotla la Botlhokwapele ka Mosupologo wa Laboraro go araba di-accusations that he was involved in the Digital Vibes contract.</s>

en: National Assembly House Committee Chairperson and Chair of Committee Chairpersons Cedrick Frolick has confirmed to theSABCthat Mkhize will appear before the committee.
tsn: Modulasetulo wa Komiti ya Kokoano Bosetšhaba le Modulasetulo wa Komiti e e nang le Badulasetulo Cedrick Frolick o netefaleditse ba SABC gore Mkhize   o tlaa tlhagelela fa pele ga komiti.
mt0: <pad> Chairman of the National Assembly House Committee and Chair of Committee Chairpersons Cedrick Frolick has confirmed to the SABC that Mkhize will appear before the committee.</s>

en: Frolick says he has approved a committee request for Mkhize to appear before the Health Committee early on Friday morning.
tsn: Frolick a re o amogetse kopo semmuso ya Komiti  ya go tlhagelela ga ga Mkhize fa pele ga komiti ya Boitekanelo mo mosong wa Labotlhano.
mt0: <pad> Frolick says he has approved a request by the Health Committee for Mkhize to appear before the Committee early on Friday morning.</s>

en: Frolick says a virtual meeting with Mkhize and the Health Parliamentary Committee will take place at 8 o’clock on Friday morning.
tsn: Frolick a re kopano le Mkhize e e tla bong e seng ka namana le Komiti ya Palamente le ya Boitekanelo e tlaa tshwarwa ka Ura ya 8  mo mosong wa Labotlhano.
mt0: <pad> Go a virtual meeting with Mkhize and the Health Parliamentary Committee will take place at 8am on Friday morning.</s>

en: Democratic Alliance (DA) shadow Minister of Health, Siviwe Gwarube, has laid criminal charges against Mkhize at the Cape Town Central Police Station.
tsn: Molatedi wa Democratic Alliance (DA) Tona ya Boitekanelo, Siviwe Gwarube, o butse molato wa bosenyi kgatlhanong le Mkhize kwa seteišheneng sa mapodisi kwa Toropong ya Kapa.
mt0: <pad> Democratic Alliance (DA) Shadow Minister of Health, Siviwe Gwarube, has laid criminal charges against Mkhize at the Cape Town Central Police Station.</s>

en: She has also laid charges of contravening the Public Finance Management Act against Health Department Director-General Dr Sandile Buthelezi.
tsn: O butse molato wa go tlola Molao wa Taolo ya Matlole a Setšhaba kgatlhanong le Mokaedi Kakaretso wa Lefapha la Boitekanelo Ngaka Sandile Buthelezi.
mt0: <pad> O o ne a simolola go tlola molao wa Public Finance Management Act ka Dr Sandile Buthelezi, Molaodi wa Lefapha la Botlhokwatlhoko la Tshireletso ya Bophelo.</s>

en: DA lays criminal charge against Dr Zweli Mkhize.
tsn: DA e bula molato wa bosenyi kgatlhanong le Ngaka Zweli Mkhize.
mt0: <pad> DA lays criminal charge against Dr Zweli Mkhize</s>

en: The African National Congress (ANC) Interim Provincial Committee in the Free State has warned that it will take action against members who are facing criminal charges and don’t step aside.
tsn: Komiti ya nakwana ya porofense mo Foreisetata ya African National Congress (ANC) e tlhalositse gore e tlaa tsaya kgato kgatlhanong le maloko a a lebaganeng le dikgetse tsa bosenyi mme a sa emisiwe.
mt0: <pad> The African National Congress (ANC) Interim Provincial Committee in the Free State has warned that it will take action against members who are facing criminal charges and don’t step aside.</s>

en: The committee held a media briefing in Bloemfontein about the outcome of its first meeting that was held earlier this week.
tsn: Komiti e ne ya tshwara dipuisano le bobegakgang kwa Bloemfontein ka ga dipoelo tsa kopanong ya yone ya ntlha e e neng e tshwerwe go sa le gale mo bekeng e.
mt0: <pad> Komiti e ne ya tshwara dipuisano tsa dikgang kwa Bloemfontein ka ga go re e ne ya tshwara kopano ya yone ya ntlha ya go bua ka tsela e e neng ya diragala peleng ja beke eno.</s>

en: Deputy convener Paseka Nompondo says there are three members that have been affected.
tsn: Motlatsa motsamaisi Paseka Nompondo a re go na le maloko a le mararo a a  amegileng.
mt0: <pad> Deputy convener Paseka Nompondo says there are three members that have been affected.</s>

en: At the current moment, I can say that those that are affected are three and then we already have been in touch with them this morning, We are dealing with that matter so the state officials that have appeared in court this morning, the state must act within the framework of the law.
tsn: Mo nakong ya ga jaana, ke tla re go amegile ba le bararo mme re setse re golagane le bone mo mosong ono,  Re lebagane le ntlha eno, batlhankedi ba puso ba ba tlhageletseng kwa kgotlatshekelo mo mosong ono, puso e tshwanetse go dira mo teng ga letlhomeso la molao.
mt0: <pad> Ka nako e, ke kgona go re bao ba amegileng ke bararo mme re setse re dirile dipuisano le bone ka moso, Re ntse re sebetsa ka kgang e, ka jalo baofisiri ba mmuso ba ba tlileng kwa lekgotleng ka moso, mmuso o tshwanetse go dira mo molaong.</s>

en: But on our side, as the ANC, those who occupy our positions shall step aside today, failing which the ANC will act appropriately.
tsn: Mme mo letlhakoreng la rona, jaaka ANC, ba ba leng mo maemong a rona ba tlaa emisiwa gompieno, fa go padile, ANC e tlaa dira se se tshwanetseng.
mt0: <pad> Ke rona, jaaka ANC, bao ba tsayang maemo a rona gompieno ba tla tshwanela go tlogela, fa go sa direge jalo, ANC e tla dira ka fa go siama.</s>

en: ANC provincial convener, Mxolisi Dukwana, says members who don’t follow party policies will no longer be welcome in the party.
tsn: Motsamaisi wa porofense wa ANC, Mxolisi Dukwana o re maloko a a a sa lateleng dipholisi tsa lekoko ga a kitla a tlhola a amogelwa mo mokgatlhong.
mt0: <pad> Mxolisi Dukwana, a ANC provincial convener, says members who don’t follow party policies will no longer be welcome in the party.</s>

en: We would like to be given space to ensure that we work with the members of the ANC.
tsn: Re rata go ka newa tšhono ya go netefatsa gore re dira le maloko a Mokgatlho wa ANC.
mt0: <pad> Gone a wanna be given space to ensure that we work with the members of the ANC.</s>

en: We indicated that there is no one who is the hero; members of the ANC do not belong to anyone, there is no one who is the supporter of any leader.
tsn: Re supile gore ga go na motho yo e leng mogaka; maloko a mokgatlho wa ANC ga e se a ga ope, ga go ope yo e leng motshegetsi wa moeteledipele ope.
mt0: <pad> Re bontshitse go re ga go na ope yo o tshwanang le hero; baagi ba ANC ga ba belong go ope, ga go ope yo o tshegetsang mongwe le mongwe wa batlhanke.</s>

en: These are members of the ANC and we need to ensure that such finds expression and that members of the ANC will always follow the organisation and not follow individuals.
tsn: A, ke maloko a ANC mme re tshwanetse go netefatsa gore re fitlhela mekgwa e e siameng, maloko a mokgatlho wa ANC ka gale a tlaa latela mokgatlho e seng batho.
mt0: <pad> Ba ke ba ANC, mme re tshwanetse go netefatsa gore se se bonala sentle, le gore ba ANC ba tla nna ba latela mokgatlo, mme ga ba latele batho.</s>

en: Mxolisi Dukwana appointed as convenor of the ANC Free State Interim Provincial Committee:
tsn: Mxolisi Dukwana o tlhomilwe jaaka moepapitso wa ANC wa Komiti ya nakwana ya Porofense ya Foreisetata.
mt0: <pad> Mxolisi Dukwana appointed as convenor of the ANC Free State Interim Provincial Committee</s>

tsn: Tona ya Boitekanelo Ngaka Zweli Mkhize o tla tlhagelela fa pele ga Komiti ya Boitekanelo ya Palamente mo mosong wa Labotlhano go araba ditatofatso tsa go nna le seabe ga gagwe mo konterakeng ya Digital vibes.

mt0: <pad> Chairman of the National Assembly House Committee and Chair of Committee Chairpersons Cedrick Frolick a confirmed to the SABC that Mkhize will appear before the committee.</s>

en: Pressure has been mounting that President Cyril Ramaphosa should act against Mkhize following his latest admission that the awarding of a R150-million tender to communications company, Digital Vibes was irregular.
tsn: Kgatelelo e sa ntse e oketsega gore Moporesitente Cyril Ramaphosa o tshwanetse go tsaya kgato kgatlhanong le Mkhize go latela go dumela kabelo ya thendara ya dimilione tsa diranta di le R150 go setlamo sa ditlhaeletsano, Digital Vibes e e neng e sa tlhomamang.

en: The tender was for services related to the National Health Insurance scheme and governments response to the COVID-19 pandemic.
tsn: Thendara e ne e le ya ditirelo tse di amanang le sekema sa Inšhorense ya Pholo ya Bosetšhaba le tsibogelo ya mebuso ka ga covid-19.
mt0: <pad> Go ne go batla ditirelo tse di amanang le tshepedišo ya National Health Insurance Scheme le boitlhaelelo jwa mmuso ka COVID-19 pandemic.</s>

tsn: Seno se ka morago ga tshenolo ya gore lelapa la ga Mkhize le ka tswa le ungwile go tswa mo  mading a thendara ya dimilione di le R150 e  lefapha la gagwe le e abetseng setlamo sa ditlhaeletsano Digital vibes.
mt0: <pad> Gone after revelations that Mkhize's family may have benefited from proceeds of a R150 million tender that his department awarded to the communication company Digital Vibes.</s>

en: The company employed Mkhize’s former spokesperson and alleged family friend, Tahera Mather, and the Ministers former assistant, Naadhira Mitha.
tsn: Setlamo se thapile Mmueledi wa Lelapa la ga Mkhize wa maloba, yo  e bile e leng tsala ya lelapa, Tahera Mather le mothusi wa ga tona wa maloba, Naadhira Mitha.
mt0: <pad> The company employed Mkhize's former spokesperson and alleged family friend, Tahera Mather, and the Minister's former assistant, Naadhira Mitha.</s>

en: On Wednesday, President Cyri lRamaphosa said he’s dealing with allegations around Zweli Mkhize and the irregular R150 million Digital Vibes contract.
tsn: Ka Laboraro, Moporesitente Cyril Ramaphosa o rile samagane le ditatofatso malebana le Zweli Mkhize le kontaraka e e sa tlhomamang ya diranta tsa dimilione di le  R150 ya Digital Vibes
mt0: <pad> Ka Labobedi, Moporesidente Cyril Ramaphosa o re o tlhatlhoba dikgopolo tse di mabapi le Zweli Mkhize le kontrake ya Digital Vibes ya R150 million e seng molaong.</s>

en: There are serious allegations which need to be investigated by the SIU and any other appropriate authority and be finalised without delay.
tsn: Go na le ditatofatso tse masisi tse di tshwanetseng go batlisisiwa ke ba ga SIU le makala a mangwe a a maleba mme ba konosetse se kwa ntle ga tiego.
mt0: <pad> Go na le ditatofatso tse di maswe tse di tshwanetseng go tlhotlhomisiwa ke SIU le melao e mengwe e e siametseng mme di feleletse ntle le go letla.</s>

en: President Cyril Ramaphosa says hes dealing with allegations against Dr Zweli Mkhize:
tsn: Moporesidente Cyril Ramaphosa a re o samagane le ditatofatso kgatlhanong le Ngaka Zweli Mkhize.
mt0: <pad> President Cyril Ramaphosa says he's dealing with allegations against Dr Zweli Mkhize.</s>

en: The Democratic Alliance (DA) is calling for the immediate suspension of embattled Health Minister Dr Zweli Mkhize.
tsn: Democratic Alliance (DA) e dirang ipiletso ya gore kemiso ya Tona ya Boitekanelo.Ngk Zweli Mkhize e diragale ka bonako
mt0: <pad> The Democratic Alliance (DA) is calling for the immediate suspension of Health Minister Dr Zweli Mkhize.</s>

en: The DA shadow minister for Health Siviwe Gwarube laid charges against Mkhize on Thursday at the Cape Town police station under the Prevention of Corruption Act.
tsn: Molatedi wa DA, Tona ya Boitekanelo Siviwe Gwarube o butse molato  kgatlhanong le Mkhize ka Labone kwa seteišheneng sa mapodisi sa kwa Toropong ya Kapa ka fa tlase ga Molao wa Thibelo ya tlolomolao.
mt0: <pad> Mkhize o ne a latofadiwa ka molato wa go nna le madi a a sa siamang ka molao wa Prevention of Corruption.</s>

en: Allegations have surfaced regarding Mkhize and a tender of about R150 million for communications company Digital Vibes.
tsn: Ditatofatso di tlhageletse mabapi le Mkhize le thendara ya dimilione di le R150 tsa setlamo sa tlhaeletsano sa Digital vibes.
mt0: <pad> Ditsholofelo di tlhagelela ka Mkhize le a tender ya R150 million go khampani ya dikgang Digital Vibes.</s>

en: The DA has also laid charges against the Director-General in the department, Dr Sandile Buthelezi for the alleged flouting the Public Finance Management Act.
tsn: DA e dirile ditatofatso kgatlhanong le Mokaedi-Kakaretso mo lefapheng, Ngk Sandile Buthelezi tsa tlolo ya Molao wa Taolo ya matlole a setšhaba.
mt0: <pad> DA e ne ya latofatsa Dr Sandile Buthelezi, Molaodi wa Setheo sa Tshedisopele, ka go re o ne a tshegetsa molao wa Public Finance Management.</s>

en: Gwarube says, We are laying charges here against Minister Mkhize, allegations are mounting in the past few weeks that suggest that the minister might have improperly signed off a contract to Digital Vibes, a company that is run by a close associates to the tune of 150 million rands.
tsn: Gwarube a re, re bula melato kgatlhanong le Tona Mkhize, ditatofatso di oketsegile mo dibekeng di le mmalwa tse di fetileng tse di tshitshinyang gore Tona a ka tswa a saenile  konteraka ya Digital Vibes ka phoso, khampani e e tsamaisiwa ke batho ba a ba itsaneng mme e lekanyetswa go dimilione tsa diranta di le 150.
mt0: <pad> Gwarube says, Re golola molato mo go Mme Mkhize, dikgopolo tse di tlhagelela mo dikgweding tse di fetileng tse di supa fa Mme Mkhize o ka tswa a neile kontrake e seng molaong go Digital Vibes, khampani e dirisiwa ke baagisani ba gagwe ka madi a a kana kang 150 million rands.</s>

en: It is our contention that this could be in contravention of the combating and prevention of corruption act.
tsn: Maikutlo a rona ke gore se se ka nna kgatlhanong le molao wa Twantsho le Thibelo ya tlolomolao.
mt0: <pad> Go ya ka rona, go ka nna mo kgatlhanong le molao wa go lwantsha le go thibela bokgothokgotho.</s>

en: The Special Investigation Unit (SIU) is investigating the matter, telling Scopa that they hope to wrap up investigations by the end of the month.
tsn: Yuniti ya Dipatlisiso tse di Kgethegileng (SIU) e sekaseka ntlha e, ba boleletse Scopa gore ba solofela go konosetsa dipatlisiso fa kgwedi e ya kwa bokhutlong.
mt0: <pad> The Special Investigation Unit (SIU) is investigating the matter, telling Scopa that they hope to wrap up their investigations by the end of the month.</s>

en: President Cyril Ramamaphosa announced that he’s also dealing with the matter, saying Mkhize is co-operating fully.
tsn: Moporesitente Cyril Ramamaphosa o dirile kitsiso ya gore le ena o samagana le ntlha e, a re Mkhize o na le tirisanommogo e e tletseng.
mt0: <pad> President Cyril Ramamaphosa o tlhalositse go re o tsamaisana le kgang, a re Mkhize o tshegetsa ka botlalo.</s>

en: However, Gwarube says Mkhize should have long been suspended, We are of the view that the President failed yesterday to take any form of leadership by suspending Dr Mkhize, pending the conclusion of the SIU investigation.
tsn: Le fa go le jalo, Gwarube a re Mkhize o ne a tshwanetse go emisiwa kgale. Re lemoga gore Moporesidente o reteletswe maabane go dirisa maemo a gagwe a boeteledipele go emisa Ngaka Mkhize, fa go santse go letilwe go konosediwa ga dipatlisiso go tswa SIU.
mt0: <pad> However, Gwarube says Mkhize should have long been suspended, We are of the view that the President failed yesterday to take any form of leadership by suspending Dr Mkhize, pending the completion of the SIU investigation.</s>

en: We think this is improper, we think that actually potentially from undue influence if the minister is his post while hes being investigated.
tsn: Re akanya gore se ga se a siama, re akanya gore go na le tshusumetso gore tona a tswelele ka tiro ya gagwe fa go sa ntse go diriwa dipatlisiso.
mt0: <pad> Re re o sa itse</s>

en: Mkhize is alleged to have signed off on the contract whose alleged directors are his friends, Tahera Mather and Naadira Mitha, for government communications services.
tsn: Mkhize o latofadiwa ka go saena konteraka e bakaedi ba latofadiwang e le ditsala tsa gagwe, Tahera Mather le Naadira Mitha, ba tirelo ya ditlhaeletsano tsa puso.
mt0: <pad> Mkhize o bolelwa go saena kontrake e e dirisiwang ke batswakwa ba gagwe, Tahera Mather le Naadira Mitha, ya ditirelo tsa dipuisano tsa mmuso.</s>

en: But the money allegedly ended up benefitting Mkhize, his family and the families of the two directors.
tsn: Fela madi a a a kaiwang a feleleditse a ungwela Mkhize, lelapa la gagwe le malapa a bakaedi ba babedi.
mt0: <pad> Mme madi ao a ne a simolola go solegela Mkhize, lelapa la gagwe le ba lelapa la batsamaisi ba babedi.</s>

en: In another case, the Public Protector says she’s opened a case of contempt with the Brooklyn police.
tsn: Mo kgetseng e nngwe, Mosireletsi wa Setšhaba a re o butse kgetse ya lenyatso le ba sepodisi sa Brooklyn.
mt0: <pad> Gongwe, Mmotlhanke wa Setjhaba o re o buile gore o ne a bula molato wa go se tshegiswe ka bapolisi ba Brooklyn.</s>

en: This is after Mkhize failed on three occasions to honour her subpoenas.
tsn: Se ke mo morago ga gore Mkhize a retelelwe makgetlho a le mararo go tlotla dipiletsatshekong tsa  gagwe.
mt0: <pad> Gone after Mkhize failed on three occasions to honour her subpoenas.</s>

en: The subpoenas were sent between February and the 1st of this month.
tsn: Dipiletsatshekong di rometswe magareng ga kgwedi ya Tlhakole le la di tsa kgwedi eno.
mt0: <pad> Subpoenas di romelwa magareng ga Feberware le 1 ya kgwedi eno.</s>

en: President Cyril Ramaphosa engages with the media on various issues, following his reply to the debate on his Presidency Budget Vote for 2021/2022.
tsn: Moporesidente Cyril Ramaphosa o ikopanya le ba metswedi ya dikgang ka ga dintlha tse di farologaneng go latela karabo ya gagwe, ka ga tekanyetsokabo ya gagwe ya moporesidente 2021/2022
mt0: <pad> President Cyril Ramaphosa engages with the media on various issues, after his response to the debate on his Presidency Budget Vote for 2021/2022.</s>

en: The Public Protectors office says it will initiate contempt proceedings against Health Minister Zweli Mkhize, following his failure to honour a subpoena to give evidence and produce documents.
tsn: Kantoro ya Basireletsi ba Setšhaba ya re e tla simolola dingangisano tsa tsamaiso ya tsheko kgatlhanong le, Tona ya Boitekanelo Zweli Mkhize go latela go retelelwa ke go tlotla dipiletsatshekong tsa gagwe, go neela bopaki le go tlhagisa ditokomane.
mt0: <pad> Office ya Public Protectors e re e tla simolola ditsamaiso tsa go tlhoka boammaaruri kgatlhanong le Tonakgolo ya Botlhokwapele Zweli Mkhize, ka ntlha ya go re o ne a sa direle molato wa go naya tshedimosetso le go dira dipego.</s>

en: This is in relation to an investigation into allegations of undue delay and/or failure by his department to implement the recommendations of the Report of the Clinical Associate National Task Team in 2017.
tsn: Se ke ka ntlha ya patlisiso e e ka ga ditatofatso tse di gogelwang morago le/ kgotsa  go retelelwa ga lefapha la gagwe go tsenya tirisong dikatlenegiso tsa pegelo ya Clinical Associate National Task Team ka 2017.
mt0: <pad> Go tswa mo tshekatsheko ya go re ba seka ba dira dithulaganyo tsa National Task Team ka 2017</s>

en: In a statement, the Public Protectors office says Mkhize has failed to honour the subpoena on three occasions.
tsn: Mo tlhagisong, kantoro ya Basireletsi ba Setšhaba e rile Mkhize o paletswe ke go tlotla dipiletsatshekong makgetlo a le mararo.
mt0: <pad> Go tswa mo go sekasekang, offisi ya Moatlhodi wa Setjhaba e re Mkhize o ne a sa direle molato wa go batla go tshwara dikgwebo ka makgetlo a marataro.</s>

en: It says a case will be opened against him at the Brooklyn police station in Hatfield, Pretoria this week.
tsn: E re kgetse e tlaa bulwa kgatlhanong le ena kwa seteišheneng sa mapodisi sa mo Brooklyn Hatfield, Pretoria mo bekeng eno.
mt0: <pad> It says a case will be opened against him at the Brooklyn police station in Hatfield, Pretoria this week.</s>

en: Public Protectors office to initiate contempt proceedings against Dr Zweli Mkhize.
tsn: Kantoro ya Basireletsi ba Setšhaba e tla simolola dikgogakgogano mo ditsamaisong kgatlhanong le Ngk Zweli Mkhize.
mt0: <pad> Office of the Public Protector to initiate contempt proceedings against Dr Zweli Mkhize</s>

en: Meanwhile, Democratic Alliance (DA) shadow Minister of Health, Siviwe Gwarube, has laid criminal charges against Mkhize at the Cape Town Central Police Station.
tsn: Re sa le foo, Tona ya Boitekaneloya Democartic Alliance (DA), Siviwe Gwarube, o butse kgetse ya molato wa bosenyi  kgatlhanong le Mkhize kwa seteišheneng sa mapodisi kwa Toropong ya Kapa.
mt0: <pad> Mme a re o sa itse, o tla boela kwa go ba ga o itse.</s>

en: This after revelations that Mkhizes; family may have benefited from proceeds of a R150 million tender that his department awarded to communications company Digital Vibes.
tsn: Morago ga ditshenolo tsa gore lelapa la Mkhizes le ka tswa le ungwile go tswa dikunong tsa thendara ya dimilione tse R150 tse lefapha la gagwe le di neetseng setlamo sa tlhaeletsano Digital vibes
mt0: <pad> Gone after revelations that Mkhizes' family may have benefited from proceeds of a R150 million tender that his department awarded to the communication company Digital Vibes.</s>

en: The contract was for work related to the National Health Insurance programme and governments response to the coronavirus pandemic.
tsn: Konteraka e ne e amana le lenaneo la  Inšhorense ya Boitekanelo ba Bosetšhaba le tsibogelo ya mebuso go leroborobo la khorona.
mt0: <pad> Go ne go tshwerwe kontraka ya tiro e e mabapi le tshebediso ya National Health Insurance le dikarabo tsa mmuso ka coronavirus pandemic.</s>

en: On Wednesday, President Cyril Ramaphosa said hes dealing with allegations around Zweli Mkhize and the irregular R150 million Digital Vibes contract.
tsn: Ka Laboraro, Moporesidente Cyril Ramaphosa o rile o tshwaragane  le ditatofatso  tse di amaganang le Zweli Mkhize le kontaraka e e sa tlhomamang ya dimilione di ka nna R150 tsa Digital Vibes
mt0: <pad> Ka Labobedi, Moporesidente Cyril Ramaphosa o re o tlhatlhoba dikgopolo tse di mabapi le Zweli Mkhize le kontrake ya Digital Vibes ya R150 million e seng molaong.</s>

en: There has been mounting pressure from the DA and other parties for Mkhize to step down or be removed by Ramaphosa.
tsn: Go na le kgatelelo e e oketsegang go tswa DA le mekgatlho e  mengwe gore Mkhize a role tiro kgotsa tloswe ke Ramaphosa.
mt0: <pad> Go na le go batla go re Mkhize a tlogele tiro, kgotsa Ramaphosa a mo tlosa.</s>

en: President Cyril Ramaphosa is replying to the debate on the Presidencys budget vote for 2021/22, on Thursday afternoon.
tsn: Moporesidente Cyril Ramaphosa o araba dingangisano ka ga tekanyetsokabo ya Poresitente ya 2021/22, ka maitseboa a Labone
mt0: <pad> President Cyril Ramaphosa o tla araba dipuisano ka madi a bopresidente a 2021/22, ka Laboraro maitseboa.</s>

en: This follows his presentation of the budget allocation on Wednesday.
tsn: Se se latela morago ga puo ya gagwe ya tekanyetsokabo ya ka Laboraro.

en: The National Assembly has granted the Ad Hoc Committee on the amendment of Section 25 of the Constitution a 30-day extension to complete its work.
tsn: Kokoano Bosetšhaba e ntshitse Komiti ya nakwana ya Tlhabololo ya karolo 25 ya katoloso ya Molaotheo ya matsatsi a le 30 go fetsa tiro ya yona.
mt0: <pad> The National Assembly has extended the Ad Hoc Committee on the Amendment of Section 25 of the Constitution by 30 days to complete its work.</s>

en: The Committee, tasked with coming up with legislation to enable amendments that will allow for land expropriation, made the request for the extension earlier this week.
tsn: Komiti e neetswe tiro ya go tla ka molao go kgontsha tlhabololo e e tla letlang tlhakolothoto ya lefatshe, go dirilwe kopo ya katoloso mo bekeng e.
mt0: <pad> Go simolola ka Laboraro, Komiti e e ikarabellang go dira molao wa go letla diphetogo tse di tla letlang go kgaolwa ga mafelo a a nang le dithoto, e ne ya kopa go okeletsa nako ya yone go re e kgone go letla go kgaolwa ga mafelo a a nang le dithoto.</s>

en: Its lifespan ended at midnight on Monday.
tsn: Botshelo jwa yona bo fedile ka bosigogare jwa Mosupologo.
mt0: <pad> Go tswa kwa go yona, botshelo jwa yona bo fedile ka ntlha ya go re o ne o sa itse.</s>

en: The Chairpersons in the National Assembly, Cedrick Frolick, says this doesn’t change the Committees mandate.
tsn: Baduladitulo ka mo Kokoanong ya Bosetšhaba, Cedrick Frolick, o rile se ga se fetole taolelo ya Komiti.
mt0: <pad> Chairpersons in the National Assembly, Cedrick Frolick, says this doesn’t change the Committees mandate.</s>

en: The mandate of the Committee will remain the same.
tsn: Taolelo ya Komiti e tla nna jalo.
mt0: <pad> Go tla nna jalo ka thata go re Komiti e nne le maikarabelo a a tshwanang.</s>

en: The Committee will be re-established and asked to report back end of August although they requested a 30-day extension, we are mindful that the House going into recess and even if they complete it in 30 days, the report would be there and wait for us when we return in August.
tsn: Komiti e tla nna diriwa sešwa mme ga kopiwa gore ba boe ka pegelo mo bokhutlong jwa kgwedi ya Phatwe, le fa ba kopile katoloso ya  matsatsi a le 30, re a itse gore Kgotla e tlile go nna maikhutsong le  fa ba ka fetsa mo matsatsing a le 30, pegelo e tla nna teng mme ya re emela fa re boa ka kgwedi ya Phatwe.
mt0: <pad> Komiti e tla boela morago ka kgwedi ya Motsheganong, le fa ba ne ba kopa go okeletsa dikgwedi tse 30, re itse gore ntlo ya matlo e a tswa mo tsenang-teng mme le fa ba ne ba ka dira seo ka matsatsi a le 30, ga re itse gore o tla nna teng mme o re letle go re emetse fa re boela morago ka Motsheganong.</s>

en: Parliament held public oral hearings into the proposal to amend Section 25 of the Constitution.
tsn: Palamente e ne e tshwere ditheetso tsa setšhaba tsa molomo ka go fetola tshitshinyo ya go tlhabolola Karolo 25 ya Molaotheo.
mt0: <pad> Parliament held public oral hearings on the proposed amendment of Article 25 of the Constitution.</s>

en: This follows a request by the Democratic Alliance (DA) to allow oral submissions on the proposed constitutional amendment.
tsn: Se se latela kopo e e dirilweng ke Democratic Alliance (DA) go dumelela ditlhagiso tsa molomo mo go tshitshintsweng ya Tlhabololo ya Molaotheo.
mt0: <pad> Go latela go re ga a letlelelwa go dira ditshwaelo ka fa molaong wa molaotheo, Democratic Alliance (DA) e batlang go letla ditshwaelo ka fa molaong wa molaotheo.</s>

en: The Ad Hoc Committee handling the matter has received over 200 000 written submissions.
tsn: Komiti ya nakwana e e tshwaraganeng le kgang e e amogetse dingongorego di feta 200 000 tse di kwadilweng.
mt0: <pad> Go tswa go ba ga re itse, Komiti ya Ad Hoc e e tshwarang kgang e e amogetse dikopo tse di fetang 200 000 tsa go kwala ka fa go kwadilweng.</s>

en: It is currently processing the proposal to amend the Constitution to give effect to land expropriation without compensation.
tsn: Ga jaana e tsamaisa tshitshinyo go tlhabolola Molaotheo go diragatsa molao wa go amogiwa dithoto kwa ntle ga tuelo.
mt0: <pad> Gompieno e tlhatlhoba go fetola Molaotheo go dira gore go kgaolwa ga ditsha ntle le tshenyeletso.</s>

en: There is currently a huge debate on the feasibility of the amendment.
tsn: Jaanong go na le ngangisano e e boitshegang mo ya tlhabololo.
mt0: <pad> Go na le dipuisano tse dintsi ka go re a phetogo e e kgonegang.</s>

en: However, labour federation Cosatu says it supports the Amendment and Expropriation Bill.
tsn: Le fa go ntse jalo, mokgatlho wa badiri wa COSATU o re o tshegetsa tlhabololo le molao wa go Amogiwa Dithoto.
mt0: <pad> Fa e le gore, setlhopha sa badiri sa Cosatu se re se tshegetsa Molao wa Go Amana le go Tlhotlheletsa</s>

en: The highest law in the land
tsn: Molao o o kwa godimo mo lefatsheng
mt0: <pad> Molao wa ntlha wa naga ke molao wa botlhokwa thata.</s>

en: The Constitution of the Republic of South Africa is Act
tsn: Molaotheo wa Rephaboliki ya Aforika Borwa ke Molao
mt0: <pad> The Constitution of the Republic of South Africa is the Constitution of the Republic of South Africa.</s>

en: No 108 of Parliament of 1996.
tsn: Molao wa 108 wa Palamente wa 1996.
mt0: <pad> No 108 of Parliament of 1996</s>

en: It is the highest law in the land.
tsn: Ke molao o o kwa godimo mo lefatsheng.
mt0: <pad> Ke molao o mogolo mo lefatsheng.</s>

en: And therefore any law that is not in line with the Constitution becomes invalid unless and until it is rectified to pass constitutional muster.
tsn: Ka jalo molao o mongwe le o mongwe o o sa tsamaelaneng le Molaotheo ga o dire, ntle le gore le go fitlha o baakanngwa go kgona go falola ditlhatlhobo tsa Molaotheo.
mt0: <pad> Ke ka moo molao o mongwe le o mongwe o o sa dumelane le Molaotheo o tla nna wa go se tshegetsa go fitlha o tlhabololwa go feta molaotheo.</s>

en: The Bill of Rights in Chapter 2 remains the cornerstone of democracy as outlined in the Constitution.
tsn: Molaotlhomo wa Ditshwanelo mo Kgaolo 2 e santse e le motheo wa temokerasi jaaka o tlhagisitswe mo Molaotheong.
mt0: <pad> Bill of Rights in Chapter 2 remains the cornerstone of democracy as outlined in the Constitution.</s>

en: It is a chapter that makes provision for the protection of human dignity, the right to life, freedom of expression, equality, privacy, freedom of religion, freedom of belief and opinion.
tsn: Ke kgaolo e e dirang tlamelo ya go sireletsa seriti sa botho, tshwanelo ya botshelo, Kgololosego ya tlhagisomaikutlo, tekatekano, kgololosego ya sephiri, kgololosego ya bodumedi, kgololosego ya tumelo le kakanyo.
mt0: <pad> Go nna le boitshepo jwa motho, go nna le tshwanelo ya go tshela, kagiso ya go bua, go nna le tekatekano, kagiso ya bodumedi, kagiso ya tumelo le maikutlo.</s>

en: Other freedoms include political rights, freedom of trade, occupation and profession.
tsn: Tse dingwe tsa dikgololosego di akaretsa ditshwanelo tsa sepolotiki, kgololosego ya kgwebo, ditiro le borutegi.
mt0: <pad> Ditshwanelo tse dingwe di akaretsa tshwanelo ya sepolotiki, tshwanelo ya kgwebo, tshwanelo ya go nna le tiro, tshwanelo ya go nna le bokgoni le bokgoni.</s>

en: However, all these rights are subject to limitations.
tsn: Le fa go ntse jalo, ditshwanelo tsotlhe di ya ka ditekanyetso
mt0: <pad> Gone, these rights are subject to limitations.</s>

en: To change most of the Bill of Rights requires a two-thirds majority vote.
tsn: Go fetola bontsi jwa Molaotlhomo wa Ditshwanelo ono go tlhoka bontsi jwa diboutu di le peditharong.
mt0: <pad> Go fetola bontsi jwa Bill of Rights go tlhoka thata ya ditlhopha tse pedi-tharong.</s>

en: One example that requires a two-thirds vote is the property clause under Section 25 of the Constitution.
tsn: Sekao se le sengwe se se tlhoka diboutu di le peditharong ke polelwana ya semolao ya thoto, ke polelwana e e ka fa tlase ga Karolo 25 ya Molaotheo.
mt0: <pad> Sekai e e tlhokang go re batho ba le bobedi ba tsheletseng ba dume, ke molawana wa boipuso ka karolwana ya 25 ya Molaotheo.</s>

en: It is under Section 25 where the expropriation of land and property is provided for.
tsn: Ke ka fa tlase ga molawana wa Karolo 25 mo tlhakolothoto ya lefatshe le dithoto e neetsweng teng.
mt0: <pad> Go nna ka fa tlase ga Setlhogo 25 moo go kgaotsweng ditsha le dithoto.</s>

en: However, this clause is currently being amended by the Ad Hoc Committee to Amend Section 25 of the Constitution to allow the Expropriation of Land Without Compensation.
tsn: Le gale, polelo ya semolao e a tlhabololwa ke Komiti ya nakwana go tlhabolola Karolo 25 ya Molaotheo go letla tlhakolothoto ya lefatshe kwa ntle ga tuelo.
mt0: <pad> A o itse, molawana o o santse o fetolwa ke Komiti ya Ad Hoc go Fetola Kgaolo 25 ya Molaotheo go letla go re go kgaolwa ga lefatshe go se na tshenyetso.</s>

en: The Section 25 amendment is currently being done through the Constitution’s 18th Amendment Bill.
tsn: Tlhabololo ya Karolo 25 ga jaana e dirwa ka tsamaiso ya Molaotheo wa Molaotlhomo o o Tlhabolotsweng wa bo 18.
mt0: <pad> Go fetola Setlhogo 25 go ntse go dirwa ka molao wa Molaotheo wa 18th Amendment Bill.</s>

en: This means it is the 18th time that the South African Constitution is being amended.
tsn: Se se kaya gore ke lekgetlo la bo18 Molaotheo wa Aforikaborwa o o tlhabololwa.
mt0: <pad> Go raya go re ke la bo18 la ntlha la fa molaotheo wa Afrika Borwa o fetolwa.</s>

tsn: Tlaleletso ya pego ka Mercedes Besent.
