en: He says if the judges of South Africa want to command respect from him and his family, they will have to do the right thing in prosecuting him in the corruption trial.
tsn: A re fa baatlhodi ba AforikaBorwa ba batla tlotlo go tswa mo go ena le ba lelapa la gagwe, ba tlaa tshwanelwa ke go dira se se siameng ka tsheko ya gagwe ya bobodu.
mt0: <pad> O re fa baatlhodi ba Afrika Borwa ba batla go amega mo go ene le lelapa la gagwe, ba tla tshwanela go dira se se siameng ka go mo latofadiwa ka tsheko ya kgwebo ya bogodu.</s>

en: Zuma was addressing a number of his supporters gathered in Pietermaritzburg after he appeared on fraud and corruption charges.
tsn: Zuma o ne a bua le ba ema nokeng ba le mmalwa ba gagwe ba ba neng ba kopane kwa Pietermaritzburg morago ga go tlhagelela ka ga tsietso le bonweenwee.
mt0: <pad> Zuma o ne a bua le ba bangwe ba batlhanke ba gagwe ba ba kgobokaneng kwa Pietermaritzburg morago ga go re a tle fa pele ga tshenyetso le bokgothokgotho.</s>

en: The former President says he wants the trial to come to a close soon.
tsn: Moporesidente a re o batla go nna le tsheko e e gaufi le go fela ka bonako.
mt0: <pad> O batla go re tsheko e nne ya fela ka bonako.</s>

en: I wish the law could stop being biased because its becoming a trend for the justice system to take sides.
tsn: Ke eletsa e kete molao o ka emisa go nna le kgethololo, ka ntlha ya gore e nna setlwaedi gore tsamaiso ya bosiamisi  e tseye letlhakore.
mt0: <pad> I wish the law could stop being biased because its becoming a trend for the justice system to take sides.</s>

en: Let that come to an end, so that we can respect the law.
tsn: A se se ye kwa bokhutlong, gore re tle re kgone go tlotla molao.
mt0: <pad> Lets go that end, so we can respect the law.</s>

en: If those who are in authority dont respect us, how are we going to respect them.
tsn: Fa ba ba leng mo taolong ba sa re tlotle, re tlile go ba tlotla jaang.
mt0: <pad> Fa ba ba nang le thata ga ba re tlotle, re tla nna re ba tlotlhe jang?</s>

en: Zuma pleads not guilty
tsn: Zuma o ipolela a se molato.
mt0: <pad> Zuma pleads not guilty</s>

en: Zuma and French arms company Thales are facing fraud, corruption, racketeering and money laundering charges in connection with the 1999 multi-billion rand arms deal.
tsn: Zuma le kompone ya dibetsa ya kwa Fora Thales, ba lebagane le tsietso, bobodu, le kgwebo e e sa siamang le tsamaiso ya madi a a duelwang a a seng a semolao malebana le dibilione tsa diranta tsa dibetsa tsa 1999.
mt0: <pad> Zuma le khampani ya dibetsa ya kwa France Thales ba latofadiwa ka go tlola molao wa bogodu, bokgothokgotho, go kgoreletsa madi le go latlhegelwa ga madi ka ntlha ya theko ya dibetsa ya 1999 ya dibilione tse dintsi tsa rand.</s>

en: The trial has been postponed to July 19
tsn: Tsheko e e buseditswe morago go Phukwi 19.
mt0: <pad> Tsheko e ne ya boela morago go ya ka kgwedi ya Julai.</s>

en: SABC News Political Editor Mwandile Mbeje gives analyses on the trial.
tsn: Motseleganyi wa sepolotiki wa dikgang tsa SABC Mwandile Mbeje o neela ka tshekatsheko ya tsheko.
mt0: <pad> SABC News Political Editor Mwandile Mbeje gives analysis on the trial.</s>

en: The African National Congress (ANC) Interim Provincial Committee (IPC), in the North West, has instructed five party members to step aside.
tsn: Komiti ya nakwana ya Porofense (IPC) ya African National Congress (ANC), kwa Porofenseng ya Bokone Bophirima, e laetse maloko a le matlhano go emela kwa thoko.
mt0: <pad> The African National Congress (ANC) Interim Provincial Committee (IPC), in the North West, has instructed five members of the party to step aside.</s>

en: The members based in Tsetse village outside Mahikeng are implicated along with 11 others in serious charges, including attempted murder.
tsn: Maloko a tswang  kwa motseng wa Tsetse kwa ntle ga Mahikeng a amega mmogo le ba ba lesome le bongwe (11) mo ditatofatsong tse di masisi tse di akaretsang le maiteko a polao.
mt0: <pad> Members of Tsetse village outside Mahikeng are implicated along with 11 others in serious charges, including attempted murder.</s>

en: One of them is the branch secretary, while the others are senior government officials.
tsn: Mongwe wa bona ke mokwaledi wa leloko, fa ba bangwe e le batlhankedi bagolo ba mmuso.
mt0: <pad> A le mongwe ke mosebetsi wa setlhopha, fa ba bangwe ke baofisiri ba bagolo ba mmuso.</s>

en: Provincial Coordinator for the ANC IPC, Hlomane Chauke, says the five accused have already been served with letters, informing them of the decision.
tsn: Mogokaganyi wa porofense wa ANC IPC, Hlomane Chauke, a re balatofadiwa ba le batlhano ba setse ba amogetse makwalo, go ba sedimosetsa ka tshwetso.
mt0: <pad> Gone gone, the five accused have been sent letters, informing them of the decision.</s>

en: Chauke says, In terms of the resolution of the conference and guidelines we have already communicated with the five comrades that they need to step aside from the activities of the organisation
tsn: Chauke  a re, go ya ka tshwetso ya kopano le dikaedi re setse re buisane le makhomoreite a le tlhano gore ba tlhoka go emela kwa thoko mo ditirong tsa mokgatlho.
mt0: <pad> Chauke says, Go ya ka ditshwetso tsa kopano le ditaelo re setse re boleletse bagolodi ba bongwe ba go re ba tshwanetse go nna kgakala le tiro ya bone.</s>

en: So we have communicated with them in terms of Rule 25. 7 that they need to step aside in terms of ANC activities.
tsn: Ka jalo re buisane le bona go ya ka molawana wa 25.7, gore ba tlhoka go emela kwa thoko mo ditirong tsa ANC.
mt0: <pad> Re ba boleletse go ya ka Molao 25.7 gore ba tshwanetse go nna kgolegong mabapi le ditiro tsa ANC.</s>

en: SABC Reporter, Patrick Dintwa has more on the story.
tsn: Mmegadikgang wa SABC Patrick Dintwa o tshwere gontsi ka ga kgang e.
mt0: <pad> Go a few days ago, a SABC Reporter, Patrick Dintwa has more on the story.</s>

en: On Wednesday, the South African Communist Party (SACP) in Limpopo urged all ANC members affected by the step aside resolution to comply.
tsn: Ka Laboraro, mokgatlho wa South African Communist (SACP) kwa Limpopo o rotloeditse maloko otlhe a ANC a a amilweng ke kgato ya go emela kwa thoko go obamela molao.
mt0: <pad> Gompieno, setlhopha sa South African Communist Party (SACP) sa Limpopo se kgothaletse banna ba ANC ba ba amegileng ke molawana wa go tlogela go tshegetsa.</s>

en: According to the party, only one of eight affected ANC members in Limpopo have heeded the call voluntarily, while others were served with suspension notice.
tsn: Go ya ka mokgatlho, ke a le mongwe fela mo malokong a le robedi a ANC kwa Limpopo a a amegileng, yo o utlwileng boikuelo , fa ba bangwe ba tlametswe ka kitsiso ya kemiso
mt0: <pad> Go ya ka setlhopha, o le mongwe wa baemedi ba ANC ba le robedi ba ba amegileng kwa Limpopo o amogetse go re ba tloge, fa ba bangwe ba ne ba romelwa go nna le kitso ya go kgaolwa.</s>

en: The SACP says the whole country expects them to comply:
tsn: Mokgatlho wa SACP o re naga yotlhe e solofela gore ba tlaa obamela molao.
mt0: <pad> The SACP says that the whole country expects them to comply.</s>

en: Last week, suspended ANC Secretary-General Ace Magashule filed court papers challenging the constitutionality of the step aside resolution that resulted in his suspension.
tsn: Mo bekeng e e fetileng, mokwaledi-kakaretso wa ANC yo o emisitsweng mo tirong Ace Magashule, o tsentse dimpampiri tsa kgotlhatshekelo e e tlhaselang tshwetso ya Molaotheo wa kgato ya go emisa tiro.
mt0: <pad> Last week, suspended ANC Secretary-General Ace Magashule filed court papers challenging the constitutionality of the step aside resolution that resulted in his suspension.</s>

en: All leaders of the governing party who face charges relating to fraud, corruption and money laundering had to step aside from their positions.
tsn: Baeteledipele botlhe ba lekoko le le busang ba ba lebaganeng le ditatofatso tse di amanang le tsietso, bobodu, le tsamaiso e e sa siamang ya madi, ba ne ba tshwanelwa ke go emela kwa thoko mo maemong a bona.
mt0: <pad> All leaders of the governing party who face charges relating to fraud, corruption and money laundering had to step aside from their positions.</s>

en: Magashule refused to do so and was suspended by the ANC NEC.
tsn: Magashule o ganne go dira jalo mme morago a sekegwa ke ANC NEC.
mt0: <pad> Magashule o ne a gana go dira jalo mme o ne a kgaolwa ke ANC NEC.</s>

en: Its been 15 years since allegations of corruption first surfaced against former President Jacob Zuma.
tsn: Ke dingwaga di le 15 fa e sa le ditatofatso di tlhagelela kgatlhanong le moporesitente wa maloba Jacob Zuma.
mt0: <pad> 15 years ago, a corruption allegations surfaced against Jacob Zuma, the former president of South Africa.</s>

en: Now his trial finally started in the Pietermaritzburg Court on Wednesday.
tsn: Jaanong tsheko ya gagwe e simolotse kwa kgotlhatshekelong ya kwa Pietermaritzburg ka Laboraro.
mt0: <pad> Gone gone, his trial finally began in the Pietermaritzburg Court on Wednesday.</s>

en: Zuma and French arms manufacturer Thales, both pleaded not guilty to the charges they face including racketeering, corruption, fraud and money laundering in connection with the controversial arms deal of the 1990s.
tsn: Zuma le badiri ba dibetsa ba kwa France, Thales, ga ba a ipona molato mo ditatofatsong tsa kwebo e e seng molaong, tsietso, bobodu le tsamaiso e e seng molaong ya madi malebana le thekiso ya dibetsa ya dingwaga tsa bo 1900.
mt0: <pad> Zuma le khampani ya dibetsa ya kwa Fora, Thales, ba ne ba re ga ba molato wa go nna le ditsala tse di akaretsang racketeering, corruption, fraud and money laundering in connection with the controversial 1990s arms deal.</s>

en: The trial has been postponed to the 19th of July for argument, in the special plea application brought by Zuma against lead State Prosecutor senior counsel advocate Billy Downer.
tsn: Tsheko e buseditswe kwa morago go di 19 tsa Phukwi, ka kopo ya boikuelo e e kgethegileng e e tlisiwang ke Zuma kgatlhanong le motšhutšhisi yo mogolo wa mmuso , mmueledi Billy Downer.
mt0: <pad> Tsheko e ne ya boela morago go ya ka la 19 Julai go re go nne le dikgopolo, mo go kgolaganyong ya go ikgolola ga Zuma kgatlhanong le molaodi wa mmusisi wa naga Billy Downer.</s>

en: Hearing adjourned until 19 July 2021.
tsn: Theetso e buseditswe morago go fitlha ka di 19 July 2021.
mt0: <pad> Go await the hearing on 19 July 2021.</s>

en: Former Presidents legal team led by Advocate Dali Mpofu has, through a statement in terms of a special plea, accused State Advocate Billy Downer of lacking independence and impartiality.
tsn: Setlhopa sa molao sa moporesidente wa maloba se se eteletsweng pele ke mmueledi Dali Mpofu, go ya ka mabaka a boikuelo jo bo kgethegileng se latofaditse mmueledi wa puso Billy Downer ka tlhaela go ikemela ka nosi le go se tseye letlhakore.
mt0: <pad> Billy Downer, attorney general of the state, does not have impartiality and independence.</s>

en: Mpofu says that Zuma had been, in his own words, crying for his day in court and offered up a lengthy explanation as to why his client believed he would not receive a fair trial as long as Advocate Downer led the States case.
tsn: Mpofu a re Zuma o ne, go ya ka mantswe a gagwe, a lelela letsatsi la gagwe kwa kgotlhatshekelong mme gape a tlhalosa gore ke ka ntlha ya eng modirelwa wa gagwe a sa amogele tsheko e e lolameng fa mmueledi Downer a tsamaisa kgetse ya puso.
mt0: <pad> Mpofu says that Zuma had been, in his own words, crying for his day in court and offered up a long explanation of why his client believed he would not receive a fair trial as long as Advocate Downer led the States case.</s>

en: There are facts and circumstances that give me a reasonable impression that Mr. Downer had conducted himself in a manner that lacks the independence and impartiality that is necessary for a lawful prosecution.
tsn: Go na le dintlha le maemo tse di nnayang mabaka a a utlwalang a gore Rre  Downer o ne a itshwere ka mokgwa o o bontshang a sa kgone go ikemela ka nosi le go tlhoka go tsaya letlhakore mo go leng botlhokwa mo tiragatsong ya molaong.
mt0: <pad> Go na le dikgopolo le maemo a a ntlhomamisegang gore Moporesidente Downer o ne a itshwara ka tsela e e sa nang le boipuso le go se ikgathalele go tshwanela go tshegetsa molato wa molao.</s>

en: Mr. Downer failed to uphold the standard and prosecutorial independence needed to secure that my trial is fair and conducted in accordance with the Constitution, Mr. Downer placed himself as a witness against me when he filed an affidavit in support of the Democratic Alliance application to review and set aside a decision by the NPA to terminate my prosecution.
tsn: Rre. Downer o reteletswe ke go tshegetsa maemo a a tlhokegang go sireletsa boikemedi jo bo tlhokegang go netefatsa gore tsheko ya me e lolame mme e tsamisiwa go ya ka Molaotheo, Rre Downers o ipeile ka boene go nna paki kgatlhanong le nna fa a ne a tsenya afidafiti  ya go tshegetsa kopo ya Democratic Alliance ya go sekaseka le go beela kwa thoko tshwetso ka NPA ya go fedisa tshekiso ya me.
mt0: <pad> Mr. Downer o ne a sa kgone go boloka melawana le boipuso jo bo tlhokang go netefatsa go re tsheko ya me e tshwanetse go nna e ntle le go dirwa ka molao wa Molaotheo, Mr. Downer o ne a ikgabisa ka go nna motlhanke fa a ne a kwala affidavit e tshegetsang go re go tlhatlhobetswe go fetsa tsheko ya me ka go dumela go re a tshwarwe ka go dumela molaotheo.</s>

en: Despite Zumas so-called Stalingrad tactics employed to use every legal aspect to his disposal to halt his prosecution, he failed to convince the courts that the charges should be dismissed due to alleged political interference in the states case against him.
tsn: Le fa Zuma a dirisitse maano a a bidiwang a botsipa a a a tsentsweng tirisong go dirisa dintlha tshotlhe tsa molao go emisa tsheko ya gagwe, o paletswe ke go dira gore dikgotlhatshekelo di dumele gore dikgetse tsa gagwe di beelwe kwa thoko ka ntlha ya sepolotiki mo kgetseng ya puso kgatlhanong le ena.
mt0: <pad> Go sa kgathalesege ditsela tsa ga Zuma tse a neng a di dirisitse go batla go emisa tsheko ya gagwe, o ne a palelwa ke go kgopela lekgotla go re molato wa gagwe o tshwanetse go tlosiwa ka ntlha ya go re go na le tlhotlheletso ya sepolotiki mo dikgethong tsa naga kgatlhanong le yena.</s>

en: Thales faces four charges, one of racketeering, two of corruption and one of money laundering.
tsn: Thales e lebane le dikgetse di le nne, nngwe ya kgwebo ya boferefere, tse pedi tsa bobodu le e le nngwe ya tsamaiso ya madi a a sa tlhomamang.
mt0: <pad> Thales o lebana le melato e meraro, e le nngwe ya racketeering, e le nngwe ya corruption le e le nngwe ya money laundering.</s>

en: State accuses Zuma and Thales of organising and conducting a racketeering enterprise, a charge which carries a maximum sentence of 25 years imprisonment.
tsn: Puso e latofatsa Zuma le Thales ka go rulaganya le go tsamaisa kwebo ya boferefere, molato o, o na le bogolo jwa katlholo ya dingwaga di le 25 kwa kgolegelong.
mt0: <pad> Gompieno, puso e latofatsa Zuma le Thales ka go re ba ne ba dirile kgwebo ya bogodu, molato o o tla tsamaisa lobaka lwa go kwala ga dikgwedi tse 25 mo kgolegong.</s>

en: The state alleges that Zuma received hundreds of payments amounting to millions of rands via his then financial adviser, convicted fraudster, Shabir Shaik, at the time of the arms deal acquisition process in the 1990s.
tsn: Puso e latofatsa Zuma ka go amogela makgolokgolo a dituelo tse dimilione tsa diranta go tswa go mogakolodi wa gagwe wa madi, yo o bonweng molato, Shabir Shaik, ka nako ya tsamaiso ya go fitlhela tsa dibetsa ka di ngwaga tsa bo 1990.
mt0: <pad> Go ya ka puso, Zuma o ne a amogela ditheko tse dintsi tse di lekanang le dimilione tsa rands ka motlhanke wa gagwe wa madi, Shabir Shaik, ka nako ya go reka dibetsa ka 1990s.</s>

en: The state alleges that Zuma received a bribe of R500 000 a year from Thales, facilitated by Shaik.
tsn: Puso e latofatsa Zuma gore o amogetse pipamolomo ya R500 000 ka ngwaga go tswa kwa Thales, e eteletswe pele ke shaik.
mt0: <pad> Go ya ka puso, Zuma o ne a amogela R500 000 ka ngwaga go tswa kwa Thales, e tshegetsang Shaik.</s>

en: Other charges against Zuma include fraudulent tax claims and returns, non-disclosure of financial assistance to Parliament and lying to the institution about meeting with representatives from the arms manufacturer.
tsn: Ditatofatso dingwe kgatlhanong le Zuma di akaretsa lekgetho, go se senole ya thuso ya madi go palamente, le go aketsa setheo ka kopano le baemedi ba go tswa  kwa modiring wa dibetsa
mt0: <pad> Dikgwebo tse dingwe kgatlhanong le Zuma di akaretsa go nna le ditsholofelo tsa madi tse di sa tlhaloganyesiwang, go se ka ga bontsha tshedimosetso ya madi go Palamente le go bua boammaaruri go Palamente ka go re o ne a kopana le baemedi ba mmotlana wa dibetsa.</s>

en: Advocate Downer has told the court the State was not yet ready to respond to the special plea, referring to the over 1 000-page document as voluminous.
tsn: Mmueledi Downer o boleletse kgotlhatshekelo gore puso e ne e ise e siamele go tsibogela kopo e e kgethegileng, ba lebisitse go tokomane e kgolo ya ditsebe tse di fetang 1 000.
mt0: <pad> Advocate Downer o boleletse kgotlatshekelo go re Mmuso ga o ise o ipaakanyetse go araba molato wa kgatlhanong, a tlhalosa tokomane ya ditlhogo tse di fetang 1000 jaaka e e boima.</s>

en: He says that it covered the lengthy litigation period.
tsn: A re e akareditse nako e telele ya tsheko.
mt0: <pad> O re e ne e akaretsa nako ya go sekaseka e telele.</s>

en: My Lord we then perused these papers and we are hard at work drafting our answer on these papers we have formed an attitude that the state is ready to put the charges to the accused and between my Learned Friend and the state agree than they will then tender their plea formally in court both the accused I must also mention that we also agreed the application in term of 106 I H is voluminous with thousand pages with annexes we all agreed that the state needs time to answer by the way of affidavits.
tsn: Morena wa me, morago ga moo re sekasekile dipamiri tse mme re dira ka thata go kwala karabo ya rona mo go tsona dipamiri tse, re tlhomile boitshwaro jwa gore puso e ikemisetse go baya ditatofatso go molatofadiwa  le magareng ga tsala ya me mme gape le puso e dumela gore morago ga foo e tlaa sekaseka kopo ya bona semmuso kwa kgotlhatshekelong rona rotlhe ke tshwanetse go bua gape gore re dumalane ka gore kopo ya maemo a 106 I ke e ntsi e bile e na le ditsebe di le dintsi. Rotlhe re dumalane ka gore, puso e tlhoka nako ya go araba ka mokgwa wa di afidafiti.
mt0: <pad> My Lord, we then perused these documents and we are hard at work drafting our answer on these documents we have formed an attitude that the state is ready to put the charges to the accused and between my Learned Friend and the state agree than they will then tender their plea formally in court both the accused</s>

en: The former Presidents son Edward Zuma in court to support his father.
tsn: Morwadia moporesidente wa maloba Edward Zuma o kwa kgotlhatshekelo go tshegetsa rraagwe.
mt0: <pad> Sona wa Moporesidente wa pele Edward Zuma o ya kgotlatshekong go tshegetsa tatagwe.</s>

en: Thales said in its plea explanation, denies that it was aware of any payments to Zuma via Shaik.
tsn: Thales e buile kwa tlhalosong ya kopo ya yona gore, e ganela gore e ne e itse ka ga dituelo tsa ga Zuma tse di tswang kwa go Shaik.
mt0: <pad> Thales, a go tlhalosiwa ka fa e tshegetsang ka teng, e ganetse go itse gore e ne e itse go re e ne e tseba madi a a neng a lefiwe Zuma ka Shaik.</s>

en: Thales contends that its payments to Shaiks businesses were legitimate business deals as a BEE partner in the arms deal.
tsn: Thales e buile gore dituelo tsa bona go dikgwebo tsa ga Shaik di ne di le mo molaong wa kgebo jaaka mogwebi mmogo wa dibetsa.
mt0: <pad> Thales e tlhalosa go re madi a yone a neela Shaiks ka ditheko tsa kgwebo e ne e le ditirelo tse di siamegang jaaka molekane wa BEE mo thekong ya masole.</s>

en: Downer served the indictment on both Zuma and Thales, represented by Pierre-Marie du Randt.
tsn: Downer o atlhotse Zuma le Thales, ba ba neng ba emetswe ke Pierre-Marie du Randt.
mt0: <pad> Downer served the indictment on both Zuma and Thales, represented by Pierre-Marie du Randt.</s>

en: Addressing the court, Counsel for Thales
tsn: Ba bua le kgotlhatshekelo, kgakololo ya Thales.
mt0: <pad> Go tswa kwa Thales, molaodi wa Thales o ne a bua le lekgotla.</s>

en: Prince Philip passed away this morning at Windsor Castle at the age of 99.
tsn: Kgosana Phillip o tlhokafetse mo mosong ono kwa Windsor Castle a le dingwaga di le 99.
mt0: <pad> Prince Philip o thokafetse gompieno mo go Windsor Castle a le dilemo tse 99</s>

en: The prince recently spent a month in hospital for heart-related surgery.
tsn: Kgosana o dutse kgwedi kwa bookelong ka mabaka a a amanang le karo ya pelo.
mt0: <pad> Prince o ne a fetsa kgwedi e le nngwe kwa bookelong go dira dithulaganyo tsa pelo.</s>

en: Flags are flying at half-mast in Britain.
tsn: Difolaga di fofisetswa kwa tlase Britain.
mt0: <pad> Go a flying flag at half-mast in Britain.</s>

en: Johnson says Prince Philip was a devoted consort to Queen Elizabeth.
tsn: Johnson o rile Kgosana Phillip o ne a ineetse mo molekaneng wa gagwe Kgosigadi Elizabeth.
mt0: <pad> Johnson says Prince Philip was a devoted consort to Queen Elizabeth.</s>

en: Prince Philip spent over seven decades by the Queens side after marrying in 1947.
tsn: Kgosana Phillip o dutse mo  letlhakoreng la Kgosigadi dingwaga di ka feta supa morago ga go nyala ka 1947.
mt0: <pad> Prince Philip o tsheditse dikgwedi tse supileng ka fa ntlheng ya Queen morago ga go nyalana le yena ka 1947.</s>

en: A statement from The Royal Family says further announcements would be made in due course.
tsn: Setatamente go tswa kwa Lelapa la Bogosi le rile dikitsiso tse dingwe di tla diriwa mo tsamaong ya nako.
mt0: <pad> Go ya ka sephatlalatso sa Lelapa la Bogosi, dikgopolo tse dingwe di tla bolelwa ka nako e e tshwanetseng.</s>

en: After earning the label as one of the hardest working royals, the Duke of Edinburgh retired from official royal duties with the full support of the Queen in 2017.
tsn: Morago ga go amogela leibole jaaka bogosi jo bo dirang ka thata, kgosana ya Borra Edinburgh o rotse tiro mo ditsamaiso tsa ditiro tsa morafe semmuso ka tshegetso e e tletseng ya Kgosigadi ka 2017.
mt0: <pad> Fa o sena go bona leina la go re ke mongwe wa baagisani ba ba dirang ka thata, Duke of Edinburgh o ile a tlogela maikarabelo a gae a gae a a kwa godimo a bogosi ka tshehetso ya Mmakgadikgadi ka 2017</s>

en: Spending a lifetime supporting The Queen, often a step or two behind her in public to observe protocol, they marked their 73rd wedding anniversary last November.
tsn: Ke feditse nako e telele ke tshegeditse Kgosigadi, ga ntsi ke le kgato e nngwe kgotsa tse pedi mo morago ga gagwe mo setšhabang go lebelela tsamaiso, ba tshwaile mengwaga e le 73 ba le mo nyalong Ngwanatsele o o fetileng.
mt0: <pad> Go tshegetsa botshelo jotlhe ba tshegetsang Mmakgosi, go le ga ntsi a tsamaya ka kgato e le nngwe morago ga yena mo setšhabeng go boloka molao, ba ketekile dingwaga tsa bone tsa bonyalane ka Mopitlwe wa ngwaga o fetileng.</s>

en: Born on the Greek Island of Corfu in 1921, Philip Mountbatten’s engagement to Princess Elizabeth, as she was then, was announced in 1947.
tsn: O belegwe mo setlhaketlhakeng sa Greek sa Corfu ka 1921, peeletso ya lenyalo la ga Phillip Mountbatten mo go Elizabeth, jaaka e ne e le ene, le begilwe  ka 1947.
mt0: <pad> Go tswa kwa setlhaketlhakeng sa Greek sa Corfu ka 1921, Philip Mountbatten o kgonne go nyalane le Princess Elizabeth, jaaka a ne a le teng, ka 1947.</s>

en: Philip had spent the Second World War serving in the Navy, where he was mentioned in dispatches for his bravery and quick thinking during fierce fighting.
tsn: Phillip o feditse Ntwa ya Bobedi ya Lefatshe a direla  sesole sa kwa Lewatleng, moo go neng ga umakilweng mo melaetseng ka bogale jwa gagwe le go akanya ka bonako ka nako ya ntwa.
mt0: <pad> Philip o ne a tshela Ntwa ya Bobedi ya Lefatshe ka Mophato wa Lewatle, kwa a neng a tlhalosiwa ka di-dispatches ka boitshoko le go akanya ka bonako mo dintweng tse di maswe.</s>

en: Wartime Prime Minister Winston Churchill described the royal wedding in November 1947 as a flash of colour in a country struggling to rebuild after the horrors of war.
tsn: Tonakgolo ya Motsi wa ntwa Winston Churchill o tlhalositse lenyalo la bogosi ka Ngwantsele 1947 jaaka tlhase ya mebala mo nageng e e sokotseng go ikaga sešwa morago ga masetlapelo a ntwa.
mt0: <pad> Winston Churchill, Prime Minister of the Wartime, described the royal wedding in November 1947 as a flash of colour in a country struggling to rebuild after the horrors of the war.</s>

en: His Royal Highness, as he became known from then onwards, was forced to cut his naval career short with the worsening health of his father in law, King George VI.
tsn: Kgosi e e tlotlegang, fa e ne ya itsiwe go simolola foo go ya pele, o ne a patelesega go tlogela tiro ya dikepe fa boitekanelo jwa ratswale bo oketsega, Kgosi GeorgeVI.
mt0: <pad> His Royal Highness, jaaka a ne a itsege go tloga ka nako eo, o ne a gapelediwa go fokotsa tiro ya gagwe ya bomasole ka lebaka la bolwetse jo bo ntseng bo senya jwa tatago-mogolo wa gagwe, King George VI.</s>

en: It was whilst in Kenya, on a tour of the Commonwealth, that Prince Philip told his wife that the King had died, and she was now queen.
tsn: E ne e le kwa Kenya, ka ketelo ya Kgweranoditšhaba, mo  Kgosana Phillip a boleletseng  mosadi wa gagwe gore Kgosi e tlhokofetse, jaanong ke ena Kgosigadi.
mt0: <pad> Go ne go le fa Prince Philip a rerile kwa Kenya, ka loeto lwa gagwe la Commonwealth, a bontsha mosadi wa gagwe gore Kgosi o thokafetse, mme o ne a nna kgoši.</s>

en: From the coronation in 1953 to when he retired from public duties in 2017, Prince Philip was never far from the Queens side.
tsn: Go tswa mo ka moletlo wa go tlhoma kgosi ka 1953 go fitlha fa a rola tiro tsa ditirelo tsa setšhaba ka 2017, Kgosana Phillip o ne a se kgakala le Kgosigadi.
mt0: <pad> From the coronation in 1953 to when he retired from public duties in 2017, Prince Philip never far from the Queen side.</s>

en: But as a husband, and not a King, he was left to forge his own path.
tsn: Fela jaaka monna wa gagwe, e seng Kgosi, o ne a tlogelwa go itirela tsela ya gagwe.
mt0: <pad> Ke mosadi, mme e seng Kgosi, o ne a letlwa go dira tsela ya gagwe.</s>

en: His socialising in 1950s London raised eyebrows, and his blunt and sometimes insensitive comments when on royal visits, were front page news.
tsn: Go dira botsalano ga gagwe ka 1950 kwa London go gakgamaletswe le go bua fela, nako nngwe go tshwaela mo go amang maikutlo fa ba le mo diketelong tsa bogosi, di ne di dira tsebe ya ntlha mo dikgang.
mt0: <pad> Go nna le batho ba bangwe ka ga gagwe go ne go tsosa matlho, mme dipego tsa gagwe tse di tlhamaletseng le tse di sa siamang fa a etetse bogosi, e ne e le dikgang tsa setlhogo.</s>

en: But his concern for the welfare of children and young adults became a driving force in his life.
tsn: Fela matshwenyego a gagwe mo tlhokomelong ya bana le bagolo ba ba potlana e nnile selo se se neelang botshelo ba gagwe maatla
mt0: <pad> Gone a simolola go nna le keletso ya go thusa bana le batho ba bannye.</s>

en: The scheme that still bears his name helped build self-confidence and create fun and friendships for young people from all walks of life.
tsn: Thulaganyo e e sa ntseng e na le leina la gagwe  e thusa go aga boitshepo le go itirela lethabo le botsalano mo go bašwa mo mefameng yotlhe ya botshelo.
mt0: <pad> Go simolola ka go re o ne a batla go nna le boitshepo jwa go itse, mme a dira gore batho ba bannye ba nne le monate le ditsala.</s>

en: With his Duke of Edinburgh Award scheme, he shaped and inspired the lives of countless young people and at literally tens of thousands of events, he fostered their hopes and encouraged their ambitions.
tsn: Ka sekgele sa setlamo sa  Duke sa Edinburgh sa gagwe, o bopile  le go rotloetsa  matshelo a batho ba baša mo  meletlong e ntsi, o godisitse boitshepo le go rotloetsa ditoro tsa bona.
mt0: <pad> Go tswa mo molaong wa gagwe wa Duke of Edinburgh Award, o ne a fetola le go kgopamisetsa matshelo a batho ba bannye ba bantsi, mme mo ditiragalo tse dikete-kete, o ne a tshegetsa maemo a bone a boitshepo le go kgothatsa maitsholo a bone.</s>

en: We remember the duke for all of this and above all for his steadfast support for Her Majesty the Queen, not just as her consort, by her side, every day of her reign, but as her husband, her strength and stay of more than 70 years, says Prime Minister Johnson.
tsn: Re gakologelwa Duke go tsotlhe tse mme godimo ga tsotlhe re gakologela tshegetso ya gagwe ya botshepegi mo go Motlotlegi Kgosigadi, e seng fela jaaka molekane wa gagwe, mo letlhakoreng la gagwe, letsatsi le letsatsi mo go buseng ga gawe, fela jaaka monna wa gagwe, maatla a gagwe le go dula le ena go feta mengwaga e le 70, Tonakgolo Johnson o re jalo
mt0: <pad> Re gopola Duke ka tsotlhe tseo le go feta, mme segolobogolo ka tshegetso ya gagwe e e tswelang pele mo go Mme Queen, e seng fela jaaka molekane wa gagwe, fa pele ga gagwe, letsatsi le letsatsi la taolo ya gagwe, mme jaaka monna wa gagwe, maatla a gagwe le go nna teng ga ga ga 70.</s>

en: The Duke of Edinburgh visited 143 countries in an official capacity, often on solo tours.
tsn: Kgosana ya Edinburgh e etetse dinaga di le 143 ka boemo jwa semmuso, gantsi ka ketelo ya bongwe.
mt0: <pad> The Duke of Edinburgh visited 143 countries in an official capacity, often on solo tours.</s>

en: Keen to modernise the monarchy, he had the ear of the longest reigning British monarch through some turbulent times.
tsn: Keen o ntšhwafatsa bogosi, o ne a na le tsebe e e busitseng nako e telele mo bogosing jwa British ka dinako tse di masisi.
mt0: <pad> Keen to modernise the monarchy, he had the ear of the longest reigning British monarch through some turbulent times.</s>

en: In later years his public role diminished, although palace insiders often said that his influence didn’t.
tsn: Mo dingwageng tse di tlang karolo ya gagwe mo setšhabeng e fokoditswe, le fa badudi ba ntlo ya bogosi ba rata gore tshusumetso ya gagwe ga e a fokotsega.
mt0: <pad> Fa a ne a simolola go nna le maemo a a kwa ntle, o ile a fokotsa seabe sa gagwe mo setjhabeng, le fa baagi ba palase ba ne ba re bontsi jwa bone bo ne bo na le maatla.</s>

en: Additional reporting by SABC News UK Correspondent, John Bevir.
tsn: Tlaleletso ya pego ka dikgang tsa SABC mokwaledi UK, John Bevir.
mt0: <pad> Go a further report by SABC News UK Correspondent, John Bevir.</s>

en: Prince Philip, husband of Queen Elizabeth and a leading figure in the British royal family for almost seven decades, has died aged 99, Buckingham Palace said on Friday.
tsn: Kgosana Phillip, monna wa Kgosigadi Elizabeth, sekao sa moeteledipele mo lelapeng la bogosi  la British mengwaga e  ka nna supa, o tlhokafetse a le  dingwaga di le 99, Ntlo ya Bogosi ya Buckingham e rile jalo ka Labotlhano.
mt0: <pad> Prince Philip, mosadi wa Queen Elizabeth le setho sa lelapa la Borithane ka bongwe le bongwe la mengwaga e supileng, o thokafetse a le 99 dingwaga, Buckingham Palace said on Friday.</s>

en: The Duke of Edinburgh, as he was officially known, had been by his wife’s side throughout her 69-year reign, the longest in British history, during which time he earned a reputation for a tough, no-nonsense attitude and a propensity for occasional gaffes.
tsn: Kgosana ya Edinburgh, jaaka a ne a itsewe semmuso, o ne a tlhola a le letlhakoreng la mosadi wa gagwe mo mengwageng e le 69 ya go busa, o busitse nako e telele mo hisetoring ya British, ka nako eo o itiretse leina le le tlotliwang ka thata, le le sa batleng boitshwaro jo bo maswe maikutlo le tlwaelo ya diphoso
mt0: <pad> O ne a tshegetsa mosadi wa gagwe mo go tsa puso ya gagwe ya dilemo tse 69 tse di fetileng, e leng yone e telele ka ditso tsa Borithane, ka nako ya puso ya gagwe e neng e le ya boraro e e nnang gone mo go tsa British history, mme o ne a itsege ka go nna le maikutlo a a thata, a se nang mafoko a a sa batleng go re a dire, le go nna le bokgoni jwa go dira diphoso ka dinako tse dingwe.</s>

en: It is with deep sorrow that Her Majesty The Queen announces the death of her beloved husband, His Royal Highness The Prince Philip, Duke of Edinburgh, the palace said in a statement.
tsn: Ke ka kutlobotlhoko gore Kgosigadi e e tlotlegang e bege loso la moratiwa, monna wa gagwe, Kgosi e e tlotlegang  Kgosana Phillip, Duke wa Edinburgh, polelo ka ntlo ya kgosi .
mt0: <pad> Go tswa mo go botlhokwa thata, Mme la Kgosi, Mme Elizabeth II, o phatlalatsa loso lwa monna wa gagwe yo o rategang, Prince Philip, Duke of Edinburgh, a re:</s>

en: His Royal Highness passed away peacefully this morning at Windsor Castle.
tsn: Kgosi e e Tlotlegang e  tlhokofetse ka kagiso mo mosong ono kwa Windsor Castle.
mt0: <pad> O o a tshela, o a tsofala.</s>

en: Further announcements will be made in due course.
tsn: Dikitsiso tse dingwe di tla itsisiwe mo nakong e e tlang.
mt0: <pad> Go tla nna le diphatlalatso tse dingwe ka nako ya teng.</s>

en: The Royal Family join with people around the world in mourning his loss.
tsn: Lelapa la bogosi le kopane le  batho go ralala lefatshe lotlhe lelela loso lwa gagwe.
mt0: <pad> The Royal Family joins with people around the world in mourning his loss.</s>

en: Discussing the mood outside Buckingham Palace following Prince Philips passing.
tsn: Atlhoatlho ya mowa o o renang kwa ntle ga ntlo ya bogosi ya Buckingham go latela loso lwa ga Kgosana Philips.
mt0: <pad> Go simolola go bua ka maikutlo a a kwa ntle ga Buckingham Palace morago ga loso lwa Prince Philips.</s>

en: A Greek prince, he married Elizabeth in 1947 playing a key role in modernising the monarchy in the post-World War Two period, and behind the walls of Buckingham Palace being the one key figure the queen could turn to and trust.
tsn: Kgosana ya Segerika, o nyetse Elizabeth ka 1947 a tshameka karolo e e botlhokwa mo go ntšhafatsa bogosi mo dipakeng tsa Ntwa ya Bobedi e e fetileng, le mo morago ga dipota tsa ntlo ya bogosi ya Buckingham e e neng e le lefelo le le botlhokwa le  Kgosigadi a ka  tshabelang go lona mme a le tshepa.
mt0: <pad> A prince ya Greek, o ne a nyalane le Elizabeth ka 1947 mme o ne a nna le seabe se segolo mo go modernising the monarchy during the post-World War Two period, and behind the walls of Buckingham Palace being the one key figure the queen could turn to and trust.</s>

en: He has, quite simply, been my strength and stay all these years, Elizabeth said in a rare personal tribute to Philip made in a speech marking their 50th wedding anniversary in 1997.
tsn: O ne a le, ga bonolo, e le maatla a me mme o dutse dingwaga tsotlhe tse, Elizabeth ka sebele o akgola Phillip ka tsela e e kgethegileng,  a neela puo ya gagwe a tshwaya dingwaga di le 50 tsa segopotso sa lenyalo la bona ka 1997.
mt0: <pad> O ntse a nna maatla a me le go tshegetsa mo dingwageng tseo tsotlhe, Elizabeth o buile ka tsela e e sa tlwaelegang ka yone ka 1997.</s>

en: Chairperson of the Music Publishing Association of South Africa David Alexander says local musicians are struggling to make ends meet and are desperate for an intervention.
tsn: Modulasetulo wa Mokgatlho wa Phasalatso ya mmino wa Aforika, Borwa David Alexander o re baopedi ba selegae ba sokola go dira dikopano mme ba tlhoka tsereganyo.
mt0: <pad> Chairperson of the Music Publishing Association of South Africa David Alexander says local musicians are struggling to make ends meet and are desperate for an intervention.</s>

en: The association works to safeguard music publishers and engages with government to ensure artists receive adequate compensation.
tsn: Mokgatlho o dirang go sireletsa baphasalatsi b ammino le go ikopanya le  puso go netefatsa gore badiragatsi ba amogela tuelo e e lekaneng.
mt0: <pad> The association works to safeguard music publishers and engages with government to ensure artists receive adequate compensation.</s>

en: Artists across the country have been battling to stay afloat with the impact of the ongoing coronavirus pandemic.
tsn: Badirigatsi go ralala naga ba ntse ba sokolela go nna le madi ka ntlha ya kgatelelo e e leng teng ya leroborobo la mogare wa corona.
mt0: <pad> Artists across the country have been battling to stay afloat with the impact of the ongoing coronavirus pandemic.</s>

en: Alexander says many artists could be forced to turn their backs on the industry.
tsn: Alexander a re diopedi di le dintsi ba ka patelediwa go siroga madirelo.
mt0: <pad> Go a lot of artists that could be forced to turn their backs on the industry, Alexander said.</s>

en: I think its facing a crisis; I think there are a lot of professionals in the industry that are considering alternative careers.
tsn: Ke akanya gore a lebagane le mathata; ke akanya gore go na le  baporofešenale ba le bantsi mo madirelong  ba ba akanyang ditsela tse nngwe.
mt0: <pad> Ke akanya e le mo mathateng; ke akanya go na le badiri ba bantsi ba dikgwebo tse di tlhatlhobang maemo a mangwe a tiro.</s>

en: Many are already working doing other jobs, whether they are driving or waiting tables or doing handyman work.
tsn: Bontsi jwa ba bangwe ba setse ba dira ditiro tse dingwe, e ka tswa e le go kgweetsa kgotsa phumola ditafole kgotsa go dira tiro ya matsogo.
mt0: <pad> Ba bangwe ba ntse ba bereka ka ditiro tse dingwe, go re ba kgweetse, ba emele mabenkele, kgotsa ba dire tiro ya handyman.</s>

en: I think the longer the COVID-19 crisis continues, the more people will leave the creative industry because there isnt the support from government for the industry.
tsn: Ke akanya gore fa mathata a Khorona a tswelela go tsaya nako e telele, batho ba le bantsi ba tla tlogela tirelo ya botlhami gonne ga gona  tshegetso go tswa go puso mo tirelong.
mt0: <pad> Ke akanya fa ntlha ya COVID-19 e tswelela, batho ba bantsi ba tla tlogela kgwebo ya botaki ka go re ga go na tshehetso ya mmuso go kgwebo ya botaki.</s>

en: Earlier, it was reported that the COVID-19 pandemic caught many industries off guard, and forced those in the creative sector to do things differently.
tsn: ka gale, go begilwe gore leroborobo la corona le  tshwerwe madirelo a mantsi a sa nagana, mme se sa pateletsa gore bao ba leng mo karolong ya botlhami ba dire dilo ka tsela e nngwe
mt0: <pad> Go sa ntse go beganwa fa COVID-19 pandemic e ne ya tshwenyega dikgwebo tse dintsi, mme ya gapa batho ba kgwebo ya boithamako go dira dilo ka tsela e e farologaneng.</s>

en: For months live events and social gatherings were halted, which meant no income for artists who rely on live performances as their main stream of income.
tsn: Ke dikgwedi ditiragatso le dikokoano tsa loago di emesitswe, se se raya gore ga gona lotseno la badiragatsi ba ba ikaegileng ka  tiragatso ya pono  jaaka e le tirelo ya lotseno.
mt0: <pad> Go simolola ka dikgwedi tse dintsi, ditiragalo tsa bophelo le go kopana ga se ga a direga, e leng se se raya go re go ne go sena madi a a tshegetsang baetsi ba ba tshegetsang ditiragalo tsa bophelo jaaka tsela ya bone ya go itirela.</s>

en: Most of them slowly moved their craft to digital platforms.
tsn: Bontsi jwa bona ka iketlo ba fetola ditiragatso tsa bone go dirisa ditsha tsa inthanete.
mt0: <pad> Ba le bantsi ba ne ba fetola bokgoni jwa bone go di-digital platforms ka bofefo.</s>

en: Small and developing companies depending on events, social gatherings and concerts were hit hard.
tsn: Dikgwebopotlana le ditlamo tse di tlhabologang tse di ikaegileng mo meletlong e, dikokoano tsa loago le dikonsarata di robilwe pelo.
mt0: <pad> Go a simolola go re dikhampani tse dinnye le tse di tlhagisang tse di tshegetsang ditiragalo, diphuthego tsa sechaba le dikopano di ne di kgoreletsegile thata.</s>

en: Gatherings of large groups of people were prohibited for entertainment purposes.
tsn: Dikokoano tsa ditlhopha tse dikgolo tsa batho di kgaotswe  ka maikaelelo a boitapoloso.
mt0: <pad> Go kgoreletsega go phuthega ga batho ba bantsi mo mafelong a boitlosobodutu.</s>

en: However, CEO of Tencent Africa Brett Loubser says the move to digital has been growing steadily.
tsn: Le gale, Mookamedi wa Tencent Africa Brett Loubser o rile go fetolela go tiriso ya inthanete ke selo se se tswelelang go gola ka tlhomamo.
mt0: <pad> However, CEO of Tencent Africa Brett Loubser says the move to digital has been growing steadily.</s>

en: Impact of COVID-19 on artists.
tsn: Khorona e amile batsweretshi.
mt0: <pad> Impact of COVID-19 on artists</s>

mt0: <pad> Fa o ntse o le mmino wa rap, ke eng fa o ne o e tsenya mo go leineng la gago?</s>

en: It all started when Warwick saw her nieces and nephews having fun on Twitter and wanted to join in.

en: I’m going to do it when I have an urge to say something or feel that I need to say something and/or ask a question, somebody is going to answer it, she recalled telling her niece who showed her the ropes.
tsn: Ke tlile go se dirisa se fa ke na le phisegelo ya go bua sengwe kgotsa fa ke ikutlwa gore ke batla go bua le/kgotsa  go botsa potso, mongwe o tlaa e araba, o gopola a bolelela setlogolo sa gagwe se se mo rutileng

en: that’s one of the things I’m enjoying more than anything else in the world, that everybody’s laughing with me, you know, and that I think is something that has been missing, she said.
tsn: Ke dingwe tsa dilo tse ke Itumelelang tsona go feta dilo tsotlhe mo lefatsheng, gore batho botlhe ba tshega le nna, a o a itse, mme ke akanya gore ke seo se neng se tlhokega, o bua jalo.
mt0: <pad> Ke nngwe ya dilo tse ke di ratang thata mo lefatsheng, go re botlhe ba tshega me, o itse, mme ke akanya gore ke sengwe se se hlokang.</s>

en: Warwick is also trail blazing with virtual concerts.

mt0: <pad> Warwick o ne a simolola go dira dikonsarete tsa boammaaruri.</s>

en: Her first was held live from home on Easter Sunday.
tsn: Ya gagwe ya ntlha e ne e tshwaretswe kwa gae ka Sontaga wa paseka
mt0: <pad> Go a lone, she was born live from home on Sunday of Easter.</s>

en: I had a little bit of anxiety, based on the fact that I had not sung in a complete year, and vocal cords are muscles and muscles had to be exercised, and I don’t do that, she said.
tsn: Ke ne ke na le tlhobaelo go le gonnye, ka ntlha ya gore ga ke a opela ngwaga otlhe, menapekodu ke mesifa mme mesifa e tshwanetse go otlololwa, mme ga ke a dire jalo, a tlhalosa.
mt0: <pad> Ke ne ke na le tshohanyetso, ka go re ga ke a opela ka ngwaga o mongwe, mme di-vocal cords ke masole, mme masole a tshwanetse go ikatisa, mme ga ke a dira seo, o buile.</s>

en: I wanted to do a disclaimer, you know, there might be a couple of squeaks, croaks, she said with a laugh.
tsn: Ke batla go dira boikgololo, la itse, go ka nna le bontsi jwa modumo, kgorotlho, o bua a tshega.
mt0: <pad> Gone a few squeaks, croaks, she said with a laugh.</s>

en: She will perform a second show on May 9, which is Mother’s Day in the United States.
tsn: O tla dira pontsho ya bobedi ka 9 Motsheganong, e leng letsatsi la bomme kwa United State.
mt0: <pad> O tla tshwara setshwantsho sa bobedi ka May 9, e leng letsatsi la Mmaagwe kwa United States.</s>

en: A three-week long sit-in protest at the office of the Northern Cape MEC for Sport, Arts and Culture by artists has been called off.
tsn: Boipelaetso ba badiragatsi ba dibeke di le tharo tse telele tsa go dula kwa kantorong ya Mokhuduthamaga wa Metshameko, Bokgabo le Setso wa Kapa Bokone bo emisitswe.
mt0: <pad> Go simolola go nna mo maboteng a le marataro a go batla go kgoreletsa go nna ga baetsi ba ditshwantsho tsa botaki kwa kantorong ya MEC ya Matsaneng, Ditshwantsho le Tsebo ya Bokone e e neng e dirilwe ke batshameki ba ditshwantsho tsa botaki.</s>

en: The department and the artists have reached an agreement over a R4 million plan of action for the arts in the province.
tsn: Lefapha le batsweretshi  ba fitlheletse tumalano ya thulaganyo ya tiro ya go feta dimilione di le R4  go botaki mo porofenseng.
mt0: <pad> Gompieno, kantoro ya tsa botaki le batshameki ba tlhakanetse go re ba direle R4 million go tshegetsa bokgoni jwa botaki mo kgaolong.</s>

en: The plan includes the full operation of the Northern Cape Theatre and the establishment of hubs for arts and crafts in the province.
tsn: Thulaganyo e akaretsa tiro e e tletseng ya Bobogelo jwa Kapa Bokone le tlhomo ya dikhutlwana go botsweretshi le bokgoni  jwa tiro ya diatla mo porofenseng.
mt0: <pad> Plan includes the full operation of the Northern Cape Theatre and the establishment of hubs for arts and crafts in the province.</s>

en: Artist Mkhululi Mabija says they are now ready to get back to work.
tsn: Motaki Mkhululi Mabija o rile jaanong ba ipaakanyeditse go boela tirong.
mt0: <pad> Artist Mkhululi Mabija says they are now ready to get back to work.</s>

en: Finally, they could see and take artists seriously and that has been the problem.
tsn: Kwa bokhutlong, ba kgona go bona le go tsaya bataki tsie mme seo e ne e le bothata.
mt0: <pad> Fa o sa kgone go fetola setshwantsho, o tla re o a itse.</s>

en: People sometimes think this is a hobby, but now they can see we were dead serious.
tsn: Batho ka nako nngwe ba akanya gore se ke kgatlhegelo, fela gajaana ba kgona go bona gore re ne re ikemiseditse.
mt0: <pad> Batho ba bangwe ba re ke go nna le motlhale, mme jaanong ba bona gore re ne re tsaya kgang e e masisi.</s>

en: This is our living.
tsn: Se ke tsela ya rona ya go itshedisa.
mt0: <pad> Go nna jaana ke go tshela ga re itse.</s>

en: We need to all come together as a sector to discuss our concerns.
tsn: Re tlhoka go kopana rotlhe  jaaka lekala re buisane ka ga matshwenyego a rona.
mt0: <pad> Re tshwanetse go re re tle mmogo jaaka setheo go buisana ka mathata a rona.</s>

en: There is a programme ready for the year at the theatre.
tsn: Go na le lenaane le le fedileng la ngwaga kwa bobogeding
mt0: <pad> Go na le tshameko ya ngwaga e e rileng kwa theatere.</s>

en: So, we can start including everybody from the districts in the programme, explains Mabija.
tsn: Ka jalo, re ka simolola go akaretsa mongwe le mongwe mo lenaneong go tswa kwa dikgaolong, go tlhalosa Mabija.
mt0: <pad> Ke ka moo re ka simolola go akaretsa botlhe ba ditlhopha tsa rona mo motshamekong, a tlhalosa Mabija.</s>

en: Northern Cape Department of Sports, Arts and Culture, Conrad Fortune, says R4 million has been allocated.
tsn: Lefapha la Metshameko, Botaki le Setso la Kapa Bokone, Conrad Fortune, o rile dimilione di le R4 di abilwe.
mt0: <pad> Go tswa kwa lekala la dipapadi, botaki le tsa setso la Northern Cape, Conrad Fortune says R4 million has been allocated for the project.</s>

en: After an intensive exercise of re-prioritising and re-planning we have managed to allocate an amount of R4 million to assist with the implementation of the three projects.
tsn: Morago ga tiro e e tseneletseng ya go leba ditlhokego-sešwa le togamaanosešwa re kgonne go aba bokana jwa dimilione di le R4 go thusa ka go tsenya tirisong diporojeke di le tharo.
mt0: <pad> Fa o sa kgone go fetola le go dira dithulaganyo, re kgonne go alafa madi a R4 million go thusa ka go dira diphulaganyo tse tharo.</s>

en: We are also in the process of developing a service level agreement, which basically indicates how the funding will be utilised and remain in line with all the financial policies and acts of government when incurring expenses, he adds.
tsn: Gape re mo thulaganyong ya go tlhama tirelo ya maemo a ditumalano, a a bontshang gore madi a tlaa dirisiwang jang le go nna maleba mo dipholising tsa matlole le melao ya puso fa  ditshenyegelo, a tlaleletsa.
mt0: <pad> Re ntse re tlhabolola tumelelo ya maemo a ditirelo, e e tla bontsha ka fa madi a tla dirisiwa ka teng le go tshegetsa melawana ya madi le ditiro tsa mmuso fa o dira ditshenyegelo, a okeletsa.</s>

en: Giorgio Armani may consider a joint venture with another Italian company, the founder of the Milanese fashion house told US magazine Vogue, opening the door for the first time to a potential business partner.
tsn: Giorgio Armani a ka akanya bokopanelo le setheo sengwe sa Italian, mong wa ntlo ya fešhene ya kwa Milan o boleletse Makasine wa US wa Vogue, gore o  bula ditšhono la ntlha go mogwebisani yo o nang le bokgoni.
mt0: <pad> Giorgio Armani o ka nna a akanya ka go dira kgwebo le kompone e nngwe ya Italy, modiri wa gagwe wa ntlo ya diaparo ya Milanese o boleletse magazini wa US Vogue, a bua ka tsela ya ntlha ka go re o tla bua le mongwe wa baagisani ba tsa kgwebo.</s>

en: In an interview published on the vogue.com website, Armani, 86, said the COVID-19 emergency had made us open our eyes a bit.
tsn: Mo dipotsolotsong tse di gatisitsweng mo webosaeteng ya Vogue.com, Armani, 86, o rile maemo a tshoganyetso a mogare wa Khorona a re dirile gore re bule matlho
mt0: <pad> Armani, 86, said that the COVID-19 pandemic had made us open our eyes a bit.</s>

en: Armani ruled out going the way of many other Italian luxury goods brands, including Gucci, Fendi and Bulgari, which have been bought by industry giants LVMH and Kering SA, saying a French buyer was not on the cards.
tsn: Armani o tsaya tsela ya go tshwana le ya mainakgwebo a kwa Italy a manobonobo, go akaretsa Gucci, Fendi le Bulgari, tse di rekilweng ke madirelo a makgolo LVMH le Kering SA, ba rile moreki wa Sefora o ne a se mo dikakanyong tsa bona.
mt0: <pad> Armani o kgoreletse go tsamaya mo tseleng ya di-brand tse dingwe tsa maemo a a kwa godimo tsa Italy, jaaka Gucci, Fendi le Bulgari, tse di rekilweng ke baagisani ba ditirelo ba mafatshe a a tona, ba LVMH le Kering SA, ka go re go ne go sena mongwe wa Mofora yo o tla rekang.</s>

en: However, he said his long-held idea that the company should remain independent was no longer so strictly necessary.
tsn: Le fa go le jalo, o rile kakanyo ya gagwe ya bogologolo ya gore setlamo se se tshwanetse go ikemelaga e sa tlhole e le botlhokwa.
mt0: <pad> O ne a re, le fa go ntse jalo, kgopolo ya gagwe ya go re kompone e nne e ikemetseng e ne e sa tlhokege thata jaaka pele.</s>

en: One could think of a liaison with an important Italian company, he said without elaborating, except to add that it did not have to be a fashion company.
tsn: Motho a ka akanya go buisana le setlamo se se botlhokwa sa Italian, o boletse kwa ntle ga tlhalosa go ya pele, ntle le go oketsa ka gore ga se gore go tshwanetse ya nna setlamo sa fešene.
mt0: <pad> O ka akanya ka go nna motlhanke wa kgwebo e kgolo ya Italy, a re ntle le go tlhalosa, a simolola ka go oketsa go re ga se tshwanetse go nna kgwebo ya diaparo.</s>

en: Vogue also quoted Armani’s niece Roberta Armani, who works at the family’s company, as saying it could be great, finally, to have an important Made in Italy joint venture in the fashion industry though she added she had no insight on her uncles plans.
tsn: Vogue o nopotse setlogolo sa Armani Roberta Armani, yo o dirang kwa setlamong sa lelapa, a re go ka nna monate, kwa bofelong, go nna le bokopanelo jo bo botlhokwa jwa ‘E dirilwe Italy’ mo setlamong sa fešene, le fa a tlaleleditse ka gore ga a na pono mo dithulaganyong tsa bomalome ba gagwe.
mt0: <pad> Vogue also quoted Roberta Armani, niece of Armani, who works at the family's company, as saying it could be great, finally, to have an important Made in Italy joint venture in the fashion industry though she added she had no insight on her uncles plans.</s>

en: Facebook Inc did not notify the more than 530 million users whose details were obtained through the misuse of a feature before 2019 and recently made public in a database, and does not currently have plans to do so, a company spokesman said on Wednesday.
tsn: Facebook Inc ga e a itsise badirisi ba ka feta dimilione di le 530 bao dintlha tsa bona di fitlhetsweng ka ntlha ya tiriso e e botlhaswa pele ga 2019 mme jaanong e dirile tshedimosetso mo setšhabeng, mme gajaana ga e na maano a go dira jalo, mmueledi wa setlamo o rile jalo ka Laboraro.
mt0: <pad> Facebook Inc. e ne e sa tsebisa badiri ba yone ba fetang 530 million bao ditlhogo tsa bone di amogetsweng ka go utlwisa boammaaruri ka go dirisiwa ga molao wa go batla go itse, mme ga e na maikaelelo a go dira jalo, a bua ka Laboraro.</s>

en: Business Insider reported last week that phone numbers and other details from user profiles were available in a public database.
tsn: Mogwebi wa ka fa gare o begile gore mo bekeng e e fetileng  dinomoro tsa mogala le dintlha tse dingwe go tswa difaeleng tsa badirisi di ne di le teng mo polokelotshedimosetsong ya setšhaba.
mt0: <pad> Business Insider e tlhalositse kgwedi e e fetileng gore dinomoro tsa mogala le tshedimosetso e nngwe ya badiri ba di-profiles di ne di fumanega mo go a database ya setjhaba.</s>

en: Facebook said in a blog post on Tuesday that malicious actors had obtained the data prior to September 2019 by scraping profiles using a vulnerability in the platforms tool for synching contacts.
tsn: Facebook e buile mo bolokong ka Labobedi gore badiragatsi ba ba bodileng ba fitlhetse tshedimosetso pele ga Lwetse 2019, ka go kokoanya difaele ba dirisa bokoa jwa didiriswa tsa serala se go fitlhela dinomoro.
mt0: <pad> Facebook e tlhalositse ka mokwaledi wa blog ka Labobedi go re batho ba bosula ba ne ba bona tshedimosetso pele ga ngwaga wa Setemere 2019 ka go batla di-profile ka go simolola go batla di-contacts ka go batla go tshwantsha di-contacts tsa sethala sa yone.</s>

en: The Facebook spokesman said the social media company was not confident it had full visibility on which users would need to be notified.
tsn: Mmueledi wa Facebook o rile setlamo sa bobegakgang jwa loago se ne se se na tsholofelo ka botlalo gore ke badirisi bafe ba ba tla tlhokang go itsisiwe.
mt0: <pad> Facebook spokesman said the social media company was not sure that it had full visibility on which users would need to be notified.</s>

en: He said it also took into account that users could not fix the issue and that the data was publicly available in deciding not to notify users.
tsn: O rile o tseile tsia gore badirisi ba ka se kgone go baakanya ntlha e mme tshedimosetso e ne e le teng mo phatlalatsa mo setšhabeng mo go swetseng gore ga go itsisiwe badirisi.
mt0: <pad> O rile o ne a tsaya ka tlhoko go re badiri ba ne ba sa kgone go simolodisa mathata mme tshedimosetso e ne e le ya bontsi fa a ne a dira tshwetso ya go se tsebisa badiri.</s>

en: Facebook has said it plugged the hole after identifying the problem at the time.
tsn: Facebook e rile go thibilwe lesoba morago ga go lemoga bothata ka nako eo.
mt0: <pad> Facebook e re e tlatse tshenyo ka morago ga go tlhaloganya mathata ka nako ya teng.</s>

en: The scraped information did not include financial information, health information or passwords, Facebook said.
tsn: Tshedimosetso e e kokoantsweng e ne e sa akaretse tshedimosetso ya matlole, tshedimosetso ya boitekanelo kgotsa dikhunololamoraba, Facebook a bolela.
mt0: <pad> Gone a scrape information that did not include financial information, health information or passwords, Facebook said.</s>

en: However, the collated data could provide valuable information for hacks or other abuses.
tsn: Le fa go ntse jalo, tshedimosetso e e kopantshitsweng e ka neelana ka tshedimosetso e e botlhokwa go magodu kgotsa batlhokofatsi.
mt0: <pad> Le fa go ntse jalo, tshedimosetso e e kgobokeditsweng e ka nna ya re fa tshedimosetso e e botlhokwa ya di-hacks kgotsa tse dingwe.</s>

en: Facebook, which has long been under scrutiny over how it handles user privacy, in 2019 reached a landmark settlement with the US Federal Trade Commission over its investigation into allegations the company misused user data.
tsn: Facebook, e e leng kgale e le ka fa tlase ga bosekaseki ka ntlha ya mokgwa o e tshwarang bonosi jwa badirisi ba yona, ka 2019 e fitlheletse bofelo jwa letshwaonaga  le US Federal Trade Commission godimo ga  patlisiso mo ditatofatso tsa tirisobotlhaswa ya tshedimosetso ya badirisi.
mt0: <pad> Facebook, e e sa tswang e tlhatlhobiwa ka go re e dirisitse boitshepo jwa badiri ba yone jang, e ne ya fihla pharologanyo e kgolo le US Federal Trade Commission ka 2019 ka dikgoka tsa go re khampani e ne e dirisitse tshedimosetso ya badiri ka tsela e e seng molaong.</s>

en: Irelands Data Protection Commission, the European Unions lead regulator for Facebook, said on Tuesday it had contacted the company about the data leak.
tsn: Khomišene ya Irelands ya tshireletso ya Datha, Mekgatlho ya badiri ya Yuropa e eteletse bolaodi jwa Facebook, go rilwe ka Labobedi e ikgolagantse le  setlamo ka ga tshedimosetso e e dutlileng.
mt0: <pad> Ireland's Data Protection Commission, the European Union's lead regulator for Facebook, said on Tuesday it had contacted the company about the data leak.</s>

en: It said it received no proactive communication from Facebook but was now in contact.
tsn: E rile e fitlhetse go sena puisano e e amogetsweng go tswa go Facebook fela jaanong e na le kamano.
mt0: <pad> Go simolola ka go re Facebook ga e a batla go nna le kgang ya go tsena mo dikgannyeng tsa yone, mme e ne e santse e dirisana le yone.</s>

en: The July 2019 FTC settlement requires Facebook to report details about unauthorized access to data on 500 or more users within 30 days of confirming an incident.
tsn: Bofelo jwa FTC jwa Phukwi 2019 bo tlhoka Facebook go bega tshedimosetso ka ga phitlhelelo ya tshedimosetso e e sa letlelelwang ya datha mo go badirisi ba makgolo a 500  kgotsa go feta mo malatsing a le 30  go netefatsa gore ke kotsi.
mt0: <pad> The July 2019 FTC settlement requires Facebook to report details about unauthorized access to data on 500 or more users within 30 days of confirming an incident.</s>

en: The Facebook spokesman declined to comment on the company’s conversations with regulators but said it was in contact to answer their questions.
tsn: Mmueledi wa Facebook o ganne go tshwaela mo dipuisanong tsa setlamo le balaodi fela o rile ba mo kgolaganong go araba dipotso.
mt0: <pad> Go a Facebook spokesman declined to comment on the company’s conversations with regulators but said it was in contact to answer their questions.</s>

en: In a hall at London’s Royal Academy of Music, pianist Yuanfan Yang performs pieces by Frederic Chopin, Franz Liszt and Joseph Haydn with just a cameraman for company.
tsn: Kwa ntlolehalahaleleng ya Akatemi ya Mmino ya London  moletsa piano Yuanfan Yang o tshamekile Pieces ka Frederic Chopin, Franz Liszt le Joseph Haydn fela ka go nna teng ga motho wa khemera ka fa phaposing.
mt0: <pad> Go tswa kwa Royal Academy of Music, pianist Yuanfan Yang o dira dipina tsa Frederic Chopin, Franz Liszt le Joseph Haydn a na le motshameki wa go rerisa fela.</s>

en: The 24-year-old is taking part in the first round of the Leeds International Piano Competition, hoping to win over a jury that will see his performance by video.
tsn: Motho yo wa dingwaga di le 24 o tsere karolo mo karolong ya ntlha  ya Kgaisano ya  boditšhabatšhaba ya Piano ya Leeds,  ka tsholofelo ya go fenya maikutlo a moatlhodi ka tiragatso ya gagwe ka kgatiso.
mt0: <pad> O dingwaga di le 24 o tla nna le seabe mo kgaolong ya ntlha ya Lekgotla la Dipiano la Leeds International, a leka go gapa kgololosego ya baemedi ba ba tla bonang gagwe ka fa tshwantshong.</s>

en: Held every three years, The Leeds has had to change its processes due to the COVID-19 pandemic, with no live jury or audience watching Yang and his fellow pianists compete for a coveted prize.
tsn: E tshwariwa dingwaga dingwe le dingwe tse tharo, The Leeds e  tshwanetse go fetola ditsamaiso tsa yona ka ntlha ya leroborobo la Khorona, ka go tlhoka baatlhodi ka namana kgotsa babogedi ba bogetseng Yang le badirammogo ba gagwe ba piano ba gaisana go fitlhela sekgele se se ntle.
mt0: <pad> Go tshwarwa ngwaga le ngwaga, The Leeds has had to change its procedures due to the COVID-19 pandemic, with no live jury or audience watching Yang and his fellow pianists compete for the coveted prize.</s>

en: I thought it might be a bit challenging at first, but once I started playing, I just forgot about everything, Edinburgh-born Yang said.
tsn: Ke ne ke akanya gore go tla nna thata kwa tshimologong, fela fa ke simolola go tshameka, ke lebala ka ga sengwe le sengwe, go bua  Edinburgh-born yang.
mt0: <pad> Ke ne ke akanya go re go tla nna thata kwa tshimologong, mme fa ke simolola go tshameka, ke ne ka lebala ka sengwe le sengwe, Yang o tlhalositse.</s>

en: It was just literally just me and the music.
tsn: E ne e le nna le mmino.
mt0: <pad> Go ne go le nna fela le mmino.</s>

en: With travel restrictions in place, The Leeds invited some 60 competitors from around the world to its virtual first round this week, increasing the number of host cities to 17 from 2018s three so that the selected pianists could take part close to their home or place of study.
tsn: Ka tiriso ya dithibelo motsamao, The Leeds e laleditse bagaisani  ba le 60 go tswa mo lefatsheng ka bophara go pontsho ya bona ya  ntlha beke e, go oketsa palo ya ditoropo tse e leng batshwari go 17 go tlofa ka 2018 gore  batshamekapiano b aba tlhophilweng ba ka tsaya karolo gaufi le magae kgotsa mafelo a go ithuta.
mt0: <pad> Go na le dikgwebo tsa go tsamaisa maeto, The Leeds e ne ya kgopelela batho ba ka nna 60 go tswa mo lefatsheng lotlhe go tsena mo dikgaolong tsa yona tsa ntlha tsa tsela ya inthanete beke eno, e eketseditseng palo ya ditoropokgolo tsa boamogedi go nna 17 go tswa go tse tharo tsa 2018, gore ba-pianists ba ba tlhophilweng ba kgone go nna gaufi le gae kgotsa kwa ba ithutang teng.</s>

en: From one competitor in Miami to 14 in Berlin, they all performed their roughly 25-minute recitals under the same conditions: playing on a Steinway Model D grand piano and with identical camera set ups.
tsn: Go tswa mo mogaisaning wa MIAMI go ya go 14 kwa Berlin, botlhe ba tshameka moletso metsotso e ka nna 25 mo maemong a a tshwanang: go tshameka mo Pianong e kgolo ya Steinway Model D ka paakanyo e e tshwanang ya khamera.
mt0: <pad> Go simolola ka mongwe wa batlhabani kwa Miami go ya go 14 kwa Berlin, ba ne ba dira dipina tsa bone tsa metsotso e 25 ka maemo a a tshwanang: ba ne ba letsa piano ya Steinway Model D mme ba ne ba na le setlhopha sa go rerisanya sa go tshwana.</s>

en: We realised very quickly that we couldn’t do it in the way which we would love to do it with an audience and the jury present, Adam Gatehouse, The Leeds artistic director, told Reuters.
tsn: Re lemogile ka bonako gore re ne re ka se kgone go e dira ka tsela e re ka rata go e dira go le bareetsi le baatlhodi, Adam Gatehouse mokaedi modiragatsi The Leeds, go bolelela Reuters.
mt0: <pad> Gone too soon that we realised that we couldn't do it in the way we would love to do it with an audience and the jury present.</s>

en: Clearly we were not going to be able to travel a jury from London to Berlin to wherever all around the world so we will watch the videos at home online and judge them in that way.
tsn: Go a bonagala gore re ka se kgone go tsamaisa moatlhodi go tswa London go ya Berlin le go ralala lefatshe, ka jalo re tla lebelela dikgatiso kwa gae mo inthaneteng mme re ba atlhola ka tsela eo.
mt0: <pad> Gone gone, we were not going to be able to travel a jury from London to Berlin to anywhere all around the world so we will watch the videos at home online and judge them that way.</s>

en: He added the competition would in future keep aspects of this year’s event, namely cutting travel distances for crews and contestants but would welcome live audiences.
tsn: O tlaleleditse ka la gore kgaisano eno mo nako e e tlang, e tla boloko dintlha tsa moletlo wa ngwaga, go bala go kgaola go tsamaya sekgala ga badiri ba moletlo le batsayakarolo  fela ba tla  amogela babogedi ba nama.
mt0: <pad> O oketsa ka go re kgaisano e tla boloka dikarolo tsa setlhogo sa ngwaga wa gompieno, jaaka go fokotsa ditsela tsa go tsamaya tsa badiri le bakgaisano, mme e tla amogela babogedi ba tshedimosetso.</s>

en: First held in 1963, The Leeds is a prestigious music competition offering a career-making package of prizes for its winner: a recording and management deal, recitals at London’s Wigmore Hall and tours of Europe and East Asia among other bonuses.
tsn: Lwa ntlha e tshwarilwe ka 1963, The Leeds e kgaisano e e kgethegileng ya mmino e e neelang pakete ya meputso ya mofenyi: Tsamaiso ya go rekota le go e tsamaisa, go tshameka kwa Holong ya London Wigmore le maeto a go ya kwa Yuropa le kwa Botlhaba ba Asia, gareng ga tse dingwe.
mt0: <pad> Go simolola ka 1963, The Leeds ke kgaisano ya mmino e e nang le boemo jo bo kwa godimo e e fa motlhatlhi ditheko tse dintsi tsa go dira bokgaedi: tjhelete ya go gatisa le go laola, di-recitals kwa Wigmore Hall kwa London le maeto a Europe le Asia e nngwe le e nngwe.</s>

en: Up until the last minute I thought (The Leeds) would be cancelled, Italian pianist Giulia Contaldo, who practiced playing in front of a cameraman before the competition, said.
tsn: Ka metsotso ya bofelo ke ne ke akanya gore (The Leeds) e ka phimolwa, mopiano wa  Italian Giulia Contaldo, yo a ikatisitseng go tshameka fa pele ga monna wa khemera pele ga kgaisano,  go rilwe.
mt0: <pad> Go fihlela ka nako ya bofelo, ke ne ke akanya gore (The Leeds) e tla kgaolwa, pianist Giulia Contaldo wa Italy o buile.</s>

en: So many of my colleagues don’t have this opportunity, or don’t have any opportunities at the moment.
tsn: Bontsi jwa badiri-ka-nna ga ba na yona tšhono eno, kgotsa ga ba na ditšhono dipe mo nakong eno.
mt0: <pad> Badiri ba me ba le bantsi ba sa na le tshono eno, kgotsa ga ba na ditshono tse dingwe mo motlheng wa jaana.</s>

en: So whatever happens, I am grateful.
tsn: Ka jalo sengwe le sengwe se se diragalang, ke itumelela sona
mt0: <pad> Ke a lebogela go sa kgathalesege gore go direga eng.</s>

en: While the first round is virtual, organisers plan to hold the second round, semi-final and final in Leeds in September, hopefully with a live audience.
tsn: Lekgetlo la ntlha ke kgatiso fela ga ba iponagatse ka namana, barulaganyi ba rulaganya go tshwara lekgetlo la bobedi, lekgetlo la go ya bofelong le bofelong kwa Leeds ka Lwetse, gongwe le babogedi.
mt0: <pad> Fa o sa itse, o ka re o ne a itse.</s>

en: Music has been and always will be a social occasion, Israeli competitor Ariel Lanyi said.
tsn: Mmino o nnile kokoano ya loago e bile go tla nna go le jalo, go bua mogaisani Ariel Lanyi.
mt0: <pad> Go ntse jalo, go nna le seabe sa boitshwaro se se tla nna lefelo la boitshwaro, a rialo mongwe wa baemedi ba ga Ariel Lanyi.</s>

en: Its not only about the music itself but its also about the people in the hall and
tsn: Ga se fela ka ga mmino ka bo ona fela ke ka ga batho ba ba leng mo holong ya le
mt0: <pad> Gone a go simolola ka mmino fela, mme o akaretsa batho ba ba mo tlung.</s>

en: That is how it’s supposed to be.
tsn: Ke ka moo go tshwanetseng go nna ka teng
mt0: <pad> That's how it should be.</s>

en: Britain’s Prince Harry and his wife Meghan will produce their first Netflix Inc series that will focus on athletes competing in the Invictus Games for injured veterans in The Hague in 2022.
tsn: Kgosana ya kwa Britain Prince Harry le mosadi wa gagwe Meghan ba tla tlhagisa kgatiso ya bona ya ntlha mo Netflix Inc e e tla bong e lebagane le diatlelete tse di tlaa bong di gaisana kwa metshamekong ya  Invictus boemong jwa bagale ba ba gobetseng mo Hague ka 2022.
mt0: <pad> Prince Harry le mosadi wa gagwe Meghan ba tla tlhama setshwantsho sa bone sa Netflix Inc se se tla thekga batshameki ba ba tshamekang mo Dipapading tsa Invictus tsa masole a a golegileng kwa The Hague ka 2022.</s>

en: Harry will appear on camera in the documentary series called Heart of Invictus and serve as an executive producer through the couples Archewell Productions, Netflix said in a statement on Tuesday.
tsn: Harry o tla tlhagelela mo khamereng mo motseletseleng wa tokomentari e e bidiwang Heart of Invictus mme a dira jaaka khuduthamaga ya tiragatso  mo go balekane Tiragatso ya Archewell, Netflix e tlhalositse mo setatamenteng sa yona  ka Labobedi.
mt0: <pad> Harry o tla nna mo go boneng ditshwantsho tsa setlhogo sa ditshwantsho tse di bidiwang Heart of Invictus mme o tla direla jaaka motsamaisi wa kgwebo ka Archewell Productions ya gagwe, Netflix e tlhalositse ka Labobedi.</s>

en: The series will provide behind-the-scenes stories of athletes and organisers as they prepare for the event, which has been delayed until next spring due to the COVID-19 pandemic, Netflix said.
tsn: Tlhatlhamano ya dikgatiso e  tla tlhagisa dipontsho tse di sa boneng ke batho tsa diatleletiki le barulaganyi fa ba ipaakanyetsa dikgaisano, tse di diegile go fitlha dikgakologo tse di latelang ka ntlha ya leroborobo la  Covid-19, go bua Netflix.
mt0: <pad> Go simolola ka go re o tsebe ditiragalo tsa baatlelete le baokamedi ba ba itlhatlhobisang moletlo, setshwantsho se se tla fa batho dipego tsa morago ga go ipaakanyetsa moletlo, o o tsiletsweng go ya go selemo sa ngwaga o mongwe ka ntlha ya COVID-19, Netflix e tlhalositse.</s>

en: Orlando von Einsiedel will direct the multi-episode series and Joanna Natasegara will be its producer, Netflix said.
tsn: Orlando Vono o tla tsamaisa dikgaolo tsa tlhatlhamano e e kgolo mme Joanna Einsiedel o tla nna motlhami wa yona, go bua Netflix.
mt0: <pad> Orlando von Einsiedel o tla rerisa setlhogo sa di-episode tse dintsi, mme Joanna Natasegara o tla nna motlhanke wa sone, Netflix e itse.</s>

en: The duo produced the Oscar-winning short documentary The White Helmets about a rescue group in Syria.
tsn: Bobedi jo bo tlhamile tokomentari e e khutshwane e e gapileng sekgele sa Oscar The White Helmets  ka ga setlhopha se se thusang kwa Syria.
mt0: <pad> Ba babedi ba dirile ditshwantsho tsa ditshwantsho tse di nnang le Oscar, The White Helmets, ka setlhopha sa go thusa kwa Syria.</s>

en: The Invictus Games is a multi-sport event created in 2017 by Prince Harry  who served as a soldier in Afghanistan  for military personnel wounded in action.
tsn: Metshameko ya Invictus ke tiragalo ya metshameko e mentsi  e e  tlhamilweng ka 2017 ke Kgosana Harry yo a dirileng jaaka lesole kwa Afghanistan go sesole se se gobetseng.
mt0: <pad> The Invictus Games ke motshameko wa dipapadi tse dintsi o o tlhamitsweng ka 2017 ke Prince Harry, yo o neng a direla jaaka motlhabani kwa Afghanistan, go thusa ba masole ba ba gobetseng mo tirong.</s>

en: The couple, who has been in the news following an interview with US chat show host Oprah Winfrey last month, signed a multi-year production deal with Netflix in September.
tsn: Baratani, bao ba neng ba le mo dikgang go latela dipotsolotso le seboledi sa kwa US Oprah Winfrey mo kgweding e e fetileng, ba saenile tumelelano ya tiragatso ya ngwagantsi le Netflix ka Lwetse.
mt0: <pad> Married couple, a celebrity whose interview with Oprah Winfrey last month has been in the news, signed a multi-year production deal with Netflix in September.</s>

en: Harry and Meghan now live in Southern California after making a final split with the British royal family.
tsn: Harry le Meghan jaanong ba dula kwa Borwa jwa California morago ga go dira kgaogano le lelapa la bogosi la kwa Britain.
mt0: <pad> Harry le Meghan ba nna kwa California ka morago ga go kgaogana le lelapa la Boruta.</s>

en: Queen Elizabeth says she is saddened by Harry and Meghan’s experiences.
tsn: Kgosigadi Elizabeth a re o utlwisitse  botlhoko ke maitemogelo a ga Harry le Meghan.
mt0: <pad> Queen Elizabeth says she is saddened by Harry and Meghan's experiences.</s>

en: Kim Kardashian has added billionaire to her resume.
tsn: Kim Kardashian ga jaana o itsege jaaka motho yo o nang le dibilione tsa diranta.
mt0: <pad> Kim Kardashian o tlatsa billionaire mo go resume ya gagwe.</s>

en: The cosmetics and shapewear businesswoman, who launched her career off the reality TV series Keeping Up with The Kardashians, was included on Tuesday for the first time on Forbes magazine’s list of the worlds billionaires.
tsn: Mmakgwebo wa ditlolo le diaparo, yo o tlhagisitseng tiro ya gagwe mo tlhatlhamanong ya thelebišene ya tiragatso-bonnete ya Keeping Up with The Kardashians, o tsenyeleditswe ka Labobedi lwa ntlha mo lenaaneng la makasine ka ga batho ba ba nang le dimilione mo lefatsheng.
mt0: <pad> Mme a ne a simolola go nna kgwebo ya dikgwebo tsa boitshwaro le go fokotsa maemo, mme a tsene mo lenaneong la Forbes la batho ba ba tshegetsang lefatshe ka madi a a fetang bilioni.</s>

en: The Forbes estimate means Kardashian joins her soon-to-be ex-husband Kanye West in the billionaires club.
tsn: Tekanyetso ya Forbes e tlhalosa gore Kardashian o latela monna yo a tlang go mo tlhala Kanye West mo setlhopheng sa go nna borradibilione.
mt0: <pad> Forbes e lekanya gore Kardashian o tla tsamaya le Kanye West, yo o sa tswang go nna motlhabani wa gagwe, mo setlhoeng sa ba-billionaire.</s>

en: Forbes on Tuesday estimated Wests net worth at $1.8 billion, mostly from deals on his Yeezy sneaker and fashion line.
tsn: Forbes ka Labobedi e lekanyeditse mogolo wa ga West wa ngwaga e le dibilione di le 1.8, bontsi go tswa go ditumalano tsa ditlhako tse di bidiwang Yeezy le diaparo tsa gagwe.
mt0: <pad> Forbes ka Labobedi e akanyeditše boitshepo jwa gagwe go lekana le dibilione tse 1,8, gants go tswa mo ditirelong tsa gagwe tsa Yeezy sneaker le setaele sa gagwe sa maemo a a kwa godimo.</s>

en: Kardashian filed for divorce from West, 43, in February, citing irreconcilable differences.
tsn: Kardashian o kwadisitse tlhalo go tswa go West, 43 ka Tlhakole, a tlhalosa dikgakgano tse  di farologaneng.
mt0: <pad> Kardashian filed for divorce from West, 43, in February, citing irreconcilable differences.</s>

en: Her half sister Kylie Jenner, however, lost her billionaire status, Forbes said on Tuesday.
tsn: Kgaitsadie, Kylie Jenner, o latlhegetswe ke maemo a gagwe a bobilione , Forbes e tlhalositse ka Labobedi.
mt0: <pad> Go a Forbes report on Tuesday that Kylie Jenner, her half sister, has lost her billionaire status.</s>

en: It valued the 23-year-olds fortune at around $700 million, citing a tough year for cosmetic sales during the coronavirus pandemic and what it said were previous overestimates of revenue from Kylie Cosmetics, now 51% owned by Coty Inc.

en: The death of prolific Sesotho author, Dr Kgotso Maphalla, has been described as a colossal loss in the literary fraternity.
tsn: Loso lwa mokwadi yo o itlhaotseng wa Sesotho, Ngaka Kgotso Maphalla, le tlhalositswe e le tatlhegelo e kgolo mo losikeng lwa dikwalo.
mt0: <pad> Mme Dr Kgotso Maphalla, a prolific Sesotho author, has been described as a colossal loss in the literary fraternity.</s>

en: Most of his works have been prescribed for schools and tertiary institutions.
tsn: Bontsi jwa ditiro tsa gagwe di beilwe kwa dikolong le kwa ditheong tsa thuto e kgolwane.
mt0: <pad> Most of his works have been prescribed for schools and tertiary institutions.</s>

en: Maphalla won his first major literary prize in 1980, in the Sesotho poetry competition of the Radio Bantu Sesotho Service, now known as Lesedi FM.
tsn: Maphalla o gapile sekgele sa gagwe sa ntlha se segolo sa dikwalo ka 1980, mo kgaisanong ya poko ya Sesotho ya tirelo ya Radio Bantu Sesotho, e jaanong e bidiwang Lesedi FM.
mt0: <pad> Maphalla o ne a amega thata ka go fenya kgwebo ya gagwe ya ntlha ya dipuisano ka 1980, mo dikgaisano tsa se-Sesotho tsa Radio Bantu Sesotho Service, jaana e tsewang jaaka Lesedi FM.</s>

en: The 66-year-old author passed away after suffering a stroke.
tsn: Mokwadi yo dingwaga di le 66 o tlhokofetse morago ga go boga ka seterouku
mt0: <pad> O o dilemo di le 66 o thokafetse morago ga go nna le stroke.</s>

en: Affectionately known as KPD, the multi-award-winning author published more than 70 Sesotho literary works.
tsn: Yo a itsegeng ka KPD, mokwadi yo o gapileng dikgele tse dintsi  yo o phasaladitseng dikwalo di feta 70 tsa Sesotho.
mt0: <pad> Go tlwaelesegile go bidiwa KPD, mmatlisisi yo o tseneletseng wa dithelebishene o gatisitse dibuka tsa setswana tse fetang 70.</s>

en: Dr Kgotso Maphalla also wrote several radio dramas.
tsn: Ngaka Kgotso Maphalla le ena o kwadile diterama tse mmalwa tsa radio.
mt0: <pad> Dr Kgotso Maphalla o kwadile dipina tse dintsi tsa radio.</s>

en: The selfless veteran mentored many budding authors.
tsn: Mogaka yo o se nang boikgogomoso o rutile bakwadi ba le bantsu ba magorogomašwa.
mt0: <pad> O o sa ikgantsheng o ne a thusa badiri ba bantsi ba ba simolola go kwala.</s>

en: Several of his works have also been analysed for dissertations and doctoral studies.
tsn: Ditiro tsa gagwe tse dingwe di sekasekiwa mo ditutong tsa dipatlisiso tsa PhD.
mt0: <pad> Several of his works have also been analysed for dissertations and doctoral studies.</s>

en: Sesotho Literature Museum Assistant Director, Tseliso Masolane says they will continue to preserve and develop Sesotho in his honour.
tsn: Mothusa Mokaedi wa Sesotho Literature Museum Tseliso Masolane a re ba tla tswelela go tlhokomela le go tlhabolola Sesotho go mo tlotla.
mt0: <pad> Tseliso Masolane, Assistant Director of Sesotho Literature Museum, says they will continue to preserve and develop Sesotho in his honour.</s>

en: Ntate Maphalla was an all-rounded person.
tsn: Ntate Maphalla e ne e le motho yo itseng tsotlhe
mt0: <pad> Ntate Maphalla o ne a le motho yo o tlhakanetsweng.</s>

en: Even if you look at all his writings, there will always be an element of religion.
tsn: Le fa o lebelela dikwalo tsa gagwe, go tlhola go na le dikarolwana tsa bodumedi.
mt0: <pad> Fa o lekola dibuka tsa gagwe tsotlhe, go tla nna le sengwe sa bodumedi.</s>

en: He would never just write lyrics or maybe write empty lines.
tsn: O ne a ka se kwale mafoko a pina fela kgotsa go kwa mela e e sa reng sepe.
mt0: <pad> O ne a ka se ke a kwala dipina fela, kgotsa gongwe a kwala mafoko a a sa tlhaloganyesege.</s>

en: It would always resonate revolution, always make sure Basotho know where they come from and ensure that they keep up with that.
tsn: Ka metlha go nna le phetogo e e rileng, ka gale a netefatsa gore Basotho ba itse gore ba  tswa kae le go netefatsa gore ba tsamaisana le sona.
mt0: <pad> It would always resonate revolution, always make sure Basotho know where they come from and ensure that they keep up that.</s>

en: The Pan South African Language Board (PanSALB) has described Maphalla as a custodian of Sesotho.
tsn: Boto ya Pan South African Language (PanSALB) e tlhalositse Maphalla jaaka motlhokomedi wa Sesotho.
mt0: <pad> The Pan South African Language Board (PanSALB) has described Maphalla as a custodian of Sesotho.</s>

en: PanSALB, Nikiwe Matebula, says Maphalla always produced quality work.
tsn: Wa PanSALB, Nikiwe Matebula o rile Maphalla ka gale o ne a dira tiro e e nang le nonofileng.
mt0: <pad> Mme Maphalla a toujours produit du travail de qualité, selon le président de PanSALB, Nikiwe Matebula.</s>

en: As the PanSALB, we always like to instill pride in home languages because that is our main mandate, to ensure that we promote all languages of South Africa.
tsn: Jaaka PanSALB, re rata go tsenya boikgogomoso mo dipuong tsa gae gonne ke boikarabelo jwa rona jo bogolo, go netefatsa gore re tsweletsa dipuo tsotlhe tsa Aforikaborwa.
mt0: <pad> Fa o sa itse, re ka bua fela re re go ntse jalo.</s>

en: So, that was the most fascinating fact when it came to his writings, that he fights for the language.
tsn: Ka jalo, ke sona elo se se neng se kgatlhisa totab fa go tla mo dikwalong tsa gagwe, gore o lwetse puo.
mt0: <pad> Ke gone ka moo, e ne e le ntlha e e kgatlhang thata fa o bua ka dibuka tsa gagwe, go re o lwantsha sekwalwa.</s>

en: He writes very good quality novels.
tsn: O kwadile dipadi tsa boleng jo bo kwa godimo thata
mt0: <pad> O kwala dibuka tsa boleng jo bo siameng.</s>

en: His literary work is of quality.
