tsn: Tiro ya gagwe ya bokwadi ke ya maemo a a kwa godimo
mt0: <pad> Go a nnete go re o itse gore tiro ya gagwe ya dibuka e ntle.</s>

en: That’s what really fascinates us about his work.
tsn: Se ke se tota se re itumedisa ka  tiro ya gagwe.
mt0: <pad> That's what really fascinates us about his work.</s>

en: Prolific Sesotho authors death described as a colossal loss. A teacher by profession, Maphallas illustrious career started more than 40 years ago.
tsn: Loso la mokwadi wa Sesotho yo o itlhaotseng lo tlhalosiwa e le tatlhegelo e kgolo. Morutabana ka maemo, tiro ya ga Maphalla e simolotse dingwaga di feta 40 tse di fetileng.
mt0: <pad> Mme a re o ne a simolola go kwala ka Setswana, Maphalla o ne a tlhalosiwa jaaka mongwe wa bakwadi ba setlhogo. Moithuti ka boammaaruri, Maphalla's illustrious career began more than 40 years ago.</s>

en: Publisher and author, Pule Lechesa wrote a book about Maphalla’s life called the The literacy legacy of Dr KDP Maphalla.
tsn: Mophasalatsi le mokwadi, Pule Lechesa o kwadile buka ka ga botshelo jwa ga Maphalla e e bidiwang Boswa jwa dikwalo jwa ga Dr KDP Maphalla (The Literacy Legacy of Dr KDP Maphalla)
mt0: <pad> Publisher and author, Pule Lechesa wrote a book about Maphalla’s life called the The literacy legacy of Dr KDP Maphalla.</s>

en: Lechesa says KDP will be remembered for his steadfast passion for Sesotho and writing.
tsn: Lechesa a re KDP o tlaa gopolwa ka boineelo jwa lerato la gagwe la Sesotho le bokwadi.
mt0: <pad> Lechesa says KDP will be remembered for his steadfast passion for Sesotho and writing.</s>

en: He has also taught us that as writers we must always be united as he used to say bangodi ke metjodi  meaning the writers are like shepherds.
tsn: O re rutile gape gore jaaka bakwadi re tshwanetse go nna re utlwana jaaka a ne a rata go bua a re bangodi ke metjodi se se raya gore bakwadi ba tshwana le badisa.
mt0: <pad> O re rutile gape go re re le bakwadi re tshwane le badiri ba ditlhapi, jaaka a ne a re: "Bakwadi ke batsadi."</s>

en: They must work together because if anything happens to them the sheep will scatter around.
tsn: Ba tshwanetse go nna ba dira mmogo ka gonne fa sengwe se ka ba diragalela dinku di tla  gasagana.
mt0: <pad> Ba tshwanetse go bereka mmogo ka go re fa sengwe se direga mo go bone, dipudi di tla phatsima mo go ba bangwe.</s>

en: He taught us that as writers we should always advocate for unity.
tsn: O re rutile gore jaaka bakwadi re tshwanetse ka gale go dira kutlwano.
mt0: <pad> O re rutile gore jaaka bakwadi, re tshwanetse go nna le boitshepo jwa go tshegetsa kagiso.</s>

en: Maphalla was bestowed with several lifetime achiever awards.
tsn: Maphalla o neetswe dikgele tse di le mmalwa tsa  diphitlhelelo tsa botshelo.
mt0: <pad> Maphalla o ne a abelwa dikgwebo tse dintsi tsa go dira thata mo bophelong.</s>

en: His plethora of awards and accolades include the MNET Award and the Chairpersons Award by the South African Literary Awards.
tsn: Bontsintsi jwa dikgele tsa gagwe le ditumiso di akaretsa sekgele sa MNET le sekgele sa bodulasetulo ka ba kabelo ya South African Literature.
mt0: <pad> Go a ntsi ga o itse.</s>

en: He was also bestowed an honorary doctorate from the University of the Free State in 2007.
tsn: Gape o ne a neelwa sekgele sa tlotlo sa bongaka go tswa kwa Yunibesiting ya Foreisetata ka 2007.
mt0: <pad> O ne a newa le dikirii tsa boemo jwa baithuti ba ntlha go tswa kwa Yunivhesiti ya Free State ka 2007.</s>

en: University of the Free States Dr Nyefolo Malete, says Maphalla was trying to depict the life of an ordinary black person oppressed by Apartheid.
tsn: Ngk Nyefolo Malete wa Yunibesithi ya Foreisetata o rile  Maphalla o ne a leka go tshwantsha botshelo jwa motho fela yo montsho yo o  neng gateletswe ke tlhaolele.
mt0: <pad> Dr Nyefolo Malete, a professor at the University of the Free States, says Maphalla was trying to depict the life of an ordinary black person oppressed by Apartheid.</s>

en: As a political activist through his writing, we realised in so many books that he was trying to depict the life of an ordinary black person who was oppressed by the previous regime.
tsn: Jaaka molweladiphetogo wa  sepolotiki mo bokwading jwa gagwe, re lemoga mo dibukeng di le dintsi gore o ne a leka go tshwantsha botshelo jwa motho fela yo montsho yo o neng a gatelelwa ke puso e e fetileng.
mt0: <pad> Fa re simolola go tlhaloganya ka dibuka tsa gagwe, re lemoga gore o ne a leka go bontsha bophelo jwa motho wa sekgowa yo o neng a kgoreletsetswe ke mmuso wa pele.</s>

en: A relative says Maphalla was the face of the family.
tsn: Wa losika o rile Maphalla e ne e le sefatlhego sa lelapa.
mt0: <pad> A relative says Maphalla was the face of the family.</s>

en: Spokesperson, Lefu Maphalla says his passing is a great loss.
tsn: Mmueledi, Lefu Maphalla a re go tlhokafala ga gagwe ke tatlhegelo e kgolo.
mt0: <pad> Lefu Maphalla, a spokesman for the South African government, said his death is a great loss.</s>

en: He was the most recognisable face of the Maphalla family and even because of him, we happened to know each other.
tsn: O ne a le sefatlhego se se gopolwang sa lelapa la ga  Maphalla mme ka ntlha ya gagwe re a itsane.
mt0: <pad> O ne a le setshwantsho se se tlhaloganyesegang sa malapa a Maphalla, mme ka ntlha ya gagwe, re ne ra simolola go itsena.</s>

en: So, he was this shining star amongst us and not only that, and even to the community that he lived amongst he was always surrounded by people because he was also a community builder.
tsn: Ka jalo, e ne e lenaledi e e phatsimang mo gare ga rona, mme ga se seo fela, le mo setšhabeng se a neng a dula gareng ga sona ka metlha o ne a  dikaganyeditswe ke batho gonne e ne e le gape moagi wa baagi.
mt0: <pad> O ne a tshegetsa batho ba le bantsi mo go rona, mme e seng fela, le mo bathong ba setšhaba sa gagwe, ka gonne o ne a bopilwe gape jaaka mmotlana wa setšhaba.</s>

en: The family is yet to finalise memorial and funeral arrangements.
tsn: Lelapa le ya go feleletsa tlotlo le dithulaganyo tsa phitlho.
mt0: <pad> Fa o sa itse, o re ke wena o itse.</s>

en: Rest in power Dr KPD Maphalla, at the very young age of 66.
tsn: Robala ka kgotso Ngk KPD Maphalla,  dingwaga di le nnye tse 66.
mt0: <pad> Rest in power Dr KPD Maphalla, at the very young age of 66</s>

en: Ntate Kgotso Maphalla wrote classic Sesotho and English radio plays & poetry and prose.
tsn: Ntate Kgotso Maphalla o kwadile ditiragayso tse ntle tsa Sesotho le tsa Seesimane le maboko le porosa.
mt0: <pad> Ntate Kgotso Maphalla wrote classic Sesotho and English radio plays & poetry and prose.</s>

en: Many of his titles are not yet accounted for; so far, 47 works in 80 publications in 2 languages and 616 library holdings.
tsn: Ditlhogo tsa gagwe tse  dintsi  ga a ise di arabelwe; go fitlha ga jaana, ditiro tse 47 mo go dikgatiso di le 80 mo dipuong tse 2 le dilaeboraring di le 616.
mt0: <pad> Se o sa itse</s>

en: The musician and actor reportedly suffered a heart attack during a drug overdose on Friday.
tsn: Go begilwe gore Moopedi le modiragatsi o ne o tlhasetswe ke bolwetse jwa go ema ga pelo ka nako ya go dirisa diritibatsi go feta tekano ka Labotlhano.
mt0: <pad> O o tswang kwa Amerika, o ne a simolola go nna le mathata a pelo ka nako ya go nna le bolwetse jwa go feta mo mothong ka la boraro.</s>

en: A hospital spokesperson declined to release his condition or even confirm that he was a patient there, citing privacy laws.
tsn: Mmueledi wa Bookelo o ganne go golola maemo a gagwe kgotsa go netefatsa gore e ne e le molwetse koo, nopolo ya melao ya sephiri.
mt0: <pad> A spokesperson for the hospital refused to release his condition or even confirm that he was a patient there, citing privacy laws.</s>

en: A hospital spokeswoman declined to release his condition or even confirm to Reuters that DMX, 50, who was born Earl Simmons, was a patient there, citing privacy laws.
tsn: Mmueledi wa Bookelo o ganne go golola maemo a gagwe le go netefatsa go Reuters gore DMX, 50, yo o belegweng kwa Earl Simmons, e ne e le molwetse teng, re nopola melao ya sephiri.
mt0: <pad> A spokeswoman for the hospital refused to release his condition or even confirm to Reuters that DMX, 50, who was born Earl Simmons, was a patient there, citing privacy laws.</s>

en: His family, in a statement widely reported in celebrity media, said he was rushed on Friday, April 2, to the facility roughly 30 miles (48 km) north of New York City after facing serious health issues.
tsn: Ba lelapa la gagwe, mo tlhagisong phatlalatsa ba begile mo bobegakgang jwa dinaledi, gore o sianeseditswe ka Labotlhano, 02 Moranang, kwa bookelong jo bo ka nnang dimmaele tse 30 (dikilometara tse 48) Bokone jwa toropo ya New York morago ga go lebagana le mathata a boitekanelo a a masisi.
mt0: <pad> Go tswa go lelapa la gagwe, ka mophatlalatšo o o pharaletseng wa di-celebrity media, ba re o ne a romelwa kwa sepateleng sa yone ka Labobedi, Mopitlwe 2, kwa Buffalo, kwa New York, morago ga go bona mathata a botsogo a a maswe.</s>

en: Known to his fans by his stage name DMX or Dark Man X, Simmons was reported to be on life support on Monday, according to RollingStone.
tsn: Jaaka a itse ke balatsedi ba gagwe ka leina go diragatsa la DMX kgotsa Dark Man X, Simmons o  begilwe a beilwe mo motšheneng wa  tshegetso botshelong ka Mosupologo, go ya ka RollingStone.
mt0: <pad> Simmons, o itsege ka leina la gagwe la setshwantsho DMX, o ne a tlalediwa go tshela ka boemo jwa go tshela ka botshelo ka Labobedi, go ya ka RollingStone.</s>

en: Celebrity publications TMZ and Billboard reported over the weekend that Simmons, who has had a public history of substance abuse, was rushed to the hospital after suffering a heart attack at his home about 11 p.m. Friday.
tsn: Diphasalatso tsa dinaledi TMZ le Billboard di begile mo bokhutlong jwa beke gore Simmons, yo o nang le hisetori e e itseweng ke botlhe ya diokobatsi, o sianeseditswe kwa bookelong morago ga go boga ka  tlhaselo ya go ema pelo kwa legaeng la gagwe bosigo ka 11 ka Labotlhano.
mt0: <pad> Gone a heart attack at his home about 11 p.m. Friday, Simmons was rushed to the hospital after suffering a heart attack at his home about 11 p.m. Friday.</s>

en: Neither his publicist, manager nor his lawyer immediately responded to Reuters request for comment on the singer and the reports.
tsn: Mo go baphasaladi ba gagwe, molaodi, kgotsa moemedi wa gagwe ga gona yo o  arabileng ka bonako  go kopo ya Reuters go tshwaela ka seopedi le dipegelo.
mt0: <pad> Neither his publicist, manager nor his lawyer responded to Reuters' request for comment on the singer and the reports.</s>

en: The singer, a fixture in the music world since the 1990s, has long struggled with illegal drug use and has spoken about entering rehab in 2019 after serving federal prison time for tax fraud.
tsn: Seopedi, setswerere mo go  lefatsheng la mmino go tloga ka dingwaga tsa bo 1990, o ne a ntse sokola ka go dirisa diritibatsi tse di seng molaong mme o buile ka go tsena rehepe ka 2019 morago ga go tsena kgolegelong ka ntlha ya tsietso ya lekgetho.
mt0: <pad> O ntse a tlhakane tlhogo ka diokobatsi tse di sa siamang go simolola ka bo 1990, mme o buile ka go tsena kwa bookelong ka 2019 morago ga go tshwarwa mo kgolegong ya federal ka molato wa go utswa madi.</s>

en: He was convicted of failing to pay $1.7 million in taxes from 2000 to 2005, by shifting money among accounts belonging to managers and associates.
tsn: O bonwe molato ka go palelwa go duela lekgetho la dimilione di le $1.7 go tswa 2000 go fitlha ka 2005, ka go nna a tlosa madi mo diakhaotong tse e leng tsa  balaodi le batsalani.
mt0: <pad> O ne a latofadiwa ka go seka a duela madi a a fetang $1.7 million ka lekgetho go simolola ka 2000 go ya go 2005, ka go fetola madi mo dikontereng tsa badiri le ditsala.</s>

en: Simmons also has starred in such films as the 1998 crime drama Belly, the 2000 action movie Romeo Must Die, and the 2003 heist film Cradle 2 the Grave.
tsn: Simmons le ena o simolotse mo difiliming tse jana ka 1998 terama ya bosenyi ya Belly, mmofi wa 2000 wa tiragatso  wa Romeo Must Die, le 2003 filimi ya bogodu Cradle 2 the Grave.
mt0: <pad> Simmons o ne a tlhagelela mo ditshwantshong tse di jaaka 1998 crime drama Belly, 2000 action movie Romeo Must Die, and 2003 heist film Cradle 2 the Grave.</s>

en: A sit-in in the office of the Northern Cape MEC for Sport, Arts and Culture  by some Kimberley artists  has entered its third week.
tsn: Kemo mo ofising ya Mokhuduthamaga ya Metshameko, Botsweretshi le Setso ya Kapa Bokone ka badiragatsi ba bangwe mo Kimberley e tsena mo bekeng ya boraro.
mt0: <pad> Go sit-in go tswa kwa ditshwantshong tsa batho ba Kimberley ba ba tlhagisang ka boitlhapelo mo ofising ya MEC ya Northern Cape Sport, Arts and Culture, e tsene mo bekeng la boraro.</s>

en: The artists are demanding a revival of the arts, COVID-19 relief funds for some and the full operation of the Northern Cape theatre.
tsn: Badiragatsi ba batla tsosoloso ya botsweretshi, thuso ya matlole  ya Khorona mo go ba bangwe le tirelo e e tletseng ya teatara ya Kapa Bokone.
mt0: <pad> Badiri ba batla go tsosolosa ditshwantsho tsa bone, madi a tshegetso a COVID-19 bakeng sa bangwe le go simolola ga thethete ya Northern Cape.</s>

en: They believe this move will help them recover income lost due to COVID-19 regulations.
tsn: Ba dumela gore se se tla ba thusa go bona lotseno le le ba latlhegetseng  ka ntlha ya  melawana ya corona.
mt0: <pad> Ba tshepa go re tsela eno e tla ba thusa go tsosolosa madi a ba a latlhegetseng ka ntlha ya melawana ya COVID-19.</s>

en: Mkhululi Mabija, who is an artist, says they are demanding operations at theatres.
tsn: Mkhululi Mabija, yo o leng modirigatsi, a re ba batla mafelo a bobogelo a simolole go dira.
mt0: <pad> Mkhululi Mabija, o e leng mmetli, o re ba batla go dira tiro kwa dithelebisheneng.</s>

en: We demanding that the theatre be operational, the craft and the music hub be operational too for our artists to actually work.
tsn: Re batla go gore mafelo a bobogelo a dire, boitlhamedi le lefelo la mmino le lona le dire gore badirigatsi ba rona ba kgone go dira.
mt0: <pad> Re batla go re theater e nne e bereka, lefelo la diatla le lefelo la mmino le bo le bereka gape gore baetsi ba rona ba kgone go dira tiro ya bone.</s>

en: But we need the support of the MEC and the province to support us in our quest.
tsn: fela re tlhoka tshegetso ya ga MEC le porofense go re tshegetsa mo phisegelong ya rona.
mt0: <pad> Gone gone, we need the support of the MEC and the province to support us in our quest.</s>

en: Theyve not been taking us seriously, conversations have been had and conversations have just been left in mid-air.
tsn: Ba ntse ba sa re tseye tsia, dipuisano di tshwerwe mme di feletse fela mo moweng.
mt0: <pad> Ba re tshwanetse go re tsaya ka maswabi, dipuisano di dirilwe mme dipuisano di ne di tlogelwa fela mo gare ga tsela.</s>

en: And until our demands are met, then well move away from here, says Mabija.
tsn: Re tlaa nna fa gofitlhelela ditlhokego tsa rona di arabiwa. Go bua Mabija.
mt0: <pad> Go fihla go re dikgopolo tsa rona di fitlhelelwe, re tla nna re tswa mo kwano, says Mabija.</s>

en: The provincial Department of Sports Arts and Culture says there are plans to meet the artists halfway.
tsn: Lefapha la Porofense la metshameko, Botsweretshi le Setso la re go na le maano a go thusana le batsweretshi.
mt0: <pad> Department of Sports Arts and Culture says there are plans to meet the artists halfway.</s>

en: Northern Cape Department of Sports, Arts and Culture Conrad Fortune says an amount of R4 million has been allocated.
tsn: Lefapha la Metshameko, Botsweretshi le Setso la Kapa Bokone, Conrad Fortune o re madi a bokana ka milione di le R4 di abeilwe.
mt0: <pad> Go tswa kwa Lefapha la Matsaele, Dipapadi le Mmino wa Northern Cape, Conrad Fortune says that R4 million has been allocated for the annual Olympic Games in Botswana.</s>

en: We are also in the process of developing a service level agreement which basically indicates how the funding will be utilised and remain in line with all the financial policies and acts of government when incurring expenses.
tsn: Gape re mo thulaganyong ya go tlhama tirelo ya maemo a tumalano e e tla tlhagisang gore matlole a tla dirisiwa jang mme a tsamaye ka pholisi ya matlole le melao ya puso fa go le  ditshinyegelo.
mt0: <pad> Re ntse re tlhabolola leano la go tshegetsa ditirelo tse di tshwanetseng, le le bontsha ka fa madi a tla dirisiwa ka teng, mme a nna mo molaong wa melao ya madi le melao ya mmuso fa re dira ditshenyegelo.</s>

en: The artists say the departments delay to prioritise their demands is further compromising their already insufficient income.
tsn: Badiragatsi ba re lefapha le diega go rulaganya ditlhokego tsa bona mme le tswelela go tlhoka go duela, gajaana ga ba bone lotseno.
mt0: <pad> Artists says the department's delays to prioritise their demands is further compromising their already insufficient income.</s>

en: The cast of British royal drama The Crown took the top television prize for drama at the Screen Actors Guild (SAG) awards on Sunday while Schitts Creek, the story of a once-wealthy family forced to relocate to a small town, was named best television comedy.
tsn: Setlhopha sa terama ya Bogosi jwa kwa Britain, The Crown se tseile sekgele sa kwa godimo sa terama ya thelebišene kwa moletlong wa dikabelo wa Screen Actors Guild (SAG) ka LaTshipi, fa Schitts Creek, kanelo ya lelapa le lengwe le le neng le humile le pateletsega go fudugela kwa toropong e nnye, e kailwe go na kanelo ya metlae e e gaisang.
mt0: <pad> Go tswa kwa go setlhopha sa ditshwantsho tsa bogosi jwa Borithane The Crown, tse di neng di le mo maemo a a kwa godimo a thelebisheneng, di ne di amogela kgatlhanong ya go re ke bone ba tshwanetse go fetola maemo a a kwa godimo a a kwa godimo a a kwa godimo a a kwa godimo a a kwa godimo a a kwa godimo a a kwa godimo a a kwa godimo a a kwa godimo a a kwa godimo a a kwa godimo a a kwa godimo a a kwa godimo a a kwa godimo a a kwa godimo a a kwa godimo a a kwa godimo a a kwa godimo a a kwa godimo a a kwa godimo a a kwa godimo a a kwa godimo a a kwa godimo a a kwa godimo a a kwa godimo a a kwa godimo a a kwa godimo a a kwa godimo a a kwa godimo a a kwa godimo a a kwa godimo a a kwa godimo a a kwa godimo a a kwa godimo a a kwa godimo a a kwa godimo a a kwa godimo a a kwa godimo a a kwa godimo a a kwa godimo a a kwa godimo a a kwa godimo a a kwa godimo a a kwa godimo a a kwa godimo a a kwa godimo a a kwa godimo a a kwa godimo a a kwa godimo a a kwa godimo a a kwa godimo a a kwa godimo a a kwa godimo a a kwa godimo a a kwa godimo a a kwa godimo a a kwa godimo a a kwa godimo a a kwa godimo a a kwa godimo a a kwa godimo a a kwa godimo a a kwa godimo

en: Gillian Anderson, who plays British Prime Minister Margaret Thatcher in The Crown, which focused its most recent season on the troubled marriage of Prince Charles and Princess Diana, also picked up best actress award.
tsn: Gillian Anderson, yo o tshamekang karolo ya Tonakgolo ya  Borithane Margaret Thatcher mo go The Crown, e, e e neng e lebagane le setlha sa sešweng  sa mathata mo lenyalo la ga Kgosana Charles le Kgosigadi Diana, o tseile sekgele sa modiragatsi wa mosadi yo o  gaisang.
mt0: <pad> Gillian Anderson, yo o dirang Margaret Thatcher mo go The Crown, e e tsenelang setlhogo sa yone sa morago ga sekgwaga se se fetileng ka lenyalo la Prince Charles le Princess Diana, o ne a amega thata ka go re o tshwanetse go nna mosadi wa bogosi.</s>

en: Heavy is the head that wears The Crown  Congratulations to this amazing ensemble!
tsn: Bokete ke tlhogo e aparang masego a The Crown go kopano e e makatsang jana!
mt0: <pad> Go heavy the head that wears The Crown</s>

en: Due to the coronavirus pandemic, 2021’s SAG ceremony was scaled down from a gala dinner to a one-hour presentation, held remotely, and peppered with jokes about how actors filled their free time during lockdown or got a start in their careers.
tsn: Ka ntlha ya leroborobo la mogare wa corona, moletlo wa SAG wa 2021 o fokoditswe go tloga go moletlo wa dijo tsa maitseboa go ya go ura e nngwe ya tlhagiso, a latlhela metlae ka ga ka moo badiragatsi ba dirisitseng nako ya bona ka teng ka nako ya thibelomotsamao kgotsa go simolola ka dithuto tsa bokamoso.
mt0: <pad> Ka ntlha ya pandemic ya coronavirus, SAG 2021 e ne e fokoditswe go nna gala dinner go nna presentation ya one-hour, e dirilwe kwa ntle, mme e ne e na le dikgopolo ka fa badiri ba neng ba tlala nako ya bone ka teng ka teng mo nakong ya lockdown kgotsa ba simolotse go dira tiro ya bone.</s>

en: On the film side, courtroom drama The Trial of the Chicago 7 and jazz period film Ma Rainey’s Black Bottom were the big winners at one of the last major ceremonies before the Oscars.
tsn: Mo letlhakoreng la difilimi, terama ya kgotlatshekelo The Trial of the Chicago 7 le filimi ya mmino wa jazz ya Black Bottom ya ga Ma Rainey e ne e tsona bafenyi ba bagolo kwa  nngwe ya meletlo ya bofelo pele ga di Oscars.
mt0: <pad> Gone gone, the courtroom drama The Trial of the Chicago 7 and jazz period film Ma Rainey's Black Bottom were the big winners at one of the last major ceremonies before the Oscars.</s>

en: The SAG awards are chosen by members of the acting union.
tsn: Dikabelo tsa dikgele tsa SAG di tlhophiwa ke maloko a mokgatlho wa nakwana.
mt0: <pad> Go a SAG Awards go tlhophilwa ke baemedi ba setlhopha sa botaki.</s>

en: Many of the SAG winners and nominees are also up for honours at the British BAFTA awards next week and the Independent Spirit Awards on 22 April.
tsn: Bontsi jwa bafenyi ba SAG le batlhophiwa ba letile dikgele tsa tlotlo kwa British BAFTA mo bekeng e e latelang le Dikgele tsa Mowa o o Ikemetseng ka 22 Moranang.
mt0: <pad> Ba le bantsi ba a kgethilego le ba a tlhagileng ba tla nna mo go tse dingwe tsa di-SAG, mme ba tla nna mo go tse dingwe tsa di-BAFTA tsa Borithane ka beke e e tlang le di-Independent Spirit Awards ka la 22 Phatwe.</s>

en: Godzilla vs. Kong muscled its way to a pandemic-era box office record, giving Hollywood studios and theatre owners alike hope that people are ready to return to the movies after a year of watching Netflix at home.
tsn: Godzilla vs Kong e tsene ka maatla mo rekotong ya Box office ya leroborobo, mme e file batsamaisi ba mafelo a bobogelo kwa Hollywood tsholofelo ya gore batho jaanong ba siametse go boela kwa mafelong a difilimi morago ga ngwaga wa go lebelela difilimi mo netflix kwa gae.
mt0: <pad> Godzilla vs. Kong e ne ya simolola go bona dipalopalo tsa boemo jwa pandemic-era, e e fa badiri ba Hollywood le baamogedi ba dithelebishene tshepo ya gore batho ba tlile go boa kwa ditshwantshong morago ga ngwaga wa go re ba bone Netflix kwa gae.</s>

en: The tent pole, from Warner Bros. and Legendary Entertainment, generated $32 million over the weekend and $48.5 million in its first five days of release.
tsn: Tente ya pole, go tswa Warner Bros le Legendary Entertainment, e dirile dimilione di le 32 mafelong a beke le dimilione di le $48.5 lwa ntlha mo kgololo ya malatsi a le matlhano a yona.
mt0: <pad> Go go gadget.</s>

en: The time has come to choose a side!
tsn: Nako e gorogile ya go tlhopha letlhakoreng!
mt0: <pad> Gone time to choose a side.</s>

en: Prior to this weekend, Wonder Woman1984 had the biggest three-day start with $16.7 million, followed by Tom and Jerry with $14 million.
tsn: Pele ga beke e, Wonder Woman 1984 e ne e na le tshimologo e kgolo ya matsatsi a mararo ka dimilione di le $16.7, a latelwa ke Tom le Jerry ka dimilione di le  $14.
mt0: <pad> Gone before this weekend, Wonder Woman1984 had the biggest three-day start with $16.7 million, followed by Tom and Jerry with $14 million.</s>

en: The results for Godzilla vs. Kong are especially impressive because the film is also available to HBO Max subscribers for no extra fee.
tsn: Dipholo tsa Godzilla kgatlhanong le Kong di a kgatlhisa tota ka gonne filimi e teng gape go HBO Max badirisi ga ba duele sepe.
mt0: <pad> Go Godzilla vs. Kong, diphetho di tshwerwe ke go re di le botlhokwa thata ka go re filimi e gape e fumanega mo bathong ba HBO Max kwa ntle ga madi a mangwe.</s>

en: Its unclear how many people have streamed the movie.
tsn: Ga go bonagale sentle gore ke batho ba le kana kang ba ba boneng filimi e.
mt0: <pad> Go sa itsege gore batho ba le ba kae ba ileng ba rekota filimi.</s>

en: David A. Gross, who runs the movie consulting firm Franchise Entertainment Research, called opening weekend ticket sales strong given the still-difficult conditions.
tsn: David A. Gross, yo o tsamaisang baesekopo ya setlamo sa bogakolodi ba Forentšhaesa ya Boitapoloso ya Patlisiso, o bula thekiso ya dithikete mo bofelong jwa beke go lebilwe maemo a a boima.
mt0: <pad> Go a good weekend for the movie industry, David A. Gross, who runs the movie consulting firm Franchise Entertainment Research, said ticket sales were strong despite the still-difficult conditions.</s>

en: More than 50% of movie theatres in the country have reopened, but many, including those in New York City and Los Angeles, have been operating at reduced capacity to comply with pandemic safety protocols.
tsn: Diperesente di feta 50 tsa bobogedi jwa difilimi  mo nageng ya rona di butswe, fela bontsi, bo akaretsa tse di leng kwa Toropong ya New York le Los Angeles, di ne di dira ka go fokotsa nomoro go ikamanya le melawana ya pabalesego ya leroborobo.
mt0: <pad> More than 50% of movie theaters in the country have reopened, but many, including those in New York City and Los Angeles, have been operating at reduced capacity to comply with pandemic safety protocols.</s>

en: While its half of what it would be under normal circumstances, the weekend is a clear and positive indication that movie-going has inherent strengths that aren’t going away, he said.
tsn: Fa halofo ya yona e le gore nkabo go le jang ka fa tlase ga maemo a a tlwaelegileng, mafelo a beke a tlhapile e bile a supa tlhomamo e e siameng gore filimi e tla fitlhela maatla a a tla dirang gore e sa ya gope,  a bua jalo.
mt0: <pad> Fa e le halofo ya se e tla nna ka maemo a tlwaelesegileng, beke ya bofelo e supa sentle go re go ya ditshwantshong go na le bokgoni jo bo sa tswang bo simolola go fela, o rialo.</s>

en: Though ticket sales for Godzilla vs. Kong are certainly encouraging, the United States box office has yet to fully recover from the yearlong shutdown.
tsn: Dithekiso tsa Godzilla kgatlhanong le Kong di a rotloetsa, lebokoso la difilimi la United States le gaufi go tlhomama gape morago ga go tswala ngwaga otlhe
mt0: <pad> Gone although ticket sales for Godzilla vs. Kong are certainly encouraging, the United States box office has yet to fully recover from the yearlong shutdown.</s>

en: Godzilla vs. Kong wasn’t this weekend only new release.
tsn: Godzilla kgatlhanong le Kong e ne e se yona fela e ntšhwa e e ntshitsweng mo mafelong a beke e.
mt0: <pad> Go a shame that Godzilla vs. Kong wasn't the only new release this weekend.</s>

en: Sony Pictures horror film The Unholy pulled in $3.2 million from 1 850 locations, a modest start for the low-budget movie.
tsn: Ditshwantsho tsa Sony tsa filimi e e tshosang, The Unholy e dirile dimilione di ka nna $3.2  go tswa mo mafelong a le 1 850, naletsana ya maemo ka filimi ya tekanyetsokabo e nnye.
mt0: <pad> Go a good start for the low-budget Sony Pictures horror film The Unholy, which has been released in 1 850 locations, a modest start for the low-budget movie.</s>

en: It narrowly beat out Universal’s action thriller Nobody for third place on box office charts.
tsn: E tlhotse filimi ya tiragatso ya Universal ya Nobody mo kgatong ya boraro mo lebokosong la ofisi ya ditšhate.
mt0: <pad> It narrowly beat Universal's action thriller Nobody for third place on box office charts.</s>

en: Nobody, starring Bob Odenkirk as a mild-mannered father-turned- vigilante, earned $3million in its second weekend, boosting its domestic tally to $11.8 million.
tsn: Motshameko wa Nobody, o o akaretsang Bob Odenkirk jaaka rre yo o maitseo yo a lekang a fetoga go tlhokomela, e fitlhetse dimilione di le  $3 mo mafelong a beke ya bobedi a yona, go oketsa palogotlhe ya yona go dimilione di le$11.8.
mt0: <pad> Nobody, e dirilweng ke Bob Odenkirk jaaka rre yo o bosula-maikutlo a fetoletswe go nna molebeledi, e ne ya fumana $3million ka nako ya yone ya bobedi, e eketsa madi a yone a kwa gae go gongwe le go feta $11.8 million.</s>

en: In fourth, Disney’s animated adventure Raya and the Last Dragon made $2 million from 2 031 locations.
tsn: Mo maemong a bone, dikadiphologolo tsa Disney, Raya le Dragon di dirile dimilione di le 2 go tswa mafelong a le 2 031.
mt0: <pad> Go simolola ka go re, Raya and the Last Dragon ya Disney e ne e dira $2 million kwa mafelong a 2, 031 a dithelebishene.</s>

en: The film, which is also playing on Disney Plus for a premium $30 fee, has grossed $32 million at the domestic box office.
tsn: Filimi, e gape e tshamekang mo Disney Plus ka tuelo e kana ka $30, e dirile dimilione di le $32  mo lebokosong la selegae.
mt0: <pad> Go simolola ka go re o sa itse.</s>

en: Tom and Jerry rounded out the top five, amassing $1.5 million in its sixth weekend in theatres.
tsn: Tom le Jerry e fitlhile mo maemong a a kwa godimo a botlhano, ka kgobokano ya dimilione di le $1.5 mo mafelong a beke ya borataro kwa baesekopong.
mt0: <pad> Go a simolola go re Tom and Jerry e tla nna ya boraro mo go tse di tlhagisang madi a le $1.5 million ka nako ya yone ya bosupa ya beke ya go tsena kwa theathele.</s>

en: To date, the movie has made $39.5 million in the US.
tsn: Go fitlha ga jaana, filimi e e dirile dimilione di le $39.5 mo US.
mt0: <pad> Go fihla jaana, filimi e e dirile madi a le $39.5 million kwa United States.</s>

en: Its also available on HBO Max.
tsn: E fitlhelwa gape mo HBO Max
mt0: <pad> Go a go HBO Max.</s>

en: The Presiding Officer of the Methodist Church, Bishop Purity Malinga, says the availability of vaccines against the coronavirus is a sign of hope and one of the good news stories to tell this Easter.
tsn: Moreetsa-kgetse wa Kereke ya Methodist, Mobishopomogolo Purity Malinga, a re go nna teng ga meento e e kgatlhanong le corona ke letshwao le tsholofelo mme nngwe ya dikgang tse di monate ke go bolela ka se ka Paseka.
mt0: <pad> O Modimo wa Methodist Church, Bishop Purity Malinga, o re go nna teng ga divaksine tsa coronavirus ke sesupo sa tshepo le nngwe ya dipego tse di molemo go re re boele kwa morago ka Paseka.</s>

en: Bishop Malinga was delivering the sermon during a virtual Easter Sunday Service broadcast on SABC 2, hosted by the South African Council of Churches (SACC) and its member churches.
tsn: Mobishopo Malinga o ne a neela thero ka nako ya kgaso ya Tirelo ya Paseka ya Sontaga mo go SABC 2 ka inthanete, e e neng e tshwerwe ke Khansele ya Dikereke ya Aforika Borwa (SACC) le maloko a  dikereke.
mt0: <pad> Baebele e a gopola gore o ne a rerang selelo ka nako ya Mokolo wa Paseka o tshwaretswe ka SABC 2, e e neng e tshwerwe ke Lekgotla la Dikereke tsa Afrika Borwa (SACC) le dikereke tsa yona.</s>

en: She stressed that vaccination should not be discriminatory.
tsn: O gateletse gore moento ga o a tshwanela go nna kgethololo.
mt0: <pad> O tlhamaletse go re vaksination ga e tshwanela go nna le kgethollo.</s>

en: The Bishop says despite all the darkness the country is faced with, there is hope.
tsn: Mobishopo o rile kwa ga bontsho jo naga ya rona e lebaganeng le jona, go na le tsholofelo.
mt0: <pad> O re go sa kgathalesege maemo a bosa a naga e lebana le one, go na le tsholofelo.</s>

en: We have seen the darkness of corruption, Gender-Based Violence, poverty, hunger; the list goes on.
tsn: Re bone bontsho jwa bobodu, tirisodikgoka e e ikaegileng ka bong, lehuma, tlala; lenane le tswelela pele.
mt0: <pad> Re bone bofifi jwa go nna le madi, go tlhasela basadi, bobola, tlala; lenaneo le tswela pele.</s>

en: As Easter people, we do not despair; we do not lose hope.
tsn: Jaaka batho ba paseka, ga re  latlhe tshepo; ga re latlhegelwa ke tsholofelo.
mt0: <pad> Go nna batho ba Paseka, ga re a ka ra tshaba; ga re a ka ra latlhegelwa ke tsholofelo.</s>

en: Rather we lift up the signs of hope as we see because Jesus is alive.
tsn: Re tsholetsa matshwao a tsholofelo jaaka re bona ka gonne Jesu o a tshela.
mt0: <pad> Go na le moo, re tsholetsa matshwao a tshepo jaaka re bona ka go re Jesu o tshela.</s>

en: We find courage in lifting up any sign of hope that we see.
tsn: Re bona thotloetso mo go tsholetseng matshwao a tshepo e re e bonang.
mt0: <pad> Re bona boitshepo ka go tsholetsa matshwao otlhe a tsholofelo a re a bonang.</s>

en: It is because of the good news of Easter that we lift up vaccination as a sign of hope, calling for it to be made available to all; whether they are rich or poor, she says.
tsn: Ke ka ntlha ya dikgang tse di monate tsa Paseka gore re tsholetsa moento jaaka letshwao la go nna le tsholofelo, re dira boipiletso jwa gore e nne teng go botlhe; ba bahumi le bahumanegi, o bolela jalo.
mt0: <pad> Ke ka ntlha ya ditaba tse di monate tsa Paseka re simolola go tshola vaerase jaaka sesupo sa tshepo, re kgothaletsa go re e dirwe e nne teng mo go botlhe; go sa kgathalesege gore ba humile kgotsa ba fatshe, o bua.</s>

en: The Vice President of the South African Council of Churches, Reverend Frank Chikane, gave recognition to frontline healthcare workers who put their lives at risk to save the lives of COVID-19 patients.
tsn: Motlatsa Moporesitente wa Khansele ya Dikereke ya Aforika Borwa, Moruti Frank Chikane o lebogile  badiri ba tlhokomelo ya boitekanelo ba ba beileng matshelo a bona mo kotsing  go boloka matshelo a balwetse ba khorona.
mt0: <pad> O ne a galaletsa badiri ba tsa kalafi ba ba tseileng matshelo a bone go boloka matshelo a bakudi ba COVID-19</s>

en: He was delivering the Benediction and gave concluding remarks at the service.
tsn: O ne a tlisitseng matlhatsi  mme a fetsa ka ditshwaelo kwa tirelong.
mt0: <pad> O ne a simolola go naya Benediction mme a bua ka mafoko a go kwala fa kerekeng.</s>

en: Our frontline workers risked their lives daily to safe our lives.
tsn: Badiri ba rona ba dinagamolelwane ba beile  matshelo a bona kotsing  letsatsi le letsatsi go boloka matshelo a rona.
mt0: <pad> Batho ba rona ba ba dirang mo go tsa pele ba ne ba iphakanetse matshelo a bone letsatsi le letsatsi go boloka matshelo a rona.</s>

en: But one thing is certain that God we believe in is a God whos always present with us.
tsn: Fela selo se le sengwe ke gore Modimo yo re dumelang go ena ke Modimo yo a tlholang a le teng ka gale le rona.
mt0: <pad> A o itse gore Modimo yo re mo dumelang ke Modimo yo o nna teng go rona ka metlha.</s>

en: He was forsaken on the Cross so that we never get forsaken.
tsn: O ne a latlhelwa mo sefapanong gore rona re seke ra latlhelwa.
mt0: <pad> O ne a latlhegelwa mo sefapanong gore re se ka ra latlhegelwa.</s>

en: Jesus is Emmanuel,- that is God with us.
tsn: Jesu ke Emmanuele, ke gore Modimo o na le rona.
mt0: <pad> Jesu ke Emmanuel,- Modimo o na le rona.</s>

en: Our God is also an all knowing God,- an omniscient God.
tsn: Modimo wa rona gape ke Modimo o itseng tsotlhe - Modimo wa dikgagamatso.
mt0: <pad> God o itse tsotlhe,</s>

en: God knows what we are going through and knows how to make up for our loss.
tsn: Modimo o itse mathata a rona, mme o itse gore re busetsa tsotlhe tse di re latlhegetseng.
mt0: <pad> God o itse se re se dirang, o itse go re simolole tshenyego ya rona.</s>

en: God knows how to heal us from the ravages of life and the coronavirus.
tsn: Modimo o itse go re fodisa go tswa mo ditlhabing tsa botshelo le corona.
mt0: <pad> God alone knows how to heal us from the ravages of life and the coronavirus.</s>

en: Our God is all powerful and he is able to save us and be with us under difficult circumstances, Chikane said.
tsn: Modimo wa rona o maatla e bile o kgona go re boloka mme a dule le rona ka fa tlase ga maemo a a thata, go bua Chikane.
mt0: <pad> Godi wa rona o nono, mme o kgona go re boloka le go re tshegetsa mo maemo a a boima, Chikane o buile.</s>

en: Also speaking at the event, SACC Secretary General, Bishop Malusi Mpumlwana, said the last year was a year of helplessness against the coronavirus.
tsn: Fa a ne a bua kwa moletlong, Mokwaledi Kakaretso wa SACC, Mobishopo Malusi  Mpumlwana, o rile ngwaga o o fetileng e ne e le ngwaga wa go tlhoka thuso  kgatlhanong le mogare wa corona.
mt0: <pad> Go nna le seabe mo moletlong, Moofisiri wa SACC, Bishop Malusi Mpumlwana, o ne a re ngwaga o fetileng e ne e le ngwaga wa go sa kgonegeng kgatlhanong le coronavirus.</s>

en: Bishop Mpumlwana says Easter brings hope despite the challenges the country is facing due to the pandemic.
tsn: Mobishopo Mpumlwana o rile Paseka e tlisa Tshepo, go sa kgathalesege gore naga e lebagane le dikgwetlho tse di kana kang ka ntlha ya leroborobo.
mt0: <pad> Baebele ya re Paseka e tlisa tsholofelo go lebana le mathata a naga e e tlhakanyang ka ntlha ya pandemic.</s>

en: Praise be to the God and father to our Lord Jesus Christ.
tsn: Dithoriso di ye go Modimo le Rara wa rona Jesu Keresete.
mt0: <pad> Tshidiso e a nne go Modimo, Rraa Morena Jesu Keresete.</s>

en: In his great mercy, he has given us new birth into a living hope through the resurrection of Jesus Christ from the dead.
tsn: Mo kutlwelobotlhokong ya gagwe e kgolo, o re neetse tsalo e ntšhwa mo  tsholofelong ya botshelo ka go tsosiwa ga Jeso Keresete mo baswing.
mt0: <pad> Ka bopelotlhomogi jwa gagwe jo bogolo, o re neile tshepiso e ntswa ya tshepo e tshelang ka tsogo ya Jesu Keresete mo baswing.</s>

en: It is to that hope that we come this morning.
tsn: Ke ka Tsholofelo eo gore re be re le fa mo mosong ono.
mt0: <pad> Ke ka ntlha ya tshepo eno re tla gompieno mosong.</s>

en: We have come through a year of grief, anxiety, of fear and distress, year of exasperation and a sense of helplessness against the COVID-19 pandemic.
tsn: Re tswa mo ngwageng wa masetlapelo, tlhobaelo ya poifo le tlalelo, ngwaga wa tlhakatlhakano le go tlhoka thuso kgatlhanong le leroborobo la corona.
mt0: <pad> Re fetile ngwaga wa go lela, go tshwenyega, go tshaba le go tlhoboga, ngwaga wa go nna le maikutlo a go se na maatla kgatlhanong le pandemic ya COVID-19.</s>

en: In faith on Good Friday, we consciously mounted these troubles on the cross of the crucified Christ.
tsn: Ka tumelo ya Labotlhano yo molemo, re ikaeletse go rola mathata mo sefapanong se keresete a bapoletsweng mo go sona.
mt0: <pad> Ka tumelo ka Labobedi le Leholo, re tshameketse diteko tseo mo sefapanong sa ga Keresete yo o tsogileng.</s>

en: This morning we come to celebrate the resurrection of our Lord with restored faith and confidence of the power of live over death, he said.
tsn: Mo mosong ono re tla go keteka tsogo ya Morena wa rona ka tsosoloso ya tumelo le boitshepo jwa maatla a botshelo go feta loso,  a bua jalo.
mt0: <pad> Gompieno mosong re tlile go keteka tsogo ya Morena wa rona ka tumelo e e tsosolositsweng le tshepo ya maatla a go tshela a go feta loso, a rialo.</s>

en: Concerns over slow vaccine rollout
tsn: Tshwenyego ka tsamaiso e e bonya ya moento.
mt0: <pad> Go nna le kgotlhang ka go re divaksine di simolola go phatlalatswa ka bofefo.</s>

en: Speaking during the Easter Vigil Service, which was held at St Georges Cathedral, in Cape Town, Anglican Archbishop Thabo Makgoba raised concern over the governments slow COVID-19 vaccine rollout programme, especially in poor and marginalised communities.
tsn: Fa a ne a bua kwa Tirelong ya Bosigo ba Paseka, e e neng e tshwaretswe kwa kerekeng ya St Georges Cathedral, kwa Toropong ya Kapa, Mobišhopo wa Anglican Thabo Makgoba  o tlhagisitse matshwenyego ka ga mebuso ka tsamaiso e e bonya ya lenaane la meento ya corona, bogolosegolo mo bahumaneging le mo baaging ba ba kgaphetsweng kwa thoko.
mt0: <pad> Go bua ka nako ya Moletlo wa Paseka, o ne a tshwaretswe kwa St Georges Cathedral, Cape Town, Archbishop Thabo Makgoba o tlhagisitse go re ba mmuso ba ntse ba fokotsa go tshegetsa vaese ya COVID-19 mo bathong ba ba humileng le ba ba sa tsewang.</s>

en: Makgoba says he is sceptical about how long it will take to administer vaccines across the country.
tsn: Makgoba a re o na le dipelaelo ka ga gore go tla tsaya nako e le kana kang go tsamaisa meento go ralala naga.
mt0: <pad> Makgoba says he is sceptical about how long it will take to administer vaccines across the country.</s>

en: We know very well that there are large areas of our country where political corruption has poisoned public healthcare systems.
tsn: Re itse sentle gore go na le dikgaolo tse dikgolo tsa naga ya rona mo bosenyi ba polotiki bo senyang  tsamaiso ya tlhokomelo ya boitekanelo ba setšhaba.
mt0: <pad> Re itse sentle go re go na le dinaga tse dikgolo mo naga ya rona tse di nang le tshedimosetso ya bongaka e e sa siamang, mme tlhe o tshwanetse go re o itse.</s>

en: Shame on those who have left hospitals and clinics short of people, equipment and protection.
tsn: Go tlhabisa ditlhong go ba ba tlogetseng maokelo le ditleliniki di tlhoka batho, didiriswa le tshireletso.
mt0: <pad> Shame on those who have left hospitals and clinics short of people, equipment and protection.</s>

en: I have read that on the current strategy it would take 18-years to vaccinate our entire present population!
tsn: Ke buisitse seo mo togamaanong ya ga jaana gore go tlaa tsaya dingwaga di le 18 go enta batho botlhe ba rona!
mt0: <pad> Ke ithutile go re ka tsela ya jaana go tla tsaya dilemo tse 18 go tshegetsa batho ba rona botlhe ba ba leng teng ka divaksine.</s>

en: We cannot allow that to happen, he added.
tsn: Re ka se letle seo go diragala, a tlaleletsa.
mt0: <pad> Re ka se letle seo go direga, a okeletsa.</s>

en: So far, 269 102 healthcare workers have been vaccinated the country prepares for the second phase of the programme.
tsn: Go fitlha ga jaana, badiri ba tlhokomelo boitekanelo ba le 269 102 ba tlhabilwe, naga e ipaakanyetsa  kgato ya bobedi ya lenaneo le.
mt0: <pad> Go fihla jaana, badiri ba tsa kalafi ba le 269 102 ba tshegetse divaksine tsa go thibela malwetse a a bakwang ke coronavirus, fa naga e ipaakanyetsa go simolola fase ya bobedi ya lenaneo la go thusa batho ba ba sa tsebeng.</s>

en: A leaker says they are offering information on more than 500 million Facebook users, including phone numbers and other data, virtually for free.
tsn: Sebui se rile se neelana ka  tshedimosetso mo badirising ba go fetang dimilione di le 500 tsa Facebook, go akaretsa le dinomoro tsa mogala le tshedimosetso e nngwe, mahala.
mt0: <pad> A leaker says they are offering information on more than 500 million Facebook users, including phone numbers and other data, virtually for free.</s>

en: The database appears to be the same set of Facebook-linked telephone numbers that has been circulating in hacker circles since January and whose existence was first reported by tech publication Motherboard, according to Alon Gal, co-founder of Israeli cybercrime intelligence firm Hudson Rock.
tsn: Deithabeisi e lebega e tshwana le dinomoro tsa mogala tse di kgolantsweng le Facebook, tse di ntseng di phasaladiwa go tloga ka kgwedi ya Ferikgong,  mme go nna teng ga yona go ne go begilwe ke kuranta ya tsa thekenoloji, Motherboard. Se ke go ya ka Alon Gal, mothei-mmogo wa setheo sa bonokwane jwa mo inthaneteng, Hudson rock.
mt0: <pad> Go a bonala go re ke setlhopha sa dinomoro tsa mogala tse di amanang le Facebook tse di ntseng di phatlaladiwa mo dikgotleng tsa ba-hackers go simolola ka Janawari, go ya ka Alon Gal, motsemedi wa kgwebo ya tlhaloganyo ya boitsebiso jwa cybercrime e leng Hudson Rock.</s>

en: Reuters was not immediately able to vet the information, which is being offered for a few euros worth of digital credit on a well-known site for low-level hackers, but Gal said on Saturday that he had verified the authenticity of at least some of the data by comparing it against phone numbers of people he knew.
tsn: Reuters e ne e sa kgone go sekaseka tshedimosetso ka bonako, e e  neetsweng ka di euro di le mmalwa ya boleng jwa sekoloto sa inthanete se se itsegeng thata sa maemo a a kwa tlase a bogodu, fela Gal o rileka Lamatlhatso  gore o tlhomamisitse bonnete jwa bonnye jwa nngwe ya tshedimosetso ka go e bapisa le dinomoro tsa mogala tsa batho bao a ba  itseng.
mt0: <pad> Reuters e ne e sa kgone go tlhotlhomisa tshedimosetso, e e rekiswang ka madi a le mmalwa a di-euro tse dintsi tsa madi a dikhomputara mo lefelong la boitshepo jaaka a adimilweng ke ba-hackers ba ba kwa tlase ga maemo, mme Gal o re o ne a netefaditse boammaaruri jwa senyane sa tshedimosetso ka go bapisa yone le dintlha tsa mogala tsa batho ba a itseng.</s>

en: Other journalists say they have also been able to match known phone numbers to the details in the data dump.
tsn: Babegakgang ba bangwe ba re ba tshwanetse gape go kgona go lekalekantsha dinomoro tsa mogala tse di itsegeng le dintlha mo tatlhong ya tshedimosetso.
mt0: <pad> Ba bangwe ba botsa gore a go kgonne go tshwantsha dinomoro tsa mogala tse di itsegeng le tshedimosetso e e mo go yone.</s>

en: In a statement, Facebook said that the data was very old and related to an issue that it had fixed in August 2019.
tsn: Mo tlhagisong, Facebook e rile tshedimosetso e ne e le ya kgale mme e amana le bothata jo bo siamisitsweng  ka Phatwe ka 2019.
mt0: <pad> Facebook e tlhalositse go re tshedimosetso e e ne e le ya bogologolo mme e ne e amana le mathata a a neng a a simololwa ka Mopitlwe wa ngwaga wa 2019.</s>

en: An attempt by Reuters to reach the leaker over the messaging service Telegram was not immediately successful.
tsn: Maikaelelo ka Reuters go fitlhelela mmui yo a buletseng tshedimosetso e  wa tirelo ya melaetsa ya Telegram e ne ya se atlege ka bonako.
mt0: <pad> Go leka ga Reuters go batla go buisana le mophatlalatsi ka tshebeletso ya meseji Telegram ga go ne go tsaya nako e telele go re go direge.</s>

en: Gal told Reuters that Facebook users should be alert to social engineering attacks by people who may have obtained their phone numbers or other private data in the coming months.
tsn: Gal o boleletse Reuters gore badirisi ba Facebook ba tshwanetse go ele tlhoko tlhotlheletso-loago e e tlhaselwang ke batho ba ka tswang  ba fitlhetse dinomoro tsa bona tsa mogala kgotsa tshedimosetso ya sephira ya bangwe mo dikgweding tse di tlang
mt0: <pad> Ga o itse, o ka re o ne a sa itse.</s>

en: News of the latest leak here was first reported by Business Insider.
tsn: Dikgang tsa bošeng tsa go dutla fa di begilwe ke rakgwebo wa ka fa gare.
mt0: <pad> Go a leak, go a leak.</s>

en: A grand parade conveyed 22 ancient Egyptian royal mummies in special capsules across the capital Cairo on Saturday to a new museum home where they can be displayed in greater splendour.
tsn: Dipontsho tse kgolo tsa thekiso di tlhagsitse ditopo tsa bogosi tsa bogologolo tsa maEgepeta tse 22 mo mabokosong a a kgethegileng  go ralala toropo ya Cairo ka Lamatlhatso go ya legaeng le le ntšha la musiamo mo di ka  bonwang sentle ka tlotlo.
mt0: <pad> 22 ancient Egyptian royal mummies in special capsules were transported to a new museum home on Saturday in the capital Cairo.</s>

en: The convoy transported 18 kings and four queens, mostly from the New Kingdom, from the Egyptian Museum in central Cairos Tahrir Square to the National Museum of Egyptian Civilization in Fustat, about 5km (3 miles) to the south-east.
tsn: Molokoloko o tsamaisitse  dikgosi di le 18, dikgosigadi di le nne, bontsi go tswa New Kingdom, go tswa musiamong wa Egyptian bogareng jwa Sekwereng sa Cairos Tahrir go ya  musiamo wa Bosetšhaba wa tlhabologo ya Egyptian kwa Fustat,  dikilometara di ka nna  5km (dimaele di le 3) go ya  borwa-botlhaba.
mt0: <pad> Go ne go na le kgosi tse 18 le mmeao tse nne, bontsi jwa bone ba tswa mo Bogosi jo Bosakhutleng, go tswa kwa Museum of Egyptian Civilization kwa Fustat, ka 5km (3 miles) kwa borwa-botlhaba jwa Cairo.</s>

en: Authorities shut down roads along the Nile for the elaborate ceremony, designed to drum up interest in Egypt’s rich collections of antiquities when tourism has almost entirely stalled because of COVID-19 related restrictions.
tsn: Balaodi ba tswaletse ditsela go ralala Nile go tlhagisa moletlo, o o dirilweng  go tsosolosa kgatlhego  mo  kgobokanyo ya dilo tsa bogologolo fa bojanala bo eme ka ntlha ya dikganelo tse di amanang le Khorona
mt0: <pad> Authorities closed roads along the Nile for the elaborate ceremony, designed to drum up interest in Egypt's rich collections of antiquities when tourism has almost entirely stalled because of COVID-19 related restrictions.</s>

en: As the royal mummies arrived at the museum, which was officially inaugurated on Saturday, cannons fired a 21-gun salute.
tsn: Jaaka ditopo tsa bogosi di  goroga kwa musiamong, o o neng wa tlhongwa ka Lamatlhatso, dikanono di thuntse dikolo di le 21 go dumedisa.
mt0: <pad> Fa di-mummy tsa bogoši di tsena mo museumeng, e e neng e simolotse go tlhatlhobiwa ka la boraro, badiri ba di-cannons ba ne ba thuntsha setlhopha sa di-gun tse 21 go galaletsa.</s>

en: President Abdel Fattah al-Sisi stood by as the mummies filed past on vehicles bedecked with golden pharaonic motifs.
tsn: Moporesidente Abdel Fattah al-Sisi o eme fa ditopo di feta mo diroring tse di kgabisitsweng ka gauta ka mokgabiso wa maFaro.
mt0: <pad> President Abdel Fattah al-Sisi stood by as the mummies filed past on vehicles bedecked with golden pharaonic motifs.</s>

en: The heads of the UN cultural agency UNESCO and the World Tourism Organization were also present at the ceremony.
tsn: Ditlhogo tsa baemedi ba tsa setso ba UN, UNESCO le Setlamo sa Bojanala jwa Lefatshe ba ne ba le teng kwa moletlong.
mt0: <pad> Baeteledipele ba UNESCO le World Tourism Organization e ne e le teng mo moletlong.</s>

en: Each mummy had been placed in a special capsule filled with nitrogen to ensure protection, Egyptian archaeologist Zahi Hawass said.
tsn: Setopo sengwe le sengwe se tsenngwe mo teng ga lebokoso le le kgethegileng le le tladitsweng naeterojene go netefatsa tshireletso, go bua moithutamarope wa kwa Egypt, Zahi Hawass.
mt0: <pad> Mummy e ngwe le e ngwe e ne e beilwe mo kaseiseng e kgethegileng e tshegetsang nitrogen go boloka, archaeologist Zahi Hawass o buile.</s>

en: They were carried on vehicles designed to cradle them and provide stability.
tsn: Di ne di rwelwe mo diroring tse di diretsweng go di tlamela ka tlhomamo.
mt0: <pad> Ba ne ba tsamaiswa ka dikoloi tse di dirilweng go ba tshola le go ba fa kagiso.</s>

en: We chose the Civilization Museum because we want, for the first time, to display the mummies in a civilized manner, an educated manner, and not for amusement as they were in the Egyptian Museum, Hawass said
tsn: Re tlhophile Musiamo wa Tlhabologo ka gonne re batla, la ntlha, go bontsha ditopo ka mokgwa wa selegae, ka mokgwa wa go rutega, mme e seng ka go tlosa bodutu jaaka di ne di le kwa musiamong wa Egyptian, go bua Hawass.
mt0: <pad> Re tlhophile Museum of Civilization because we want, for the first time, to show the mummies in a civilized way, an educated way, and not for amusement as they were in the Egyptian Museum, Hawass said.</s>

en: Popular rapper and actor Earl Simmons, known to his fans by the stage name DMX or Dark Man X, was reportedly in grave condition Saturday in a New York hospital after suffering a heart attack triggered by an apparent drug overdose, according to the celebrity publications TMZ and Billboard.
tsn: Seopedi sa mmino wa Rap se se tumileng le modiragatsi Earl Simmons, yo o itsegeng mo balateding ba gagwe ka leina la bodiragatsi e leng  DMX kgotsa Dark Man X, o kailwe a le mo maemong a masisi ka Lamatlhatso kwa bookelong jwa New York morago ga go boga tlhaselo ya pelo e e tlisitsweng ke tlolo tiriso ya diritibatsi, go ya ka diphasalatso tsa dinaledi TMZ le Billboard.
mt0: <pad> Earl Simmons, a itsegeng ka leina la gagwe la go nna DMX, o ne a supiwa a le mo maemo a a maswe kwa bookelong jwa New York ka Labobedi morago ga go nna le mathata a pelo a bakilwe ke go feta ga madi, go ya ka diphatlalatso tsa dikgang tsa boithabiso.</s>

en: The publications reported that Simmons, 50, who has had a public history of substance abuse, was rushed to a White Plains, New York, hospital after suffering a heart attack at his home about 11 p.m. Friday.
tsn: Dikgatiso tse di begile gore Simmons, 50, yo a nang le hisetori ya tshotlo ya  diritibatsi, o sianeseditswe kwa White Plains, bookelong ba New York, morago ga go boga ka tlhaselo ya pelo kwa lelapeng la gagwe ka 11 P.M. ka Labotlhano.
mt0: <pad> Diphatlalatso di bega gore Simmons, wa dingwaga tse 50, o ne a romelwa kwa bookelong jwa White Plains, New York, morago ga go nna le mathata a pelo ka nako ya bofelo jwa Laboraro.</s>

en: His publicist did not immediately respond to Reuters for comment on the singer, who has been a fixture in the music world since the 1990s.
tsn: Baphasalatsi ba gagwe ga ba tsibogela ka bonako go Reuters go tshwaela ka seopedi, yo o neng a itsege mo lefatsheng la mmino go tloga ka 1990.
mt0: <pad> O o sa itse</s>

en: Reuters has not independently verified the news accounts.
tsn: Reuters ga e ise a netefatse  dikgang tse.
mt0: <pad> Reuters has not independently verified the news accounts.</s>

en: The musician has been open about his struggles with illegal drug use and has spoken about entering rehab in 2019 after serving time in federal prison on a tax fraud conviction.
tsn: Seopedi se, se ne se tlhola se bua phatlhalatsa ka kgwetlho ya sona ya tiriso ya diritibatsi e e seng ka mo molaong mme o buile ka ga go tsena  rehepe ka 2019 morago ga tshwarwa kwa kgolegelong ya Federal ka tatofatso ya tsietso ya lekgetho.
mt0: <pad> O o ne a bua ka mathata a gagwe a go dirisa diokobatsi tse di seng molaong mme o buile ka go tsena kwa bookelong ka 2019 morago ga go nna mo kgolegong ya federal ka molato wa go utswa madi a a sa siamang.</s>

en: A Manhattan federal court found that he failed to pay $1.7 million in taxes from 2000 to 2005, by shifting money among accounts belonging to managers and associates.
tsn: Kgotlatshekelo ya naga ya Manhattan e fitlhetse gore o  paletswe ke go duela lekgetho la dimilione di le $1.7 ka 2000 go ya 2005, go tlosa madi magareng ga dibanka tse e leng tsa balaodi le badirimmogo.
mt0: <pad> A Manhattan federal court found that he failed to pay $1.7 million in taxes from 2000 to 2005, by shifting money among accounts belonging to managers and associates.</s>

en: His debut album in 1998 Its Dark and Hell is Hot, was listed as number one on the Billboard 200 chart in the United States and sold more than 5 million copies.
tsn: Alebamo ya gagwe wa ntlha ka 1998 ya Its Dark and Hell is Hot e e tlhagisitsweng mo jaaka ya ntlha mo bilibotong ya papetla ya 200 kwa United States mme ya rekisa dikhopi di feta dimilione di le 5.
mt0: <pad> O ne a simolola go reetsa ka 1998, Its Dark and Hell Is Hot, e bile e tlhagelela mo lekgolong la ntlha la di-Billboard 200 tsa Amerika mme e rekisitse dikopi tse di fetang 5 million.</s>

en: Along with his rap career, Simmons has starred in such films as the 1998 crime drama Belly, the 2000 action movie Romeo Must Die, and the 2003 heist film Cradle 2 the Grave.
tsn: Mmogo le tiro ya gagwe ya mmino wa Rap, Simmons o nnile naledi mo difiliming tse di tshwanalng le terama ya bosenyi ya ngwaga wa 1998 Belly, filimi ya ngwaga wa2000, Romeo Must Die, le filimi ya bogodu ya ngwaga wa 2003, Cradle 2 the Grave.
mt0: <pad> Go tloga ka tiro ya gagwe ya go rapela, Simmons o ne a nna le seabe mo ditshwantshong tse jaaka 1998 crime drama Belly, 2000 action movie Romeo Must Die, and 2003 heist film Cradle 2 the Grave.</s>

en: Churchgoers at the Good Friday service at St Georges Cathedral in Cape Town, in the Western Cape, say they are grateful that they are able to attend in 2021.
tsn: Phuthego e e neng e le kwa tirelong ya  Labotlhano yo Molemo kwa kerekeng ya St Georges Cathedral kwa Toropong ya Kapa, kwa Kapa Bophirima, ba rile ba itumeletse gore ba  kgonne go go ya kwa kerekeng mo ngwageng wa 2021.
mt0: <pad> Go tswa kwa dikerekeng tsa Mokoloboa wa Paseka kwa St Georges Cathedral, Cape Town, ka bophirima jwa Afrika Borwa, ba re ba lebogela go kgona go nna teng ka 2021.</s>

en: In 2020, Easter services across South Africa were cancelled when the nation was placed under strict Level 5 lockdown after the COVID-19 pandemic hit the country.
tsn: Ka 2020 ditirelo tsa Paseka go ralala Aforika Borwa di ne tsa phimolwa fa setšhaba se e sa bewa ka fa tlase ga maemo 5 a a gagametseng, 5 morago ga  leroborobo la khorona le ratha naga.
mt0: <pad> Ka 2020, ditiro tsa Paseka mo Afrika Borwa ka bophara di ne di kgaotswe fa naga e be e le kwa tlase ga Level 5 lockdown morago ga go re COVID-19 pandemic e tlhasela naga.</s>

en: Under the current revised Level 1 restrictions, 250 people are allowed to attend indoor gatherings and 500 people are allowed to attend outside gatherings.
tsn: Ka fa tlase ga kemo e e tlhabolotsweng ya tekanyetso ya maemo 1, batho ba le 250 ba  letlelelwa go tsenela dikokoano tse di tshamekelwang mo teng ga kago mme  batho ba le 500 ba letlelelwa go tsenela dikokoano tsa kwa ntle.
mt0: <pad> Go ya ka dithibelo tse di tlhabolotsweng tsa Level 1, batho ba le 250 ba letlelelwa go nna teng mo dikgotlhong tsa mo kamoreng mme ba le 500 ba letlelelwa go nna teng mo dikgotlhong tsa mo jarateng.</s>

en: Church congregants gather in small, controlled numbers at places of worship in Cape Town. About 50 people attended the morning service at St Georges Cathedral.
tsn: Phuthego ya kereke e kokoanya ka bonnye, ka nomoro e e ka laolwang  kwa mafelong thapelo  kwa Toropong ya Kapa . batho ba ka nna 50 ba  tsenetse tirelo ya mo mosong kwa kerekeng ya St Georges Cathedral.
mt0: <pad> Batho bakereke ba phuthega ka palo e nnye, e laolwang mo ditempeleng tsa Cape Town. Go lekana 50 people attended the morning service at St Georges Cathedral.</s>

en: They shared their feelings.
tsn: Ba ne ba ntsha maikutlo a bona.
mt0: <pad> Ba ne ba abelana ka maikutlô a bone.</s>

en: It felt a bit bitter sweet.
tsn: Go ne go le monate mme gape go se monate.
mt0: <pad> It felt a bit bitter sweet.</s>

en: Its been a bit weird for this entire year and for most of last year, we haven’t been able to attend church
tsn: Go ne go makatsa mo lefatsheng lotlhe le bontsi jwa ngwaga o o fetileng, re paletswe ke go ya kerekeng.
mt0: <pad> Gone a bit weird for this whole year and for most of last year, we haven't been able to attend the celebrations.</s>

en: and so it feels really solemn and really special to be able to be here today, one congregant says.
tsn: mme ka jalo e utlwagala e le  boammaaruri mme e kgethegile go kgona go nna fa gompieno, go bua yo mongwe wa phuthego
mt0: <pad> Ke a itse gore gompieno ke tsatsi le monate thata le le kgethegileng go bo re kgona go nna mo go lona, o bua jalo mongwe wa baphuthegi.</s>

en: This is a high holiday for us as Christians and I missed it.
tsn: Le ke letsatsi le le kwa godimo la boikhutso go rona jaaka Bakeresete mme ke ntse ke le gopotse.
mt0: <pad> Gompieno ke moletlo o mogolo mo go rona ba Bakeresete, mme ke ne ka lebala.</s>

en: I’m just so privileged to be among the saints and remember more than 2 000 years ago that a man, just an ordinary man, gave his life for the whole world and Im one of them.
tsn: Ke ikutlwa ke le lesego thata go nna yo mongwe wa baitshepi le go gakologelwa fa dingwaga tse 2 000 tse di fetileng monna, yo o tlwaelegileng, a neetse ka botshelo jwa gagwe go lefatshe lotlhe mme le nna ke mongwe wa batho bao.
mt0: <pad> Ke a itse gore ke na le boitshepo jo bo kgethegileng go nna gare ga baaposetoloi mme ke gakologelwa go re dingwaga di feta 2 000 tse fetileng, motho wa nnete, o ne a ntsha bophelo jwa gagwe mo lefatsheng lotlhe mme ke mongwe wa bone.</s>

en: So I made an effort this morning to get up and to come to the house of the Lord, says another congregant.
tsn: Ka jalo ke dirile maiteko mo mosong ono go tsoga le go tla ntlong ya Morena, go bua mongwe wa phuthego.
mt0: <pad> Ke ne ka leka go tsoga le go tla kwa ntlong ya Morena mosong wa gompieno, a rialo mongwe wa baemedi.</s>

en: Dean of St Georges Cathedral, Reverend Michael Weeder, says the church will be extremely cautious when hosting services, in order to comply with strict COVID-19 protocols to curb the spread of the virus.
tsn: Tlhogo ya kereke ya St Georges Cathedral, Moruti Michael Weeder, o rile kereke e tla nna kelotlhoko thata fa e dira ditirelo, gore e obamele melao le ditaelo tsa Khorona  go thibela go anama ga mogare.
mt0: <pad> Dean of St Georges Cathedral Reverend Michael Weeder says the church will be extremely cautious when hosting services, in order to comply with strict COVID-19 protocols to curb the spread of the virus.</s>

en: Reverend Weeder says congregants are also encouraged to worship at home.
tsn: Moruti Weeder o rile phuthego e rotloediwa gape go rapela kwa gae.
mt0: <pad> Reverend Weeder says that the congregation is also being urged to worship at home.</s>

en: The intuitive sense is to stay at home if you’ve got co-morbidities; God is everywhere.
tsn: Maikutlo a nnete ke go nna kwa gae fa o na le malwetse a mangwe; Modimo o gongwe le gongwe.
mt0: <pad> Go nna kwa gae go na le bokao jo bo tlhaloganyesegang ke go nna kwa gae fa o na le bolwetse jo bo sa tshepahaleng; Modimo o mo mafelong otlhe.</s>

en: We said that right at the beginning of the lockdown, and particularly on our first Good Friday and Easter, we encourage our people, with the understanding that God is worshipped wherever we breathe, wherever we live, wherever we love and care; and so that is a very essential reality of faith.
tsn: Re rile jalo mo tshimologong ya tswalelo, bogolosegolo lwa ntlha kwa kopanong ya rona ya ntlha ya Labotlhano yo molemo le ka Paseka, re rotloetsa batho ba rona, ka go tlhaloganya gore Modimo o rapelwa fa re ntse re hema, fa re ntse re tshela, fa re ntse re rata le go tlhokomela; mme se se botlhokwa thata mo tumelong.
mt0: <pad> Re ne ra re go simolola ka nako ya lockdown, mme segolobogolo ka Mokolo wa Ntlha wa Letsatsi le Leholo le Paseka, re kgothaletsa batho ba rona, ka tlhaloganyo ya gore Modimo o galalediwa kwa re tshelang, kwa re tshelang, kwa re rayang le go tlhokomela; mme ka jalo, ke boammaaruri jo bo botlhokwa thata jwa tumelo.</s>

en: You don’t need a magnificent building.
tsn: Ga  o tlhoke kago e ntle e.
mt0: <pad> O se tlhoka go nna le kago e kgolo.</s>

en: The creation is the cathedral of God’s gift to us, he adds.
tsn: Kago e ke mpho e Modimo a re neetseng yona, a tlaleletsa.
mt0: <pad> Go tlhama ga go a re tshwanela, mme Modimo o re neile yone.</s>

en: Congregants gather at the St Georges Cathedral to observe Easter.
tsn: Phuthego e kokoana kwa kerekeng ya St Georges Cathedral go tlotla paseka.
mt0: <pad> Go phuthega ga batho ba le bantsi kwa St Georges Cathedral go keteka Paseka.</s>

en: Services at various churches around the world are expected to continue over the weekend as Christians commemorate Easter.
tsn: Ditirelo tsa dikereke tse di farologaneng go ralala lefatshe ka bophara di solofetswe go tswelela mo bokhutlong jwa beke jaaka Bakeresete ba keteka paseka.
mt0: <pad> Go a simolola go tshwarwa dikereke tse di farologaneng mo lefatsheng ka bophara ka nako ya Paseka, jaaka Bakeresete ba keteka Paseka.</s>

en: A grand parade will convey 22 ancient Egyptian royal mummies in specially designed capsules across the capital Cairo on Saturday to a new museum home where they can be displayed in greater splendour.
tsn: Dipontsho tsa thekiso di tlaa tlhagisa ditopo di le 22 tsa bogologolo tsa kwa Egypt mo mabokosong a a kgethegileng  go ralala toropo ya Cairo ka Lamatlhatso, go ya kwa musiamong o montšhwa kwa di tlaa tlhagiswang sentle gona.
mt0: <pad> A grand parade will convey 22 ancient Egyptian royal mummies in special capsules across the capital Cairo on Saturday to a new museum home where they can be displayed in greater splendour.</s>

en: The convoy will transport 18 kings and four queens, mostly from the New Kingdom, from the Egyptian Museum in central Cairos Tahrir Square to the National Museum of Egyptian Civilization in Fustat, about 5km (3 miles) to the south-east.
tsn: Mokoloko o tlaa tsamaisa dikgosi di le 18 le dikgosana di le nne, bontsi go tswa kwa New Kingdom, go tswa kwa musiamong wa Egypt, kwa Tahrir Square kwa Cairo go ya kwa musiamong wa bosetšhabatšhaba wa Tlhabologo wa kwa Fustat, dikilometara di ka nna 5 (dimmaele di le 3) go ya kwa borwa- botlhaba.
mt0: <pad> The convoy will transport 18 kings and four queens, mostly from the New Kingdom, from the Egyptian Museum in central Cairo's Tahrir Square to the National Museum of Egyptian Civilization in Fustat, about 5km (3 miles) to the south-east.</s>

en: Authorities are shutting down roads along the Nile for the elaborate ceremony, designed to drum up interest in Egypts rich collection of antiquities when tourism has almost entirely stalled because of COVID-19 related restrictions.
tsn: Balaodi ba tswalela ditsela go ralala Nile go tlhalosa moletlo, o o diretsweng go tsosolosa kgatlhego mo kgobokanyong e e nonneng ya bogologolo ya Egypt, fa bojanala bo emisitswe gotlhelele ka ntlha ya dikganelo tse di amanang le corona.
mt0: <pad> Authorities are closing roads along the Nile for the elaborate ceremony, designed to drum up interest in Egypt's rich collection of antiquities when tourism has almost entirely stalled because of COVID-19 related restrictions.</s>

en: Each mummy will be placed in a special capsule filled with nitrogen to ensure protection, and the capsules will be carried on carts designed to cradle them and provide stability, Egyptian archaeologist Zahi Hawass said.
tsn: Setopo sengwe le sengwe se tla tsenngwa mo teng lebokoso le le kgethegileng le le tletseng ka naeterojene go netefatsa tshireletso, mme lebokoso le tla rwalwa ka kolotsana e e agilweng go di tshwara sentle le go di  tlamela ka tlhomamo, go bua moithutamarope wa Egyptian  Zahi Hawass.
mt0: <pad> Mummy e nngwe le e nngwe e tla bewa mo kasepeleng e kgethegileng e tshegetsang nitrogen go boloka dimumy, mme dikapeleso di tla tsamaya mo ditsaneng tse di dirilweng go di kgothatsa le go di fa kagiso, a rialo mmatlisisi wa Egepeta Zahi Hawass.</s>

en: We chose the Civilization Museum because we want, for the first time, to display the mummies in a civilized manner, an educated manner, and not for amusement as they were in the Egyptian Museum, he said.
tsn: Re tlhopha Musiamo o o tlhabologileng ka gonne re batla, la ntlha, go bontsha ditopo ka mokgwa o go tlhabologileng, ka mokgwa wa thuto, mme e seng ka go thabisa jaaka di ne le kwa Musiamong wa Egyptian, a rialo.
mt0: <pad> Go simolola ka go re re tlhopha Museum of Civilization e le go bontsha di-mummy ka tsela e e tlhaloganyeswang, e e rutegang, mme e seng go kgatlhegela jaaka di ne di le mo Museum of Egypt, o buile.</s>

en: Archaeologists discovered the mummies in two batches at the complex of mortuary temples of Deir Al Bahari in Luxor and at the nearby Valley of the Kings from 1871.
tsn: Moithutamarope o ribolotse ditopo mo ditlhopheng tse pedi kwa tlhakatlhakanong ya mmoshara wa tempele ya Deir Al Bahari kwa Luxor le kwa  gaufi ga Valley of the  Kings go tswa 1871.
mt0: <pad> Archaeologists discovered the mummies in two batches at the complex of mortuary temples of Deir Al Bahari in Luxor and at the nearby Valley of the Kings from 1871.</s>

en: The oldest is that of Seqenenre Tao, the last king of the 17th Dynasty, who reigned in the 16th century BC and is thought to have met a violent death.
tsn: Se segolo ke sa ga Seqenenre Tao, Kgosi ya bofelo ya Bogosi ka bo17, yo o busitseng mo ngwagakgolong wa bo16 BC mme go akanngwa gore o tlhokofetse loso la tirisodikgoka.
mt0: <pad> Se se kgale go gaisa ke sa ga Seqenenre Tao, kgosi ya bofelo ya dynasty ya 17th, yo o neng a busa ka lekgolo la bo 16 la dingwaga B.C.E. mme go dumelwa o thokafetse ka loso lo lo maswe.</s>

en: The parade will also include the mummies of Ramses II, Seti I, and Ahmose-Nefertari.
tsn: Dipontsho di tla akaretsa ditopo tsa Ramses II, Seti I, le Ahmose-Nefertari.
mt0: <pad> Go tla akaretsa gape le dimummo tsa Rames II, Seti I, le Ahmose-Nefertari.</s>

en: Fustat was the site of Egypt’s capital under the Umayyad dynasty after the Arab conquest.
tsn: Fustat e ne e le lefelo la matlole a Egepeto ka fa tlase ga Umayyad dynasty morago ga phenyo ya Arab.
mt0: <pad> Fustat e ne e le motsemogolo wa Egepeta ka nako ya dintwa tsa Umayyad morago ga go fenywa ke ma-Arabe.</s>

en: By doing it like this, with great pomp and circumstance, the mummies are getting their due, said Salima Ikram, an Egyptologist at the American University in Cairo.
tsn: Ka go dira se jaana, ka maemo a magolo, ditopo di fitlhela tse di ba tshwanetseng, go bua Salima Ikram, mo Egyptologist kwa Yunibesiting ya kwa Amerika kwa Khairo.
mt0: <pad> Go dira jalo, ka go tshameka ka boitshepo le go nna le maemo a a kwa godimo, di-mummy di bona se ba se tlhokang, a rialo Salima Ikram, moithuti wa Egepeta kwa Yunivhesiti ya Amerika kwa Cairo.</s>

en: These are the kings of Egypt, these are the pharaohs.
tsn: Tse ke dikgosi tsa Egepeto, tse ke boFaro.
mt0: <pad> Ba ke kgosi tsa Egepeta, ba ke Pharaohs.</s>

en: And so, it is a way of showing respect.
tsn: Mme ka jalo, ke tsela ya go bontsha tlotlo.
mt0: <pad> Ke ka moo, e le tsela ya go bontsha tlotlo.</s>

en: When Holy Week processions were cancelled because of Spain’s COVID-19 restrictions, keeping a Good Friday drumming tradition alive took on extra importance for the residents of Calanda.
tsn: Fa ditsamaiso tsa Beke e e Boitshepo di phimolwa ka ntlha ya ditekanyetso tsa Khorona tsa kwa Spain, go tlogela setso sa meropa ya Labotlhano yo Molemo e bidiwa e nnile selo se se botlhokwa go baagi ba Calanda.
mt0: <pad> Fa ditshupetso tsa beke ya Paseka di ne di kgaolwa ka ntlha ya ditlhokego tsa Spain tsa COVID-19, go boloka setšo sa go letsa terompeta sa Good Friday se ne sa botlhokwa thata mo bathong ba Calanda.</s>

en: Dressed in vivid purple costumes, they played the drums in the streets, in front of houses or from balconies as part of the Rompida de la Horaz.
tsn: Go aparwe diaparo tse di  phepole,  ba tshameka meropa mo mebileng, fa pele ga matlo  jaaka karolo ya Rompida de la Hora.
mt0: <pad> Go tshameka diaparo tsa go phatsima, ba ne ba letsa di-drums mo mebileng, fa pele ga matlo, kgotsa go tswa mo maboteng jaaka karolo ya Rompida de la Horaz.</s>

en: The drums boomed throughout this south-eastern Spanish town of 3 700 inhabitants but with all the players observing social distancing.
tsn: Meropa e duma go ralala le Borwa -Botlhaba  jwa toropo ya Spanish ya baagi ba le 3 700, mme batshameki ba ne ba itse tlhoko boikatoloso jwa batho.
mt0: <pad> Go ne go simolola go reiwa di-drums mo motseng wa kwa botlhabatsatsi jwa Spain wa baagi ba ka nna 3 700 mme le batho botlhe ba boloka kgakala le setšhaba.</s>

en: This Holy Week is a little sadder because I like to be with my friends and play the Calanda drum with them
tsn: Beke e e Boitshepo e ne e  hutsafatsenyana ka gonne ke rata go nna le ditsala tsa me mme re tshameke meropa ya Calanda le bona
mt0: <pad> Gompieno beke ya Paseka e a nna e le e sa kgethegileng ka go re ke rata go nna le ditsala tsa me mme ke letsa thebe ya Calanda le bone.</s>

en: but we hope that next year this will pass and let us get together, said Ivan Rodriguez, 24, a drummer and local resident.
tsn: Fela re solofela gore ngwaga o o latelang se se tla feta mme  se re tlogele gore re nne mmogo, go bua  Ivan Rodriguez, 24, moletsi Moropa  le moagi wa selegae.
mt0: <pad> Go a tshameka go re go tshwanetse go re go nne jalo, mme re tshepa gore se se tla fetela mme re tla kopana le nna, a rialo Ivan Rodriguez, 24, a drummer and a resident of the city.</s>

en: After all the suffering of the last year, Santiago Villanueva, another resident, said residents felt a strong need to keep up the tradition.
tsn: Morago ga tshotlego ya ngwaga o o fetileng, Santiago Villanueva, moagi o mongwe, o rile baagi ba nnile le maikutlo a a maatla go boloka setso.
mt0: <pad> Gone after all the suffering of last year, another resident, Santiago Villanueva, said that residents felt a strong need to keep up the tradition.</s>

en: We are having a very sad time but the spirit continues, he said.
tsn: Re mo kutlobotlhokong fela mowa o tswelela pele, a tlhalosa.
mt0: <pad> Re nna le nako e e bosula thata, mme re tswelela, o rialo.</s>

en: Molapisi from the Ethiopian Episcol Church has described the past year as midnight in the lives of many people.
tsn: Molapisi go tswa Kerekeng ya Ethiopian Episcol o tlhalositse  ngwaga o o fetileng jaaka bosigogare mo matshelong a batho ba le bantsi.
mt0: <pad> Molapisi wa kereke ya Etiopia ya Episcole o tlhalositse ngwaga o o fetileng jaaka'midnight' mo matsatsing a batho ba bantsi.</s>

en: She likened the coronavirus pandemic to the sudden darkening of the sun during Jesus last moments on the cross.
tsn: O tshwantshitse leroborobo la mogare wa khoron le  lefifi le le tlileng ka bonako  la apesa letsatsi ka nako ya bofelo e Jeso a neng a le mo sefapanong.
mt0: <pad> O tshwantsha pandemic ya coronavirus le go re letsatsi le a kgopologa ka bonako mo motlheng wa bofelo wa Jesu fa a ne a le kwa sefapanong.</s>

en: Molapisi was one of the Speakers at the South African Council of Churches (SACC)
tsn: Molapisi e ne e le mongwe wa dibui kwa Khansele ya Dikereke tsa Aforikaborwa (SACC)
mt0: <pad> Molapisi o ne a le mongwe wa baemedi ba Lekgotla la Dikereke la Afrika Borwa (SACC).</s>

en: Virtual Good Friday Service that was broadcast on SABC 2.
tsn: Kgatiso ya tirelo ya Labotlhano yo Molemo e ne e tlhagisitswe mo SABC 2.
mt0: <pad> Virtual Good Friday Service that was broadcast on SABC 2</s>

en: She says before Jesus died, there was what seemed like a spiritual midnight, much like the past year for many people.
tsn: O rile pele Jeso a tlhokofala, go ne go na le selo se e keteng ke semowa sa bosigogare, fela jaaka ngwaga o o fetileng mo bathong ba le bantsi.
mt0: <pad> O re pele ga Jesu a swa, go ne go na le se se neng sa bonala jaaka bošego jwa tlhaloganyo, fela jaaka ngwaga o fetileng mo go batho ba bantsi.</s>

en: Before Jesus shouted out, Father into your hands I commit my spirit, notice how the Bible tells us that the sun was darkened.
tsn: Pele ga Jesu a goelela, Rara ke baya mowa wa me mo matsogong a gago, lemoga ka moo Baebele e re bolelela gore letsatsi le ne le ntshofetse.
mt0: <pad> Before Jesus cried out, "Rare, in your hands I commit my spirit," notice how the Bible tells us that the sun was darkened.</s>

en: It seemed like a spiritual midnight had covered the whole earth.
tsn: Go ne go bonala e kete semowa sa bosigogare se apesitse lefatshe lotlhe.
mt0: <pad> Go ne go tshwana le fa bošego jo bo sa khutleng bo ne bo kwadile lefatshe lotlhe.</s>

en: This last year for many people, it has indeed felt like midnight in their lives.
tsn: Se mo ngwageng o o fetileng mo  bathong ba le bantsi, ruri go utlwagetse go tshwana le bosigogare mo matshelong a bona.
mt0: <pad> Go a lot of people, this year has felt like midnight in their lives.</s>

en: Job losses, death of loved ones, funerals have been the order of the day bazalwane.
tsn: Tatlhegelo ya ditiro, loso la ba re baratang, diphitlho ke sejo sa letsatsi bakeresete.
mt0: <pad> Gone a job, died a loved one, funerals have been the order of the day, brothers.</s>

en: In many instances, incidences of abuse and violence against children and women has dramatically increased as COVID-19 took its toll.
tsn: Mo mabakeng a le mantsi, dikotsi tsa tshotlako le tirisodikgoka kgatlhanong le basadi le bana di oketsegile thata fa Covid-19 e tsena
mt0: <pad> Fa o sa itse, o ka re o ne a itse.</s>

en: Right now, I come into your home to bring a word of encouragement direct from the Lord.
tsn: Gona jaanong, ke tla mo legaeng la gago go go naya lefoko la thotloetso ka tlhamalalo go tswa go Modimo.
mt0: <pad> Gompieno, ke tsena mo go lona go re ke lo tliseditse lefoko la kgopelo go tswa kwa Modimong.</s>

en: The darker the night, the brighter the dawn of a new day, says Molapisi.
tsn: Bosigo jo bontsho, moso o nna o o phatsimang mo letsatsing le le ntšha, go bolela Molapisi.
mt0: <pad> Gone darker the night, the brighter the dawn of a new day, says Molapisi.</s>

en: The South African Council of Churches (SACC) has likened the pain and isolation suffered by many victims of COVID-19 as the same pain and humiliation that Jesus Christ suffered during his crucifixion.
tsn: Khansele ya Aforika Borwa ya Dikereke (SACC) e tshwantshitse botlhoko le boitlhaolo jo bo bogileng ke batswasetlhabelo ba le bantsi ba Khorona jaaka  botlhoko le matlhabisa ditlhong a Morena Jeso a a bogileng ka nako ya bapolwa.
mt0: <pad> South African Council of Churches (SACC) e bapisa bohloko le go ikgolaganya ga batho ba bantsi ba ba tshwerweng ke COVID-19 le bohloko le go tlhokofadiwa ga Jesu Keresete ka nako ya gagwe ya go kgaolwa.</s>

en: SACCs Director of Church and Community Engagement, Reverend Mzwandile Molo, encouraged people not to give up.
tsn: Mokaedi wa Kereke le Ditirelo tsa Setšhaba wa SACCS, Moruti Mzwandile Molo, o rotloetsa batho go se latlhele toulo.
mt0: <pad> Direkgotla wa SACC, Reverend Mzwandile Molo, o kgothaletse batho go sa latlhegelwe ke tshepo.</s>

en: And whatever humiliation God goes through, God refuses to give up on us.
tsn: Le mo matlhabisa ditlhong a Modimo a tsamaileng go ona , Modimo o gana go re latlha.
mt0: <pad> Mme go sa kgathalesege gore Modimo o tlaa re tshoga jang, Modimo o gana go re tlogela.</s>

en: We heard him cry out why have you forsaken me?
tsn: Re mo utlwile a lela a re, o ne o ntatlhela eng?
mt0: <pad> Re utlwile a goa, "Ke ka ntlha yang fa o ntlogetse?"</s>

en: And in that moment that of crying out, it’s a reminder to those who cry out as they face their own death through the COVID-19 pandemic, the 52000 or so people who have lost their lives in this nation and they have lost their lives almost alone.
tsn: Mme mo nakong eo ya selelo, ke gakologelo mo go bao ba lelang sefatlhego se lebile fatshe fa ba lebagane le loso la bona ka ntlha ya leroborobo la Khorona, batho ba ka nna 52000, ba latlhegetswe ke matshelo a bona mo setšhabeng se mme ba latlhegetswe ke matshelo a bona ka nosi.
mt0: <pad> Ke gone ka nako ya go lela, ke go gopola bao ba lelelang fa ba lebana le loso lwa bone ka COVID-19, batho ba 52000 kgotsa go feta ba ba latlhegelwang ke matshelo a bone mo nageng eno, mme ba latlhegelwa ke matshelo a bone gants e le bone fela.</s>

en: But we want to remind you as family members to them, that they did not go through this alone because this God has experienced loneliness of death and cried out, why have you forsaken me?
tsn: Fela re batla go gakolola wena jaaka leloko la lelapa la bona, gore ga ba leba seno ba le esi gonne Modimo ono o nnile le maitemogelo a bodutu jwa loso mme a lela, go reng o ntlogetse?
mt0: <pad> Ke batla go re go gopotse, jaaka ba lelapa la bone, gore ba ne ba sa tshele seo ba le bonosi, ka gonne Modimo o bone boilone jwa loso mme a goa: "Ke ka ntlha yang fa o ntlogetse?"</s>

en: We have hear him cry out I thirst.
tsn: Re mo utlwile a lela a re ke nyorilwe.
mt0: <pad> Re o utlwile a goela ka go re: "Go tsididi."</s>

en: At that moment, we are reminded of Gods solidarity and all those who struggled with their bodies giving in to death in ICU, in ventilation and all the places where death seems to win, says Molo.
tsn: Ka nako eo, re gakololwa ka seoposengwe sa Modimo le botlhe bao ba  sokotseng  ka mebele ya bona mme ba bo ba tlhokofala  mo ICU,  mo metšheneng ya mowa le mo mafelong otlhe ao leso le neng le fitlhelela teng.
